notesStmt.note: This file has been created by mass conversion of GRETIL's Sanskrit corpus from hv_appau.htm. Due to the heterogeneity of the sources the header markup might be suboptimal. For the sake of transparency the header of the legacy file is documented in the note element below:

Harivamsa, Appendix I.
Based on the ed. by Parashuram Lakshman Vaidya,
Poona : Bhandarkar Oriental Research Institute 1969
(For details see the separate introduction on the Zürich server.)
Input by Atul Agarwala, J. Wayne Bass, Julie Bélanger, Peter Bisschop, Horst Brinkhaus,
John Brockington, Eva De Clercq, André Couture, James Fitzgerald, Arlo Griffiths,
N. Hanemann, Petteri Koskikallio, Kreshimir Krnic, Anne Mossner, Luther Obrock,
François Painchaud, Utz Podzeit, Peter Schreiner, Sandra Smets,
Renate Söhnen-Thieme, Christophe Vielle, Andreas Viethsen
Corrections by Peter Scharf
TEXT WITH PADA MARKERS
This GRETIL version has been adapted according to the following conventions:
ALL INSERTED LINES (= **-passages) begin with 5 blanks.
ALL EVEN pādas in longer metres (with split lines) begin with 3 blanks.
(Consequently, EVEN pādas in **-passages begin with 8 blanks.)
STRUCTURE OF REFERENCES (added):
HV_App.I,nn.nn = HV_App.I,section.line
**HV_App.I,nn.nn**nn:nn = HV_App.I,section.line**pass.-number:line
/ = daṇḍa in regular verse line (i.e., a line containing two pādas)
$ = pāda separator in regular verse line
@ = marks uneven pādas in split-line verses, e.g.: " @ HV_App.I,20.664 @"
| = daṇḍa in even pādas of split-line verses
||* ... *|| = prose
{ ... } = interlocutor line (usually not counted in **-passages)
______________
[h: ... :h] = header
[k: ... :k] = commentary

projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

body.note: h: HV (CE) appendix 1, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of october 31, 2001 :h
k: After 7.45, S1 K1.3 Dn Ds D1.4 ins. :k
body.l: meghātithis tu paulastyo vasuḥ kāśyapa eva ca /
jyotiṣmān bhārgavaś caiva dyutimān aṅgirās tathā //
paulahaḥ sapta ity ete ṛṣayo rohite 'ntare //
devatānāṃ gaṇās tatra traya eva narādhipa /
prathamasya tu sāvarṇer nava putrā mahaujasaḥ //
daśame tv atha paryāye dvitīyasyāntare manoḥ /
haviṣmān paulahaś caiva sukṛtiś caiva bhārgavaḥ /
paulastyaḥ pramatiś caiva nābhogaś caiva kāśyapaḥ /
devatānāṃ gaṇau dvau tau ṛṣimantrāś ca ye smṛtāḥ //
manoḥ sutottamaujāś ca nikuṣañjaś ca vīryavān /
bhūridyumnaḥ suvarcāś ca daśa tv ete manoḥ sutāḥ //
tasya saptaṛṣīṃś cāpi kīrtyamānān nibodha me //
haviṣmān kāśyapaś cāpi haviṣmān yaś ca bhārgavaḥ /
taruṇaś ca tathātreyo vāsiṣṭhas tv anaghas tathā //
aṅgirāś cārudhiṣṇyaś ca paulastyo niścaras tathā /
paulahaś cāgnitejāś ca bhāvyāḥ sapta maharṣayaḥ //
brahmaṇas tu sutā devā gaṇās teṣāṃ trayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
kṣemadhanvā dṛḍhāyuś ca ādarśaḥ paṇḍako manuḥ /
sāvarṇasya tu putrā vai tṛtīyasya nava smṛtāḥ //
caturthasya tu sāvarṇer ṛṣīn sapta nibodha me /
dyutir vasiṣṭhaputraś ca ātreyaḥ sutapās tathā //
tapośanaś ca paulastyaḥ paulahaś ca tapo raviḥ //
bhārgavaḥ saptamas teṣāṃ vijñeyas tu tapodhṛtiḥ /
pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā mānasā brahmaṇaś ca te //
mitravān mitravindaś ca mitrasenaś ca mitrakṛt /
mitrabāhuḥ suvarcāś ca dvādaśasya manoḥ sutāḥ //
aṅgirāś caiva dhṛtimān paulastyo havyapastu yaḥ //
paulahas tattvadarśī ca bhārgavaś ca nirutsukaḥ /
sutapāś caiva vāsiṣṭhaḥ saptaite tu maharṣayaḥ /
traya eva gaṇāḥ proktā devatānāṃ svayaṃbhuvā //
trayodaśasya putrās te vijñeyās tu ruceḥ sutāḥ /
citraseno vicitraś ca nayo dharmabhṛto dhṛtaḥ //
sunetraḥ kṣatravṛddhaś ca sutapā nirbhayo dṛḍhaḥ /
raucyasyaite manoḥ putrā antare tu trayodaśe //
agnīdhraḥ kāśyapaś caiva paulasyo māgadhas tathā //
bhārgavo hy atibāhuś ca śucir āṅgirasas tathā /
yuktaś caiva tathātreyaḥ śukro vāsiṣṭha eva ca /
ajitaḥ paulahaś caiva antyāḥ saptarṣayaś ca te //
body.note: h: HV (CE) appendix 2, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of october 31, 2001 :h
k: After the addl. colophon after 7.47, N (except S1 N1) T2-4 G ins. :k
body.l: brahmaṇo 'hnaḥ pramāṇaṃ ca vaktum arhasi me dvija //
tām upādāya gaṇanāṃ śṛṇu saṃkhyām ariṃdama //
nimeṣaiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśat tu tāḥ kalā /
triṃśatkalo muhūrtas tu triṃśatā tair manīṣiṇaḥ //
viśeṣeṇa tu sarveṣu ahorātraṃ ca nityaśaḥ //
pakṣau dvau ca smṛto māso dvau māsāv ṛtur ucyate //
abdaṃ dvyayanam uktaṃ tu ayanaṃ tv ṛtubhis tribhiḥ /
pitṝṇāṃ tad ahorātram iti kālavido viduḥ //
kṛṣṇapakṣas tv ahas teṣāṃ śuklapakṣas tu śarvarī /
kṛṣṇapakṣe tv ahaḥśrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vartate nṛpa //
mānuṣeṇa tu mānena yo vai saṃvatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ /
divyam ekam ahas tena tathā māsābdasaṃsthitiḥ /
divyam abdaṃ daśaguṇam ahorātraṃ manoḥ smṛtam /
pakṣo daśaguṇo māso māsair dvādaśabhir guṇaiḥ /
body.note: k: For line 24, N2.3 V B2 D6 subst. :k
body.l: ṣaḍbhis tair vatsaraṃ proktaṃ tena saṃkhyā nibadhyate /
catvāry eva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tu kṛtaṃ yugam //
tāvac chatī bhavet saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathā nṛpa /
tasyāś ca triśatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathāparaḥ //
tasyāpi dviśatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāśaś ca tathāvidhaḥ //
tasyāpi śatikā saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś caiva tadvidhaḥ //
sasarja sa punas tāta jagat sarvam idaṃ vibhuḥ /
kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś caiva caturyugam /
ayanaṃ cāpi tat proktaṃ dve 'yane dakṣiṇottare //
manuḥ pralīyate hy atra samāpte 'thāyane prabho /
tato 'paro manuḥ kālam etāvantaṃ bhavaty uta /
samatīteṣu rājendra proktaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ sa vai //
tad eva cāyutaṃ proktaṃ muninā tattvadarśinā /
brahmaṇas tad ahaḥ proktaṃ kalpaś ceti sa śabdyate //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 3, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of January 22, 2001 :h
k: D6 T G M1.3.4 ins. appendix I, No. 3 after 13.73, M2 after 13.69 :k
body.l: ity ete pitaro devā devāś ca pitaraḥ punaḥ /
anyonyaṃ pitaro hy ete devāś ca pitaraś ca ha //
trayo mūrtim ṛte tāta catvāras tu samūrtayaḥ /
teṣāṃ śrāddhāni satkṛtya devāḥ kurvanti yatnataḥ //
viśve ca sikatāś caiva pṛśnayaḥ śṛṅgiṇas tathā //
kṛṣṇā viśvā ajāś caiva vidhivat pūjayanty uta /
prajās tu vātaraśanā divākīrtyās tathaiva ca //
meghāś ca marutaś caiva brahmādyāś ca divaukasaḥ /
yakṣā nāgāḥ suparṇāś ca kiṃnarāś cāraṇaiḥ saha /
pūjayanti pitṝn ete sarva eva phalārthina //
evam ete mahātmānaḥ śrāddhaiḥ satkṛtya pūjitāḥ /
prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ dhṛtiṃ medhāṃ rājyam ārogyam eva ca /
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 4, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of January 22, 2001 :h
k: D6 S G(ed.) ins. Appendix I, No. 4 after 13.75 :k
body.l: āgrahāyaṇamūlāḥ syur aśṭakās tisra eva ca /
kṛṣṇapakṣe variṣṭhā ca pūrvā caindrī ca bhāṣitā /
ādyāpūpaiḥ smṛtā nityaṃ māṃsair anyā bhavet sadā /
śākaiḥ kāryā tṛtīyā syād eṣa dravyagato vidhiḥ /
anvaṣṭakyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vai nityam eva vidhīyate //
yā cāpy anyā caturthī syāt tāṃ ca kuryāt prayatnataḥ /
śreyāṃsi kṣipram āyānti paratreha ca modate //
sarve puruṣam āyānti nipāneṣv iva dhenavaḥ //
mā sma śreyaḥ prayaccheyur aṣṭakāyām apūjitāḥ /
moghās tasya bhavanty āśāḥ paratreha ca nityaśaḥ //
devāṃś ca dāyino yānti tiryag gacchanty adāyinaḥ //
puṣṭiṃ prajāṃ smṛtiṃ medhāṃ putrān aiśvaryam eva ca /
kurvāṇaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu sarvaṃ saṃpūrṇam aśnute //
dvitīyāyāṃ tu yaḥ kuryād dvipadādhipatir bhavet //
pañcamyām api kurvāṇaḥ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam /
kurute yas tu saptamyāṃ śrāddhāni satataṃ naraḥ /
pūrṇāṃ vṛttim avāpnoti yo 'ṣṭamyāṃ kurute naraḥ /
śrāddhaṃ navamyāṃ kartavyam aiśvaryaṃ nṛṣu kāṅkṣatā //
kurvan daśamyāṃ tu naro brāhmīṃ śriyam avāpnuyāt /
vedāṃś caivāpnuyāt sarvān viprāṇāṃ saṃmato bhavet //
ekādaśyāṃ paraṃ dānam aiśvaryaṃ saṃtatiṃ tathā /
dvādaśyāṃ jayalābhāya rājyam āyur vasūni ca //
prajāvṛddhiṃ maśūn medhyān svātantryaṃ puṣṭim uttamām /
yuvān astu gṛhe yasya mṛtās teṣāṃ pradāpayet /
śastreṇa vā hatā ye tu teṣāṃ dadyāc caturdaśīm //
amāvāsyāṃ prayatnena śrāddhaṃ kuryāc chuciḥ sadā /
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti svarge cānantyam aśnute //
lokaṃ mānavam āpnoti tatra sarvam samaśnute /
evam āpyāyitaḥ somas trīṃl lokān dhārayiṣyati //
stuvanti devagandharvāḥ siddhasaṃghāś ca taṃ sadā /
pitṛbhaktas tv amāvāsyāṃ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt //
maghāsu kurvañ śrāddhāni sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt /
pratyakṣam arcitās tena bhavanti pitaraḥ sadā /
pitṛdevā maghā yasmāt tasmāt tāsv akṣayaṃ viduḥ //
yamas tu yāni śrāddhāni provāca śaśabindave /
tāni me śṛṇu kāmyāni nakṣatreṣu pṛthak pṛthak //
śrāddhaṃ yaḥ kṛttikāyoge kurvīta satataṃ naraḥ /
durgāṇi tarate nityaṃ dhṛtimān puṣṭimān bhavet /
krūrakarmaṇi bhāgī syād ārdrāyāṃ śrāddham ācaran /
kṣetre putreṣu bhāgī syāc chrāddhaṃ kurvan punarvasau /
body.note: k: T3 subst. for lines 55b-57, T4 ins. after line 55 :k
body.l: ārdrāyāṃ nītimān saumyaḥ puṣṭimāṃś ca punarvasau /
puṣṭikāmaḥ punaḥ puṣye śrāddhaṃ kurvīta mānavaḥ //
āśleṣāsu punar dattvā vīrān putrān avāpnuyāt /
śreṣṭho bhavati bandhūnāṃ maghāsu śrāddham ācaran //
phalgunīṣu punaḥ kṛtvā saubhāgyaṃ labhate naraḥ /
saṃsatsu mukhyo bhavati haste yas tarpayet pitṝn /
citrāyāṃ kurute yas tu putrān rūpavato labhet /
svātinā tu dvijaḥ kuryād vāṇijyena jijīviṣuḥ /
putrārthaṃ tu viśākhāsu śrāddham īheta mānavaḥ //
ādhipatyaṃ labhec chrāddhaṃ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ kurute hi yaḥ //
śravaṇena tu lokeṣu prāpnuyāt paramāṃ gatiṃ /
śrāddhaṃ tv abhijitā kurvan vedān sāṅgān avāpnuyāt /
uttarāsu punaḥ kurvaṃl labhate gāḥ sahasraśaḥ //
revatyāṃ kurute yas tu rūpyaṃ bahu labhen naraḥ /
aśvinīṣu hayāñ śreṣṭhān bharaṇyām āyur uttamam //
imaṃ śrāddhavidhiṃ kurvañ śaśabindur mahīm imām /
akleśenālabhat kṛtsnāṃ labdhvā ca praśaśāsa ha //
rājataṃ rajatāktaṃ vā pitṝṇāṃ pātram ucyate /
rajatasya kathā vāpi darśanaṃ dānam eva ca /
ānantyam akṣayaṃ svargyaṃ rājataṃ dānam ucyate //
pitṝṇāṃ tena dānena satputrās tārayanty uta /
rājate hi svadhā dugdhā pātre 'smin pitṛbhiḥ purā /
akṣayārthaṃ mahī yasmāt tasmin dattam ato 'kṣayam //
kṛṣṇājinasya sāṃnidhyaṃ darśanaṃ dānam eva ca /
rakṣoghnaṃ brahmavarcasyaṃ paśūn putrāṃś ca tārayet //
kāñcanaṃ rājataṃ pātraṃ dauhitraḥ kutapas tilāḥ /
bastaś ca pāvanīyāni tridaṇḍī yoginas tathā //
śrāddhakarmaṇy ayaṃ śreṣṭho vidhir brahman sanātanaḥ /
āyuḥ puṣṭir yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ prajñā saṃtativardhanaḥ //
vakṣyāmi vidhivat sthānaṃ pitṝṇām iti śāstrataḥ /
tatra gartās trayaḥ kāryās trayo daṇḍāś ca khādirāḥ /
payobhyām ājagavyābhyāṃ śodhanaṃ vāgbhir eva ca //
tarpaṇaṃ satataṃ hy etat tṛptir bhavati śāśvatī /
triḥsaptasaṃjñās te yasmāt trailokyaṃ dhāryate hi taiḥ //
tasya puṣṭir athaiśvaryam āyuḥ saṃtatir eva ca /
divi ca bhrājate lakṣmyā mokṣaṃ ca labhate kramāt //
mantraṃ tasmād ahaṃ vakṣye amṛtaṃ brahmasaṃmitam //
devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca mahāyogibhya eva ca /
namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityam eva namo namaḥ //
aśvamedhaphalaṃ hy etad vipraiḥ satkṛtya pūjitam //
pitaraḥ kṣipram āyānti rākṣasāḥ pradravanti ca //
pitryo 'yaṃ triṣu lokeṣu mantro 'yaṃ tārayaty uta /
rājyakāmo japed evaṃ sadā mantram atandritaḥ /
prīyante pitaro yena japena niyamena ca /
pitaraḥ saptarṣīṇāṃ ca tān namasyāmi kāmadān //
tān namaskṛtya sarvān vai pitṝñ jalasamudrayoḥ //
nakṣatrāṇāṃ grahāṇāṃ ca vāyvagnipitaraś ca ye /
body.note: k: T3 ins. after line 133, T4 after line 140 :k
body.l: etac ca vidhinā yuktaḥ śrīmān kuryān narādhipa /
prajāpater gavāṃ vahneḥ somāya ca yamāya ca /
namaḥ pitṛgaṇebhyas saptabhyo ye ca kīrtitāḥ /
pavitraṃ paramaṃ hy etac chrīmad rakṣoghnam eva ca //
etena vidhinā yuktas trīn varāṃl labhate naraḥ /
saptarcaṃ tu japed yas tu nityam eva samāhitaḥ /
yena proktas tv ayaṃ kalpo namas tasmai svayaṃbhuve /
vartante pitaras tāta devānāṃ divi devatāḥ /
saptasv ete sthitā nityaṃ sthāneṣu pitaro 'vyayāḥ //
ādyo gaṇas tu yogīnāṃ sa nityo yogavardhanaḥ //
śeṣās tu varṇināṃ jñeyā iti sarve prakīrtitāḥ //
pitṝn prīṇāti yo bhaktyā pitaraḥ prīṇayanti tam /
yacchanti pitaraḥ prītāḥ prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ tathaiva ca /
svargam āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ yad anyad api vāñchitam //
devatānāṃ hi pitaraḥ pūrvam āyatanaṃ smṛtam //
sthiraprasādāś ca sadā tān namasyasva bhārgava //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 5, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of March 1, 2001 :h
k: K2.4 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-3.5.6 T G ins. appendix I, No. 5 after 15.65, K1.3 D4 after 15.68 :k
body.l: andhaṃ cakāra gāṅgeya jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ purā vibho //
ciroṣitā gṛhe cāpi kimarthaṃ caiva tasya sā /
cakāra vipriyam idaṃ tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ //
pūjanīyā cakārāsau kiṃ sakhyaṃ tena caiva ha /
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ prabravīhi yathātatham //
śṛṇu sarvaṃ mahārāja yathā vṛttam abhūt purā /
kācic chakuntikā rājan brahmadattasya vai sakhī /
tasyāḥ kulāyam abhavad gehe tasya narottama //
sā sadāhani nirgatya tasya rājño gṛhottamāt /
caritvā teṣu sā rājan niśi kāmpilyam āgamat /
rājñā tena sadā rājan kathāyogaṃ cakāra sā //
āścaryāṇi ca sarvāṇi yāni vṛttāni kānicit /
carantī vividhān deśān kathayām āsa sā niśi //
pūjanīyā ca sā tasmin prasūtāṇḍam athāpi ca /
tasmin nīḍe purā hy ekaṃ śakalāt prāsphuṭat tadā //
cakṣuṣmān apy abhūt paścād īṣat pakṣotthitaś ca ha //
ājahāra sadā sāyaṃ cañcvā nṛpa phaladvayam /
sa bālo brahmadattasya pūjanīyāsutaś ca ha /
te phale bhakṣayitvā ca pṛṭhukau tau mudā yutau /
abhūtāṃ nityam eveha svadatāṃ caiva te phale //
tasyāṃ gatāyām atha ca pūjanīyāṃ sadāhani /
śiśunā caṭakenātha dhātrī taṃ tu śiśuṃ nṛpa /
nīḍāt tadā samākṛṣya pūjanīyā gatā yadā /
krīḍatā rājaputreṇa kadācic caṭakaḥ sa tu //
durbhaṅgamuṣṭinā rājann asūn sadyas tv ajījahat //
taṃ tu pañcatvam āpannaṃ vyāttāsyaṃ bālaghātitam /
dhātrīṃ tasya jagarhe tāṃ tadāśruparamo nṛpaḥ /
tasthau śokānvito rājā śocaṃs taṃ caṭakaṃ nṛpa //
mumoha dṛṣṭvā svaṃ putraṃ punaḥ saṃjñām athālabhat /
labdhasaṃjñā ca sā rājan vilalāpa tapasvinī //
nanu tvam āgatāṃ putra vāśantīṃ parisarpasi /
śoṇena tālunā putra kasmād adya na sarpasi //
pakṣābhyāṃ māṃ pariṣvajya nanu cañcvāpi cāpy aham /
cīcīkūcīti vāśantaṃ tvām adya na śṛṇomi kim //
manoratho yas tu mama paśyeyaṃ putrakaṃ kadā /
vyāttāsyaṃ vāri yācantaṃ sphurat pakṣaṃ mamāgrataḥ /
sa me manoratho bhagnas tvayi pañcatvam āgate //
nanu mūrdhābhiṣiktas tvaṃ dharmān vetsi sanātanān //
kathaṃ mamānena sutaṃ dhātryā ghātitavān asi /
nanu nūnaṃ śrutā te 'bhūd iyam āṅgirasī śrutiḥ /
śaraṇāgataḥ kṣudhārtaś ca śatrubhiś cāpy upadrutaḥ /
ciroṣitaś ca svagṛhe pātavyaḥ sarvato bhavet //
katham asya havir devā gṛhṇanti pitaraḥ svadhām //
śokārtā tasya bālasya cakṣuṣī nirbibheda sā //
karābhyāṃ rājaputrasya tatas tac cakṣur asphuṭam /
atha rājā sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūjanīyām uvāca ha /
viśokā bhava kalyāṇi kṛtaṃ te bhīru śobhanam //
gataśokā nivartasva ajaryaṃ sakhyam astu te /
pureva sakhi bhadraṃ te nivartasva ramasva ca //
putrapīḍābhavaś cāpi na kopaḥ paramas tvayi /
mamāsti sakhi bhadraṃ te kartavyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tvayā //
na cāhaṃ vastum icchāmi tava putram acakṣuṣam /
gāthāś cāpy uśanogītā imāḥ śṛṇu mayeritāḥ //
kumitraṃ ca kudeśaṃ ca kurājānaṃ kusauhṛdam /
kuputraṃ ca kubhāryāṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet //
kumitre sauhṛdaṃ nāsti kubhāryāyāṃ kuto ratiḥ /
kutaḥ piṇḍaḥ kuputre tu nāsti satyaṃ kurājani //
kusauhṛde kva viśvāsaḥ kudeśe na prajīvyate /
anātho durbalo yadvan na ciraṃ sa tu jīvati //
na viśvased aviśvas te viśvas te nāpi viśvaset /
viśvāsād bhayaṃ utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati //
yaḥ karoti naro mūḍho na ciraṃ sa tu jīvati //
abhyunnatiṃ prāpya nṛpaḥ prāvāraṃ kīṭako yathā /
sa vinaśyed asaṃdeham āhaivam uśanā nṛpa //
ariṃ nāśayate nityaṃ yathā vallī mahādrumam //
mṛdū raudraḥ kṛśo bhūtvā śanaiḥ saṃlīyate ripuḥ /
valmīka iva vṛkṣasya paścān mūlaṃ nikṛntati //
adrohaṃ samayaṃ kṛtvā munīnām agrato hariḥ /
jaghāna namuciṃ paścād apāṃ phenena pārthiva //
suptaṃ mattaṃ pramattaṃ vā ghātayanti ripuṃ narāḥ /
viṣeṇa vahninā vāpi śastreṇāpy atha māyayā //
naiva śeṣaṃ prakurvanti punar vairabhayān narāḥ /
ghātayanti samūlaṃ hi śrutvemām upamāṃ nṛpa //
śatroḥ śeṣaṃ ṛṇāc cheṣaṃ śeṣam agneś ca bhūmipa /
punar vardheta saṃbhūya tasmāc cheṣaṃ na śeṣayet //
hasate jalpate vairī ekapātre ca bhuñjate /
ekāsanaṃ cārohati smarate tac ca kilbiṣam //
kṛtvā saṃbandhakaṃ cāpi viśvasec chatruṇā na hi /
nidhāya manasā vairaṃ priyaṃ vaktīha yo naraḥ /
upasarpen na taṃ prājñaḥ kuraṅga iva lubdhakam //
na cāsanne nivastavyaṃ savaire vardhite ripau /
pātayet taṃ samūlaṃ hi nadītīra iva drumam //
ity etā uśanogītā gāthā dhāryā vipaścitā /
mayā ca kilbiṣaṃ tubhyaṃ prayuktam atidāruṇam /
putram andhaṃ prakurvantyā tasmān no viśvase tvayi /
ity etat te mayākhyātaṃ purābhūtam idaṃ nṛpa /
śrāddhaṃ ca pṛcchase yan māṃ yudhiṣṭhira mahāmate //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 6, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h
k: K2.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 G(ed.) ins. after 21.10; K1 after 22.1ab; K3 after adhy. 21. K1 reads lines 1-2 for the first time after 21.10. :k
body.l: gandharvī urvaśī devī rājāṇaṃ manuṣaṃ katham /
devān utsṛjya saṃprāptā tan me brūhi bahuśruta //
svāgataṃ te varārohe āsyatāṃ karavāma kim /
saṃramasva mayā sārdhaṃ ratir nau śāśvatīḥ samāḥ /
elaṃ tu sā varārohā samayāt samupasthitā //
evaṃ sā hy uṣitā tatra śāpasyāntam abhīpsatī /
ātmanaḥ śāpamokṣārthaṃ samayaṃ sā cakāra ha /
etāv uraṇakau rājan nyāsau rakṣasva mānada /
saṃraṃsye bhavatā sākaṃ ślāghya strīṇāṃ varaḥ smṛtaḥ /
dvau meṣau śayanābhyāse sadā baddhau ca tiṣṭhataḥ /
ghṛtamātraṃ tathāhāraḥ kalām ekaṃ tu pārthiva //
yady eṣa samayo rājan yāvatkālaṃ ca te dṛḍham /
tadā tavaiva saṃyogo mayā saha bhaviṣyati /
eṣa te samayo rājan vastuṃ tava gṛhe kṛtaḥ /
tāvatkālaṃ tu vatsyāmi kṛtaḥ samaya eṣa naḥ //
tasyās taṃ samayaṃ sarvaṃ sa rājā samapālayat /
ko na seveta manujo devīṃ tvāṃ svayam āgatām /
evaṃ sā vasate tatra purūravasi bhāvinī /
apaśyann urvaśīm indro gandharvān abravīt tadā /
cintayadhvaṃ mahābhāgā yathā sā tu varāṅganā /
tato viśvāvasur nāma tatrāha vadatāṃ varaḥ /
mayā tu samayas tābhyāṃ kriyamāṇaḥ śrutaḥ purā //
vyutkrāntasamayan sā vai rājānaṃ tyakṣyate yathā /
tad ahaṃ vedmy aśeṣeṇa yathā bhetsyaty asau nṛpaḥ //
evam uktvā gatas tatra pratiṣṭhānaṃ mahāyaśāḥ //
niśāyām atha cāgamya meṣam ekaṃ jahāra saḥ /
mātṛvad vartate sā tu meṣayoś cāruhāsinī //
rājānam abravīt tatra putro me 'hriyateti sā //
nagnaṃ māṃ drakṣyate devī samayo vitatho bhavet //
tato bhūyas tu gandharvā dvitīyaṃ meṣam ādaduḥ /
dvitīye tu hṛte meṣe elaṃ devy abravīd idam //
putrau me hriyate rājann anāthāyā iva prabho /
yadviśrambhād ahaṃ naṣṭā hatāpatyā ca dasyubhiḥ /
yaḥ śete niśi saṃtrasto yathā nārī divā pumān /
evam uktas tadotthāya nagno rājā pradhāvitaḥ //
meṣayoḥ padam anvicchan gandharvair vidyud apy atha /
utpāditā sumahatī yayā tad bhavanaṃ mahat /
prakāśitaṃ vai sahasā tato nagnam avaikṣata //
nagnaṃ dṛṣṭvā tirobhūtā gandharvī hy agamad divam //
body.note: k: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V1.3 Dn Ds D6 T4 ins. :k
body.l: tirobhūtāṃ tu tāṃdṛṣṭvā gandharvā hy agaman divam /
tirobhūtāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā gandharvās tatratāv ubhau /
utsṛjya meṣau śīghram tu yathākāmaṃ yayus tataḥ /
utsṛṣṭau coraṇau dṛṣṭvā rājā gṛhyāgato gṛham /
cacāra pṛthivīṃ caiva mārgamāṇa itas tataḥ //
athāpaśyat sa tāṃ rājā kurukṣetre mahābalaḥ /
sa tāṃ vīkṣya kurukṣetre sarasvatyāś ca tatsakhīḥ /
aho jāye jāye tiṣṭha ghore na tyaktum arhasi /
māṃ tvam aprāpya nirvṛttiṃ vacāṃsi kṛṇavāmahe //
sudeho 'yaṃ patatv adya devi dūraṃ gatas tvayā /
svādanty enaṃ vṛkā gṛdhrās tvatprasādasya nāspadam /
krīḍantīṃ apsarobhiś ca pañcabhiḥ saha śobhanām /
tāṃ krīḍantīṃ tato dṛṣṭvā vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ //
sā cāpi tatra taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānam avidūrataḥ /
urvaśī tāḥ sakhīḥ prāha sa eṣa puruṣottamaḥ /
yasminn aham avātsaṃ vai darśayām āsa taṃ nṛpam //
samāvignās tu tāḥ sarvāḥ punar eva narādhipaḥ /
jāye ha tiṣṭha manasi ghore vacasi tiṣṭha he /
urvaśī cābravīd ailaṃ sagarbhāhaṃ tvayā vibho /
saṃvatsarāt kumāras te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
niśām ekāṃ ca nṛpate nivatsyasi mayā saha //
hṛṣṭo jagāma rājāt sa svapuraṃ sumahāyaśāḥ /
gate saṃvatsare bhūya urvaśī punar āgamat //
uṣitaś ca tayā sārdham ekarātraṃ mahāyaśāḥ //
urvaśy athābravīd ailaṃ gandharvā varadās tava /
tān vṛṇīṣva mahārāja brūhi caitāṃs tvam eva ha //
tathety uktvā varaṃ vavre gandharvāś ca tahāstv iti //
sthālīṃ nyasya vane gatvā gṛham abhyāyayau niśi /
pūrayitvāgninā sthālīṃ gandharvāś ca tam abruvan /
aneneṣṭvā salokān naḥ prāpsyasi tvaṃ narādhipa //
nikṣipyāgnim araṇye tu saputras tu gṛhaṃ yayau //
abhyetyāgniṃ tu nāpaśyad aśvatthaṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān /
śamījātaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā aśvatthaṃ vismitas tataḥ //
gandharvebhyas tadāśaṃsad agnināśaṃ tatas tu saḥ /
śrutvā tam artham akhilam araṇīṃ tu samādiśan //
mathitāgniṃ tridhā kṛtvā ayajat sa narādhipaḥ /
iṣṭvā yajñair bahuvidhair gatas teṣāṃ salokatām //
body.note: k: K2 B1.3 Ds for lines 69-70 subst. :k
body.l: teneṣṭvā tu sa tāṃl lokān prāptavān sa narādhipaḥ /
eko 'gniḥ pūrvam evāsīd ailas tretām akārayat /
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 6A, transliterated by Sandra Smets :h
body.l: niṣkṛtiḥ kīdṛśī dṛṣṭā tan me brūhi mahāmate /
kīdṛśo brāhmaṇo loke svarūpaṃ tad vadasva me //
kavyāni caiva pitaraḥ kiṃ bhūtā adhikaṃ tataḥ //
brāhmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jātaḥ saṃskṛto brāhmaṇo bhavet /
dānaṃ pratigrahaś ceti ṣaṭ karmāṇy agrajanmanām //
vedam eva sadābhyāset tapas taptaṃ (pyed??) dvijottamaḥ /
vedābhyāso hi viprasya tapaḥ param ihocyate //
śrotā caivānyathā cet syān narakāyaiva kalpate //
pāṭhamātrāvasānas tu paṅke gaur iva sīdati //
nāmadheyaṃ daśamyāṃ tu dvādaśyām atha kārayet //
prāpte tu pañcame varṣe tv akṣarābhyāsam ucyate //
brāhmaṇo bilvapālāśau daṇḍau vā dhārayeta saḥ /
guruṃ raviṃ samabhyarcya bhaikṣeta niyataḥ śuciḥ //
saṃbhāvayati cānnena sa vipro gurur ucyate //
upanīya tu yaḥ śiṣyaṃ vedam adhyāpayeta tam /
ekadeśaṃ tu vedasya vedāṅgāny api vā punaḥ /
sahasraṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ tu caibhyo mātā garīyasī //
snāyīta tadanujñāto dattvāsmai dakṣiṇāṃ hi gām //
bandhuhīnāṃ ca yāṃ kanyāṃ rogiṇīṃ ca parityajet //
brāhme muhūrte cotthāya hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
nairṛte dakṣiṇe bhāge tṛṇam ācchādya vai punaḥ /
loṣṭaiś ca lepanaṃ kṛtvā śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathāvidhi //
mṛdbhiḥ śodhya gude pādau pāṇau gaṇḍūṣam ācaret /
ācamya prayato bhūtvā tataḥ snānaṃ samācaret //
dhyātvotthāya tataḥ kuryād ardhyaṃ sūryāya bhūmipa //
mūhūrte kusumādīni hṛtvā gacchet tam īśvaram //
kṛtvā puruṣasūktaiś ca harim aṣṭākṣareṇa ca //
upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ homaṃ kuryād atandritaḥ //
śreṣṭhās te brāhmaṇā loke dānapātraṃ sadā matam //
prathamaṃ tu gurordānaṃ dadyāc chraiṣṭhyaṃ ca sarvadā /
mātāpitroś ca yad dattaṃ bhrātṛsvasṛsutāsu ca //
pituḥ śataguṇaṃ dānaṃ sahasraṃ mātur ucyate //
dāne tu kavyabhojye ca dahaty āsaptamaṃ kulam //
dviguṇaṃ brāhmaṇe dadyāt samaṃ tu brāhmaṇabruve /
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 6B, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h
k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 cont. after No. 6; G(ed.) after No. 6A :k
body.l: divi jātā mahātmāna āyur dhīmān amāvasuḥ /
body.note: k: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D4-6 T G M4 ins. (= 21.10*322) :k
body.l: dṛḍhāyuś ca vanāyuś ca śatāyuś corvaśīsutāḥ //
amāvasos tu dāyādo bhīmo rājātha rājarāṭ /
necchataḥ plāvayām āsa tasya gaṅgā ca tat sadaḥ //
sa tayā plāvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā yajñavāṭaṃ samantataḥ /
eṣa te triṣu lokeṣu saṃkṣipyāpaḥ pibāmy aham /
rājarṣiṇā tataḥ pītāṃ gaṅgāṃ dṛṣṭvā maharṣayaḥ /
yuvanāśvasya putrīṃ tu kāverīṃ jahnur āvahat //
kāverīṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ jahnor bhāryām aninditām //
jahnus tu dayitaṃ putraṃ sumahaṃ nāma dhārmikam /
kāveryāṃ janayām āsa ajakas tasya cātmajaḥ //
kuśikaḥ kuśanābhaś ca kuśāmbo mūrtimāṃs tathā /
pahlavaiḥ saha saṃvṛddho rājā vanacaraih saha //
kuśikas tu tapas tepe putram indrasamaṃ vibhuḥ /
labheyam iti taṃ śakras trāsād abhyetya jajñivān //
pūrṇe varṣasahasre vai taṃ tu śakro hy apaśyata /
putratve kalpayām āsa devendraḥ sa surottamaḥ //
sa gādhir abhavad rājā maghavān kauśikaḥ svayam /
paurukutsy abhavad bhāryā gādhis tasyām ajāyata //
viśvāmitraś ca gādheyo rājā viśvarathaś ca ha /
viśvakṛd viśvajic caiva tathā satyavatī nṛpa //
purvaṃ kanyā mahābhāgā nāmnā satyavatī śubhā /
varaṃ visadṛśaṃ matvā gādhir bhārgavam abravīt /
sahasraṃ dīyatāṃ śulkaṃ kanyāyāḥ kuśikā vayam //
ity uktas tanmataṃ matvā gataḥ sa varuṇāntakaṃ /
ānīya dattvā tān aśvān upayeme varānanām /
tāṃ gādhiḥ kāvyaputrāya ṛcīkāya dadau prabhuḥ //
sa ṛṣiḥ prārthitaḥ patnyā mātre cāpatyakāmyayā /
śrapayitvobhayair mantraiś caruṃ snātuṃ gato muniḥ /
putrārthaṃ kalpayām āsa caruṃ gādhes tathaiva ca //
uvācāhūya tāṃ bhārtā ṛcīko bhārgavas tadā /
upayojyaś carur ayaṃ tvayā mātrā tv ayaṃ tava //
evam uktvā tu tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhṛgunandanaḥ /
tapasy abhirato nityam araṇyaṃ praviveśa ha //
gādhiḥ sadāras tu tadā ṛcīkāśramam abhyagāt /
carudvayaṃ gṛhītvā tad ṛṣeḥ satyavatī tadā /
carum ādāya yatnena sā tu mātre nyavedayat //
mātā vyatyasya daivena duhitre svacaruṃ dadau /
tasyāś carum athājñānād ātmasaṃsthaṃ cakāra ha //
tām ṛcīkas tato dṛṣṭvā yogenābhyanusṛtya ca /
tām abravīd dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ svāṃ bhāryāṃ varavarṇinīm //
viśvaṃ hi brahma tapasā mayā tasmin samarpitam //
evam uktā mahābhāgā bhartrā satyavatī tadā /
prasādayām āsa patiṃ putro me nedṛśo bhavet /
brāhmaṇāpasadas tvatta ity ukto munir abravīt //
naiṣa saṃkalpitaḥ kāmo mayā bhadre tathāstv iti /
ugrakarmā bhavet putraḥ pitur mātuś ca kāraṇāt //
punaḥ satyavatī vākyam evam uktvābravīd idam /
icchaṃl lokān api mune sṛjethāḥ kiṃ punaḥ sutam /
śamātmakam ṛjuṃ tvaṃ me putraṃ dātum ihārhasi //
kāmam evaṃvidhaḥ pautro mama syāt tava ca prabho /
yady anyathā na śakyaṃ vai kartum etad dvijottama //
tataḥ prasādam akarot sa tasyās tapaso balāt /
putre nāsti viśeṣo me pautre ca varavarṇini /
tvayā yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ tathā bhadre bhaviṣyati //
tataḥ satyavatī putraṃ janayām āsa bhārgavam /
tasya kanyā mahābhāgā kāmalī nāma reṇukā //
viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā nāmnā viśvarathaḥ smṛtaḥ /
gādher abhūn mahātejāḥ samiddha iva pāvakaḥ /
tapasā kṣatram utsṛjya yo lebhe brahmavarcasam //
madhyamas tu madhucchandā madhucchandāsa eva te /
prakhyātās triṣu lokeṣu teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu //
devaśravāḥ katiś caiva yasmāt kātyāyanāḥ smṛtāḥ /
sāṃkṛtir gālavaś caiva mudgalaś ceti viśrutaḥ /
kacchapo hāritaś caiva viśvāmitrasya vai sutāḥ /
pālito babhravaś caiva karajapyas tathaiva ca /
lohityā yamadūtāś ca tathā kārīṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
bhārgavaḥ kauśikatvaṃ hi prāptaḥ sa munisattamaḥ //
yo vai hariścandramakhe vikrītaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ /
yo rāto devayajane devair gādhiṣu tāpasaḥ /
devarāta iti khyāta śunaḥśephas tu bhārgavaḥ /
devair dattaḥ śunaḥśepo viśvāmitrāya vai punaḥ /
putraṃ kṛtvā śunaḥṣephaṃ devarātaṃ ca bhārgavam /
ājīgartaṃ sutān āha jyeṣṭha eṣa prakalpatām //
ye madhucchandaso jyeṣṭhāḥ kuśalaṃ menire na tat /
aśapat tān muniḥ kruddho mlecchā bhavata durjanāḥ //
yan no bhavān vijānīto tasmiṃs tiṣṭhāmahe vayam //
jyeṣṭhaṃ mantradṛśāṃ cakrus tvām anvañco vayaṃ smasi /
devair dattaḥ sa vai yasmād devarātas tato 'bhavat //
aṣṭakasya suto lauhiḥ prokto jahnugaṇo mayā /
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi vaṃśam āyor mahātmanaḥ //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 7, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of July 8, 2001 :h
k: K2.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. Appendix I, No. 7 after adhyāya 21, K1.3 after the first occurrence of 21.11 :k
body.l: rambho napatyas tatrāsīd vaṃśaṃ vakṣyāmy anenasaḥ /
sṛñjayasya jayaḥ putro vijayas tasya cātmajaḥ //
vijayasya kṛtiḥ putras tasya haryaśvataḥ sutaḥ /
kāśaḥ śalaś ca dvāv etau tathā gṛtsamadaḥ prabhuḥ /
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāḥ śūdrās tathaiva ca /
śalātmajaś ca cārṣṭiceṇas tanayas tasya kāśyakaḥ //
kāśyasya kāsyayo rājan putro dīrghatamās tathā /
dhanvas tu dīrghatamaso vidvān dhanvantariḥ sutaḥ //
tapaso nte sumahato jāto vṛddhasya dhīmataḥ /
punar dhanvantarir devo mānuṣeṣv iha jajñivān //
kathaṃ dhanvantarir devo mānuṣeṣv iha jajñivān /
etad veditum icchāmi tvatto brūhi yathātatham //
sa saṃbhūtaḥ samudrāt tu mathyamāne mṛte purā //
utpannaḥ kalaśāt pūrvaṃ sarvataś ca śriyā vṛtaḥ /
sadyaḥsaṃsiddhakāryaṃ hi viṣṇur dṛṣṭvā hi tasthivān //
abjas tvam iti hovāca tasmād abjas tu sa smṛtaḥ /
abjaḥ provāca viṣṇuṃ vai tava putro smi vai prabho /
vidhatsva bhāgaṃ sthānaṃ ca mama loke sureśvara //
evam uktaḥ sa dṛṣṭvā vai tathyaṃ provāca taṃ prabhuḥ /
kṛto yajñavibhāgo hi yajñiyair hi suraiḥ saha //
deveṣu viniyuktaṃ hi viddhi hotraṃ maharṣibhiḥ /
na śakyam upahomo vai tubhyaṃ kartu kathaṃcana /
na śakyam iha vai kartuṃ mayā tubhyaṃ kathaṃcana /
arvāgbhūto si devānāṃ putra tvaṃ tu na hīśvaraḥ //
dvitīyāyāṃ tu saṃbhūtyāṃ loke khyātiṃ gamiṣyasi /
aṇimādiś ca te siddhir garbhasthasya bhaviṣyati //
tenaiva tvaṃ śarīreṇa devatvaṃ prāpsyase prabho /
carumantrair vratair jāpyair yakṣyanti tvāṃ dvijātayaḥ //
aṣṭadhā tvaṃ punaś caiva āyurvedaṃ vidhāsyasi /
avaśyaṃbhāvī hy artho yaṃ prāgdṛṣṭas tv abjayoninā //
dvitīyaṃ dvāparaṃ prāpya bhavitā tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
imaṃ tasmai varaṃ dattvā viṣṇur antardadhe punaḥ //
dvitīye dvāpare prāpte saunahotriḥ sa kāśirāṭ /
putrakāmas tapas tepe dhanvo dīrghaṃ mahat tadā //
prapadye devatāṃ tāṃ tu yā me putraṃ pradāsyati /
abjaṃ devaṃ sa putrārthe tad ārādhitavān nṛpa //
tatas tuṣṭaḥ sa bhagavān abjaḥ provāca taṃ nṛpam /
yad icchasi varaṃ sarvaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvrata //
bhagavan yadi tuṣṭas tvaṃ putro me khyātimān bhavet /
tasya gehe samutpanno devo dhanvantaris tadā /
tam aṣṭadhā punar vyasya śiṣyebhyaḥ pratyapādayat //
dhanvantares tu tanayaḥ ketumān iti viśrutaḥ /
atha ketumataḥ putro vīro bhīmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ //
etasminn eva kāle tu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ nṛpaḥ /
śūnyāṃ niveśayām āsa kṣemako nāma rākṣasaḥ //
śaptā hi sā matimatā nikumbhena mahātmanā /
śūnyā varṣasahasraṃ vai bhavitrīti na saṃśayaḥ //
body.note: k: K1 (marg.) Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D5.6 T2 G1-3.5 ins. :k
body.l: bhadraśreṇyasya pūrvaṃ tu purī vārāṇasīty abhūt /
bhadraśreṇyasya tad rājyaṃ hṛtaṃ tena balīyasā //
vārāṇasīṃ nikumbhas tu kimarthaṃ śaptavān prabhuḥ /
nikumbhaḥ kaś ca dharmātmā siddhikṣetraṃ śaśāpa yaḥ //
kāraṇaṃ tad aśeṣeṇa vada tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara /
divodāsas tu rājarṣir nagaraṃ prāpya pārthiva /
vasati sma mahātejāḥ sphītāyāṃ tu narādhipaḥ //
etasminn eva kāle tu kṛtadāro maheśvaraḥ /
devājñayā pārṣadā ye tv abhirūpās tapodhanāḥ /
pūrvoktai rūpaveṣaś ca toṣayanti sma pārvatīm //
hṛṣyate vai mahādevī menā naiva prahṛṣyati /
jugupsaty asakṛt taṃ vai devadevaṃ tathaiva ha //
sapārṣadas tv anācāras tava bhartā maheśvaraḥ /
daridraḥ sarvadaivāsau śīlaṃ tasya na vartate //
mātrā tathoktā varadā strīsvabhāvān na cukruve /
smitaṃ kṛtvā tu varadā bhavapārśvam athāgamat //
neha vatsyāmy ahaṃ deva naya māṃ svaṃ niveśanam //
tathā kartuṃ mahādevaḥ sarvāṃl lokān avaikṣata /
divodāsena tāṃ jñātvā niviṣṭāṃ nagarīṃ bhavaḥ //
pārśve tiṣṭhan tam āhūya nikumbham idam abravīt /
gaṇeśvara purīṃ gatvā śūnyāṃ vārāṇasīṃ kuru /
tato gatvā nikumbhas tu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ tadā /
svapne nidarśayām āsa kaṇṭakaṃ nāma nāpitam /
śreyas te haṃ kariṣyāmi sthānaṃ me racayānagha //
madrūpāṃ pratimāṃ kṛtvā nagaryante tathaiva ca /
tataḥ svapne yathoddiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ kāritavān nṛpa /
purīdvāre tu vijñāpya rājānaṃ tu yathāvidhi /
pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ tasya nityam eva prayojayat //
gandhaiś ca dhūpamālyaiś ca prokṣaṇīyais tathaiva ca /
evaṃ saṃpūjyate tatra nityam eva gaṇeśvaraḥ /
putrān hiraṇyam āyuś ca sarvān kāmāṃs tathaiva ca //
rājñas tu mahiṣī śreṣṭhā suyaśā nāma viśrutā /
putrārtham āgatā devī sādhvī rājñā pracoditā //
pūjāṃ tu vipulāṃ kṛtvā devī putram ayācata /
na prayacchati putraṃ hi nikumbhaḥ kāraṇena hi /
rājā tu yadi saṃkruddhaḥ kāryasiddhis tato bhavet //
atha dīrgheṇa kālena krodho rājānam āviśat /
prīto varānnaiḥ śataśo mama kiṃ na prayacchati /
māmakaiḥ pūjyate nityaṃ nagaryāṃ mama caiva hi //
vijñāpito mamārthaṃ vai devyā me putrakāraṇāt /
na dadāti ca putraṃ me kṛtaghnaḥ kena hetunā //
tasmāt tu nāśayiṣyāmi sthānam asya durātmanaḥ //
evaṃ sa tu viniścitya durātmā rājakilbiṣī /
sthānaṃ gaṇapates tasya nāśayām āsa durmatiḥ /
bhagnam āyatanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānam aśapat prabhuḥ //
pury akasmād iyaṃ śūnyā tava nūnaṃ bhaviṣyati //
tatas tena tu śāpena śūnyā vārāṇasī tadā /
śaptvā purīṃ nikumbhas tāṃ mahādevam athāgamat //
akasmāc ca purī sā tu vidrutā sarvatodiśam /
tasyāṃ puryāṃ tato devo nirmame padam ātmanaḥ /
ramate tatra vai devo ramamāṇo gireḥ sutām //
na ratiṃ tatra vai devī labhate gṛhavismayāt /
vasāmy atra na puryāṃ tu devī devam athābravīt //
nāhaṃ veśma vimokṣyāmi avimuktaṃ hi me gṛham /
nāhaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi gaccha devi gṛhaṃ prati //
tasmāt tad avimuktaṃ hi proktaṃ devena vai svayam /
evaṃ vārāṇasī śaptā avimuktaṃ ca kīrtitam //
yugeṣu triṣu dharmātmā saha devyā maheśvaraḥ //
antardhānaṃ kalau yāti tatpuraṃ hi mahātmanaḥ /
antarhite pure tasmin purī tu vasate punaḥ /
evaṃ vārāṇasī śaptā niveśaṃ punar āgatā //
bhadraśreṇyasya putro vai durdamo nāma viśrutaḥ /
haihayasya tu dāyādyaṃ kṛtavān vai mahīpatiḥ /
tena putreṇa bālena prahṛtaṃ tasya vai punaḥ //
body.note: k: Ñ3 V1 B1.3 Ds subst. :k
body.l: tena bālena dāyādyaṃ pragṛhītaṃ punas tadā /
evaṃ pratardano rājā brahmajñaḥ saṃbabhūva ha /
sa eva śatrujid vīra ṛtadhvaja itīritaḥ /
vatsaputro hy alarkas tu saṃnatis tasya cātmajaḥ //
alarko nāma putras tu rājā saṃnatimān bhuvi /
aṣṭāratho nāma nṛpaḥ suto bhīmarathasya vai /
alarkaṃ prati rājarṣiṃ śloko gītaḥ purātanaiḥ //
alarkād aparo nānyo bubhuje medinīm imām /
ramyāṃ niveśayām āsa purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ punaḥ //
saṃnater api dāyādaḥ sunītho nāma dhārmikaḥ /
sunīthasya tu dāyādaḥ kṣemo nāma mahāyaśāḥ //
kṣemasya ketumān putraḥ suketus tasya cātmajaḥ /
ānartas tu vibhoḥ putraḥ sukumāraś ca tatsutaḥ /
vatsasya vatsabhūmiś ca bhṛgubhūmis tu bhārgavāt //
ete tv aṅgirasaḥ putrā jātā vaṃśe tha bhārgave /
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ striyaḥ putrāḥ sahasraśaḥ //
ity ete kāśayaḥ proktā nahuṣasya nibodhata //
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No. 8, transliterated by Peter Schreiner, 17.9.1988, version of March 5, 2002. :h
k: After 47.52, all Mss. (except M1--3) G(ed.) ins. App.I No. 8: :k
body.l: jayā ca vijayā caiva puṣṭiś ca tvaṃ kṣamā dayā /
parvatāgreṣu ghoreṣu nadīṣu ca guhāsu ca /
śabarair barbaraiś caiva pulindaiś ca supūjitā /
kukkuṭaiś chāgalair meṣaiḥ siṃhair vyāghraiḥ samākulā /
āvāsaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ niṣṭhā ca paramā gatiḥ //
cīravāsāḥ suvāsāś ca raudrī saṃdhyā tvam eva ca //
sāvitrī cāpi devānāṃ mātā bhūtagaṇasya ca /
antarvedī ca yajñānām ṛtvijāṃ caiva dakṣiṇā //
yakṣāṇāṃ prathamā yakṣī nāgānāṃ suraseti ca //
body.note: k: Ñ2.3 V B2 Dn Ds1 D4.5 ins. after line 24; D2 T4 after line 21 :k
body.l: kanyānāṃ brahmacaryā ca saubhāgyaṃ pramadāsu ca /
brahmavādiny atho dīkṣā śobhā ca paramā tathā /
jyotiṣāṃ tvaṃ prabhā devi nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca rohiṇī //
pūrṇe ca pūrṇimācandre kṛttivāsā iti smṛtā //
sarasvatī ca vālmīkeḥ smṛtir dvaipāyane tathā /
suradevī ca bhūteṣu stūyase tvaṃ svakarmabhiḥ //
ṛṣīṇāṃ dharmabuddhis tu devānām aditis tathā //
karṣakānāṃ ca sīteti bhūtānāṃ dharaṇīti ca /
tāpasānāṃ ca devī tvam araṇī cāgnihotriṇām //
kṣudhā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ tṛptis tvaṃ ca divaukasām /
svāhā tuṣṭir dhṛtir medhā vasūnāṃ tvaṃ vasūmatī //
āśā tvaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu tuṣṭiś ca kṛtakarmaṇām /
diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva tathā hy agniśikhā prabhā //
śakunī pūtanā ca tvaṃ revatī ca sudāruṇā /
nidrā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ mohanī kṣatriyā tathā //
vidyānāṃ brahmavidyā tvam oṃkāro 'stha vaṣaṭ tathā /
nārīṇāṃ pārvatī ca tvaṃ paurāṇīm ṛṣayo viduḥ //
body.note: k: K2 V2 B Ds D4 subst. for one 43; Ñ2 ins. after 44 :k
body.l: tvayā vyāptam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṃgamam //
pravāse rājabandhe ca śatrūṇāṃ ca pramardane /
prāṇātyayeṣu sarveṣu tvaṃ hi rakṣā na saṃśayaḥ //
tvayi me hṛdayaṃ devi tvayi buddhir manas tvayi /
rakṣa māṃ sarvapāpebhyaḥ prasādaṃ ca kariṣyasi //
yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ //
tribhiś ca kāṅkṣitaṃ māsaiḥ phalaṃ vai saṃprayacchati /
ṣadbhir māsair variṣṭhaṃ tu varam ekaṃ prayacchati //
body.note: k: For line 55, B3 Ds T3.4 subst. :k
body.l: ṣaṇmāsān paṭhate yas tu kāṅkṣitaṃ ca labheta saḥ /
asrcitā navabhir māsair divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prayacchati /
satyaṃ ca brahmacaryaṃ ca dvaipāyanavaco yathā //
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No. 9, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner. :h
k: After 51.12, D6,T,G,M4,G(ed.) ins. App.I No. 9. :k
body.l: kvacid veśmani nirgatya navanītaṃ ca gṛhṇataḥ /
saṃkṣobhya takraṃ bahuśo dārakau dārakaiḥ saha /
anvabhūtām tato rājan ghaṭāṃś ca parijaghnatuḥ /
dadhi pītvā tu deveśau tān ghaṭāṃś ca pipeṣatuḥ /
bhittvā chittvā ca govindaḥ papau kṣīrāṇi sarvaśaḥ /
tac chiṣṭaṃ caiva deveśaḥ kṣitau ca samavākṣipat /
pāyasaṃ ca samānīya gṛhād anyatra vikṣipan /
dārakhebhyas tadā kṛṣṇo dadau svaṃ ca samācaran /
śikyāc ca ghaṭam ādāya dadhnāṃ dārakasattamaḥ /
nirbhidyācchidya bhūmau tu niṣpapeṣa sa keśavaḥ //
dārakau tau tu sahasā vatsānāṃ ca paraṃtapa /
dāmnāṃ vimocanaṃ kṛtvā vatsān dhenūr apāyatām /
prativeśma tadā tau tu vyasanaṃ paryakurvatām /
na ca śakto vārayituṃ nandagopaḥ sudurmadau /
tatas tu dārakaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣṇaś cakṣuś ca tadgatam /
ekasya tu tadā kṛṣṇo dārakasya mahīpate /
pracchādya tarasānyaṃ tu dārakaṃ pratyuvāca ha /
gaccha vatsa yathānyatra tathā dṛṣṭaiś ca dārakaiḥ /
yadi dṛṣṭas tvam anyais tu jito daṇḍadharo mama /
ity uktvā balabhadraṃ tu taṃ draṣṭuṃ praiṣayad balī /
sa gatvā balabhadras tu gṛhītvā dārakaṃ balāt /
keśavāya dadau taṃ tu tvaṃ jitaḥ keśavo 'bravīt /
kīlakaṃ ca samānīya vikṣipya bhuvi gūhitam /
āhūya dārakān sarvān idam āha jagatpatiḥ /
śaktaś ced bhavatāṃ kaścit kīlaṃ gṛhṇātu paśyataḥ /
mama pārśvagato bhūtvā daṇḍo deyaś ca tasya ha /
tac chrutvā dārakāḥ sarve taṃ draṣṭuṃ yatnam āsthitāḥ /
nāśaknuvaṃś ca te sarve jitāṃs tān abravīd iti /
cakāra matimān kṛṣṇo dārakaiḥ saha gokule //
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No. 9A, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner; version of March 5, 2002. :h
k: D6 T G M4 G(ed.) cont. (after App.I No. 9); M1-3 ins. after 51.12: :k
body.l: kvacid veśmani saṃgamya śikyasthān payaso ghaṭān /
ādāya yugapat sarvān payaḥ pītvā mudā bhṛśam /
abhihatya tataḥ sarvān niṣpapeṣa hasan bahiḥ /
ācchidya śikyam anyatra tato dadhno ghaṭān kṣipan /
yathākāmaṃ tataḥ pītvā dārakebhyas tato dadau /
atha vegān mudā kṛṣṇaḥ kvacid anyatra veśmani /
guptān ghaṭān upādāya tvarito 'tha babhañja ha /
kvacid dhṛtaghaṭān pūrṇān bahūn ādāya vesmani /
vyabhajad dārakebhyas tu bhakṣayaṃś ca svayaṃ dadau /
anyato veśmanaḥ śikyān ghaṭāṃs takrasya pūrayan /
ādāyādhūya bahudhā tasminn eva muhuḥ kṣipan /
vyahasad vividhaṃ hāsaṃ nanarta ca sa dārakaḥ /
takreṣu ca payaḥ kṣipya takraṃ ca payasi kṣipan /
payo jaleṣu saṃyojya ghṛtam agnau juhāva ca /
evaṃ tau satataṃ tatra cakratur veśmasaṃgaram /
gāvaḥ puṣṭā nīrujāś ca vatsalāḥ kāmadohanāḥ /
āgamya harṣitās tau tu pucchādiṣv avalambatām //
vatsān ārohamāṇau ca tatpāne phenavo śiśū (sic) //
atha vatsān muhur baddhān dāmabhiḥ kīlakeṣu vai /
bhittvā cchittvā ca dāmāni vatsān dhenuṣv anīyatām /
dāmany ācchidya sarvatra vatsān dikṣu prakālayan /
nirudhyamāno gopībhiḥ sa cakre vai muhurmuhuḥ /
sarpiṣā payasā caiva dadhnā takreṇa śūnyakam //
paśyantīnāṃ ca gopīnāṃ kṛṣṇo nityaṃ sa saṃbhramam //
piban payaś ca vividhaṃ cakre caivaṃ sa vaiśasam //
mama kumbhyo daśa hatāḥ putreṇānena durmate /
na ca śiṣṭaṃ payas takraṃ ghṛtaṃ vā dadhi leśakam /
kim adya kriyate mūḍhe jīvikā mama naśyati //
pañcāśan mama kumbhīnāṃ śikyād ādāya te sutaḥ /
ghṛtasya pūrṇān suśliṣṭān paśyantyā mama hanti ha //
antarveśmany aśūnyāṃś ca kumbhān sarvān ghṛtena vai /
tāñ śūnyān kārayām āsa na ca śiṣṭaṃ ghṛtaṃ mama /
pañcatriṃśad ghaṭān kṛṣṇo ghṛtena payasā samam /
na kiṃcid vyañjanaṃ mūḍhe mama veśmani vidyate /
gāvaś ca vatsakaiḥ pītāḥ kṛṣṇenānena mokṣitaiḥ //
pāyasaṃ bahu pakvaṃ me bhadre jagdham anena vai /
apūpā bahavo jagdhā bhartrarthe rakṣitā mayā /
kiṃ gṛheṇa ca me kāryaṃ kiṃ ghoṣaiḥ kiṃ gavādibhiḥ /
dhenavo mama naṣṭāḥ syur vatsaiḥ sārdhaṃ daśādya vai /
anena kālitā mūḍhe tava putreṇa durhṛdā //
jīvikā mama naṣṭābhūd eṣā yāsyāmi deśakam //
evam atyantato gopyo vinedur visvaraṃ bhṛśam /
kā gatir vada bhadreti gopyaḥ sarvās tadābruvan //
atha tābhyo yathānaṣṭaṃ yaśodā dattavaty alam /
samāśvāsya tataḥ sarvāḥ svaṃ svaṃ veśma vyakālayat /
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No. 10, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner. Version of March 5, 2002. :h
k: After 53.7, D6,S,G(ed.) ins. a passage given in App. I, No. 10 :k
body.l: prāg eva vasudevas tu nandagopena vāritaḥ /
gopāḥ praveṣṭum icchanti pralambas tatra cāsuraḥ //
nānyad vanaṃ ca paśyāmi samīpe saṃpadā yutam /
kiṃ nu kartavyam iti me putrayoś ca hitaṃ bhavet //
brahmaṇā codito vipra indreṇa ca mahātmanā //
vavande nandagopas tu tasya vai caraṇau muneḥ //
jñātvā tvayi manoduḥkhaṃ praṇayāt te 'ham āgataḥ //
asmin kāle mahāprājña kāle jñāsyati vai bhavān //
yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi ghoṣeśa tat tvaṃ jñāsyasi vai vibho /
na kevalau tava sutau devau mānuṣatāṃ gatau /
śakaṭasya tv adhaḥ suptaṃ nihantuṃ niścitaṃ śiśum //
rakṣāhīnaṃ yuvābhyāṃ ca viyuktaṃ vīkṣya dānavaḥ /
yuvābhyām atha nirmuktaṃ vīkṣya dāmodaraṃ tadā /
labdharandhraś ca niṣpeṣṭuṃ tatkṣaṇāc chiśunā hataḥ //
tasyām eva niśāyāṃ ca pūtanāṃ nāma rākṣasīm /
hantukāmau tadā bālaḥ svayam eva jaghāna ha //
bhayasthānaṃ na te gopa viśa vṛndāvanaṃ vanam //
pratyakṣaṃ tava caitāni karmāṇīha kṛtāni ca //
kṛṣṇaś cāsurasaṃghātaṃ na bhīs tvām upasarpa tu //
ity uktvā nandagopaṃ tu kṛṣṇaṃ tuṣṭāva nāradaḥ /
namas tubhyaṃ jagaddhātre viśvakartre namo namaḥ //
namas te devakīmatar namas te yādaveśvara /
viśa vṛndāvanāṃ deva vihara tvaṃ yathāsukham /
tatra daityān mahāvīryāñ jahi yatnaparo bhava //
ity uktvā nārade yāte nandagopo mahāmatiḥ /
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No. 11, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version of March 5, 2002. :h
k: After adhy. 53, D3.6,S ins. App. I, No. 11 :k
body.l: tau tu vṛndāvanaṃ prāptau vasudevasutāv ubhau /
praviśya ca mahāraṇyaṃ tadā vṛndāvanaṃ vanam /
gāvaś ca kṣīrasaṃpannā mahiṣyaś ca sunirvṛtāḥ /
tasmin kāle tadā ceruḥ savatsāś ca yathāsukham //
body.note: k: M1.2 subst. for line 6; M3 ins. after line 5 :k
body.l: cacāra ca yadā kṛṣṇas tadā vṛndāvanevane /
atha trayodaśe varṣe vardhamāne ca keśave /
gate ca bhāskare kāṣṭhām uttarāṃ tīkṣṇadīdhitau /
saptārciṣo giriṃ dagdham udabhūvann itas tataḥ /
petuś ca sarvataḥ pṛthvīṃ raktapātā ivādriṣu //
tamāṃsīva hi gopānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pidadhire muhuḥ //
vaneṣu drumamūleṣu gāś ca saṃkālya tasthire //
gopyaḥ kumbhīḥ samādāya nīraiḥ pūrṇāḥ samantataḥ /
vastrair jalārdraiḥ satataṃ vāhayantyaḥ kucān pṛthūn //
mṛṇālair dehajaṃ rūkṣaṃ nīḍasthāś ca vihaṃgamāḥ /
itaḥ kvacit tataḥ sadyas tato 'nyatra tataḥ punaḥ /
vātā vavur mahāvegāḥ kālayanto rajo diśaḥ //
āgneyaṃ teja evaitat prasṛtaṃ mādhavasya ha /
keśave jagatāṃ pāle sthite vṛndāvane vane /
vyādhir gopakule tatra babhūva tumulo mahān //
sahasā prapatanti sma vajrabhinnā nagā iva //
krandamānāś ca tiṣṭhanti śayitāś ca sahasraśaḥ /
bhūmau paripatanti sma sraṃsayantaḥ śakṛnty api //
evaṃvidhair ahobhiś ca pañcaṣaiś ca dinair abhūt /
apūrvam evaṃ sahasā gopālānām abhūd bhayam /
pālayāne tu govinde gopālaiḥ saha gogaṇam //
savatsānāṃ gavām evaṃ vyādhayaś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ /
mantraiś ca bheṣajair mukhyair bhiṣajaḥ śāstrayuktibhiḥ /
yatamānāś ca gopālā na śekus tān nivāritum //
kṛtvā cāṅgeṣu dahanaṃ sirāvedhāṃś ca tadvidaḥ /
kurvāṇā bahudhā yatnaṃ na vyādhīn praticakrire //
tato viṣaṇṇam abhavad gopālānāṃ tadā kulam /
pīḍitāḥ piṭakābhiś ca grathitāḥ sarvatas tanum /
gopālāś ca tathānye ca ye ca tadvanavāsinaḥ /
body.note: k: T4 M3 ins. after line 69; T3 after line 70; M1.2 after line 86 :k
body.l: tadā gopagaṇān sarvān sa vyādhiḥ samapadyata //
sarīsṛpāś ca vyālā ye mṛgāḥ sarve ca pakṣiṇaḥ /
te sarve mṛtasaṃkalpā mṛtāś caiva sahasraśaḥ /
gopālāḥ saha gobhiś ca paripetur diśo daśa //
petur vanacarā rājañ jīvanto 'pi mṛtā yathā //
sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām antaḥ samantāt savraṇair mukhaiḥ /
aśakyam ambu vāhartuṃ kiṃ punar bhojanādikam //
dantāś ca vipraśīryante keṣāṃcin na ca bhāṣaṇam /
durgandhaṃ duḥsahaṃ tatra prādur āsīd viśeṣataḥ /
nāhāraṃ bhuñjate gāvo nauṣadhaṃ na ca khādanam /
śvāsamātraṃ vrajaṃ sarvaṃ śayitaṃ gogaṇaiḥ saha //
evaṃ gate vraje tasmiñ śvāsamātre sthite nṛpa /
atha kṛṣṇaś ca rāmaś ca kaiścid gopaiḥ sahāparaiḥ /
bhuvaḥ saṃsthānam ālokya khānayām āsa medinīm //
utpādya salilaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ svayūthyaiḥ saha gogaṇaiḥ /
tajjalaṃ sa piban kṛṣṇo nīrogaḥ samapadyata //
tad dṛṣṭvānye ca gopālāḥ śaktyālpatarayā yutāḥ /
nandagopo yaśodā ca putrau dṛṣṭvā nirākulau /
tam avekṣya bhṛśaṃ tapto nābhavat kṛṣṇasaṃnidhau /
anena bandhuvargeṇa saha me godhanena ca /
mriyeyaṃ cāham apy atrety evaṃ matir ajāyata //
atha kṛṣṇaś ca rāmaś ca jvaritau pitarau tadā /
śrutvaivam paramodvignau vyathitau kila tau sthitau //
bandhuvargaṃ ca sakalaṃ godhanaṃ ca tathāgatam /
videhād āgataḥ kaścit tasmin kolāhale kila //
sa bandhuvargaṃ saṃprekṣya godhanaṃ ca tathāgatam /
paśūnāṃ ca patir devaḥ sarvathā vṛṣhabhadhvajaḥ //
asmin saṃnihite sthāne samyag arcāma śaṃkaram /
ityuktāḥ kulavṛddhena te gopāḥ kṛṣṇam āśritāḥ /
vināyakaṃ ca saṃpūjya stutibhiś cāstuvan haram //
puṣpair gandhaiś ca dhūpaiś ca dīpaiś caiva samantataḥ /
arcā mūrdhni kṛtās tisraḥ saptarātraṃ ca saṃtatam /
gānaiś ca kecid gāyanti śaṃkaraṃ vṛṣabhadhvajam /
nṛttaṃ kurvatsu vipreṣu śivasya pramukhe tadā /
unmatta iva saṃjajñe sāṭṭahāsaḥ punaḥ punaḥ //
divyaṃ nṛttaṃ samālebhe divyaṃ geyaṃ tathaiva ca /
vismitāḥ sarva evāsaṃs tasmin sadasi ye sthitāḥ /
sa ca vai divyanṛttānte devāveśī vaco 'bravīt //
vartamānaṃ paśūnāṃ ca gopālānāṃ ca saṃkaṭam /
vane nivasatāṃ jñātvā prāṇināṃ ca mahadbhayam //
vaco govṛṣabhaktyā ca paśūnāṃ patir abravīt //
jātaḥ kālaḥ kalir nāma virocanasuto balī /
viṣakaṇṭakino vṛkṣā latā vallyaś ca jajñire //
tasya bhāryāḥ sapakṣāś ca sahasratanayās tathā /
nirgopāś ca tathā gāvaḥ savatsāḥ sarvato vane /
sa tu puṣpitamātreṇa bhavet phalayuto drumaḥ /
visṛjan kaṭukaṃ gandhaṃ vyādhīnām ākaraṃ muhuḥ //
purā tad vanam utsṛjya jīvanti prāṇino bhayāt /
asmin kāle hi gopālāḥ prāyaśas tad vanaṃ gatāḥ /
gobhiḥ saha caranti sma te vṛkṣasyāvidūrataḥ //
paryāyād dvādaśād bānām asmin kāle kramāgate /
body.note: k: After line 179, D6 T1.2 G1.2.4 M4 ins. :k
body.l: viṣaṃ ca viṣavṛkṣaṃ ca śaktau śīghram apohitum //
itaḥ paraṃ vyādhayaś ca na bhavantīha pūrvavat /
sabhṛtyo viṣavṛkṣaś ca ubhābhyāṃ caiva eva hi /
chedite vyādhayas tasmin na jāyante sma pūrvavat //
gāvo gopāś ca jīvantu prasādāt parameṣṭhinaḥ //
ity uktvāveśito vipraḥ saṃjñāṃ svām āptavāṃs tadā //
ity uktvāntarhitaḥ syāc ca śaṅkukarṇo mahābaḹaḥ /
atha sarve tu gopālāḥ saṃprekṣanta parasparam /
teṣām iṅgitam ākāraṃ jñātvā kṛṣṇaḥ svabāndhavān /
idam āha vaco dhīmān madhuraṃ madhurākṛtiḥ //
body.note: k: After line 191, D6 T1.2 G M4 ins. :k
body.l: yāsyāmo gopavṛddhāś ca tiṣṭhantv atra sabālakāḥ //
ity uktvā sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtvā viprān pradakṣiṇam /
devālayaṃ ca tad dhīmān prayayau yamunāvanam //
pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvagopālā brāhmaṇāś ca tam anvayuḥ //
āghrāya tiktaṃ rūkṣamaṃ ca durgandhaṃ ghrāṇaduḥsaham //
tam apaśyan nadītīre prabhūtaṃ vṛkṣam ucchritam /
ṭakkaiḥ kuntaiḥ kuṭhāraiś ca khanitrair aparair dṛḍhaiḥ /
chittvā te tad vanaṃ ghoram atidurvedham āyasaiḥ /
viṣavṛkṣāṃś ca tāṃś chittvā tāv ubhau rāmakeśavau /
tau taṃ dadṛśatur daityaṃ vṛkṣabhūtam avasthitam /
body.note: k: After 211, D3.6 TG M4 ins. :k
body.l: ṛte tatputradārāṃś ca ye jīvanti tam āśritāḥ /
tāv ubhāv api saṃprekṣya rāmakṛṣṇau viṣadrumam /
pakvair apakvair bālaiś ca sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaḥ phalaiḥ //
body.note: k: After line 215, D6 T1.2 G M4 ins. :k
body.l: vikṣepaṃ cakratuḥ khaṇḍaiḥ kāṣṭhānām aśmanām api /
body.note: k: After line 218, D6 T1.2 G M4 ins. :k
body.l: pradaduḥ satvarā gopās tayor hasteṣu sarvataḥ //
udyamyāhatya tair evam ūrdhvavakrāv ubhāv api /
pātyamānaiḥ phalaiś caiva cakratus tumulaṃ svanam //
gopāś ca neduḥ saṃhṛṣṭā nedatus tau ca siṃhavat /
tāś ca gāvo bhṛśodvignā āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ /
ghorā bhayānakā gāvaḥ savatsās tān abhidrutāḥ /
dantair viṣāṇaiḥ pādaiś ca laṅgūlair mastakaiḥ khuraiḥ /
aśaknuvantas te tatra viprajagmur diśo daśa //
humbhāravāś ca nādāś ca ceṣṭāś ca vividhā guṇāḥ /
yathā syuḥ saurabheyāṇāṃ na santy āsāṃ tathā kvacit //
gavāṃ bhāvocitaḥ kṛṣṇas tat sarvam upalakṣya ca /
svayaṃ ca gopo medhāvī bālo 'pi nipuṇaḥ sadā //
ākārair iṅgitair yuktyā niścitaḥ sa tu buddhimān //
sālaṃ gṛhītvā tatraiva sthito hy atibalas tadā /
tasmin muhūrte catvāro vatsabhūtāḥ kaleḥ sutāḥ /
samāghnan sahasā kṛṣṇaṃ lalāṭaiś caraṇaiḥ khuraiḥ //
sa tīkṣṇam āhataḥ kṛṣṇo vatsais tair vītasaṃbhramaḥ /
teṣāṃ balena vijñāya teṣu hastagateṣu ca /
daityā niḥsaṃśayam iti harir niścitavān ayam //
body.note: k: After line 248, D3 T3.4 ins. :k
body.l: ekaikam eṣāṃ cikṣepa pādān saṃgṛhya līlayā /
evaṃ vatsair abhighnantaṃ sarve vatsā viṣadrumam /
tān sarvān ekahastena saṃdhārya sa mahādyutiḥ /
tataḥ saṃbhūya te vatsāḥ sarvataś ca samādravan /
samāhananta saṃrabdhāḥ pādair dantaiś ca mastakaiḥ //
nṛtyann iva babhau kṛṣṇaḥ kurvann abhinayakriyām /
tenotsṛṣṭaiś ca tair vatsaiḥ sāravadbhir anekadhā /
petuḥ pṛthivyāṃ svair dehaiḥ śavabhūtā mahāsurāḥ /
phalaiś ca sahitāḥ śākhāḥ śākhābhiḥ sahitāḥ śavāḥ //
abhipetuḥ samudvighnāḥ sarvās tā yatra te sthitāḥ /
asurāḥ paśavas tāsām anvayo niṣphalo bhuvi /
dikṣu sarvāsu vatsānāṃ kṣipan vṛkṣe babhañja ha //
ubhābhyām api hastābhyāṃ yugapac ca pṛthak ca saḥ /
ekagrāhaiś ca bahubhir tair vatsair vṛkṣam āhanat //
kṣipyamāṇais tato vṛkṣo vatsair bhagno 'tha viṣṇunā /
sāravanto hatā vṛkṣā vatsāś ca nihatās tathā //
aśeṣam eva vatsānāṃ kṣayaṃ nītvā janādanaḥ /
dāruṇaiś ca vapurbhis tair bhagnair aṅgair anekadhā /
dṛṣṭvā tat karma kṛṣṇasya vismitās tatra ye sthitāḥ /
asādhyaṃ sumahat kāryaṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇo vyavasthitaḥ //
śeṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ samunmathya gopālair adahat saha /
viṣakaṇṭakino vṛkṣās tatra ye tān vyanīnaśat //
tato vallyaś ca bhūyiṣṭhā ye ca gulmās tadāśritāḥ /
chittvā saṃgṛhya tān sarvān bhagno yatra viṣadrumaḥ /
adahat patitaiḥ sārdhaṃ phalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ śavais tathā //
vavau vāyuḥ sukhasparśaḥ praśāntam abhavad rajaḥ /
tato rāmaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca pūjyamānau mudā yutau /
praviśya yamunāṃ gopā jalakrīḍās tv anekaśaḥ /
cakruḥ śikṣāviśeṣāṃś ca vyāyāmāṃś ca jalāśrayān //
yuddhamārgaṃ ca saṃyūhya cakrur yuddhakramaṃ muhuḥ /
antaś copari toyasya rāmakṛṣṇau mudā yutau /
samutteratur īśau tau sayūthāv iva yūthapau //
tatas tasya niyogāc ca suddham āhāram āhṛtam /
tatra tau vimale vastre paridhāya svalaṃkṛtau /
ājahrur aśanaṃ mṛṣṭam amṛtaṃ vibudhā iva //
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca vidhivad vyañjanānvitam /
śivāś ca lokasiddhyarthaṃ śivā vāco vavāśire //
tataś ca rāmakṛṣṇau tau gopaiḥ krīḍāparāyaṇau /
tata utthāya gopālāḥ svadeśān prati niryayauḥ /
nṛtyantaḥ prahasantś ca dhāvantaś ca parasparam /
saveṇaśṛṅgavetrāṃ ca vīnāṃ ca vādayaṃs tathā /
samantataḥ prādur āsīt kṛto gopair mudānvitaiḥ //
evaṃ saṃbhūtam atulaṃ śabdaṃ kurvan kumārakāḥ /
praharṣam atulaṃ labdhvā bhejire vāsam eva te //
body.note: k: After line 342, D3 T1.2 ins. :k
body.l: gatasya tasya devasya dharmakālo mahān abhūt /
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 12, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version of March 5, 2002. :h
k: After adhy. 54, D3.6,S ins. App.I No. 12. :k
body.l: dātā dugdhasya sarveṣāṃ takrasya ca ghṛtasya ca /
dharmadā tasya bhāryāsīd dharmadaiva ca nāmataḥ /
tayos tatra pumāñ jātaḥ śrīdāmā nāma viśrutaḥ /
tāṃ vavruḥ sarvabhūpālā bhūyo bhūyo viśāṃ pate /
na teṣāṃ kasyacid dattā pitrā vidhibalāśrayāt //
etasminn eva kāle tu vṛṣarūpā mahāsurāḥ /
saṃgrāmān bahuśaḥ kṛtvā tena yuddhe jitās tadā /
diśo mūḍhāḥ prajagmus te viṣṇuṃ hantuṃ samudyatāḥ //
te vṛṣāḥ sarvato jaghnur gāś ca vatsāṃś ca durmadāḥ /
garbhān āsrāvayan sarvān gavāṃ sasyāny abhakṣayan //
sasyānāṃ pālakān sarvān ādhāvanti sma sarvataḥ /
kumbhakasya vraje rātrau vasanti sma mudānvitāḥ //
yāny eva tava sasyāni rāṣṭre jātāni sarvaśaḥ /
te nivāryā mahīpāla yadi te syāj jagattrayam /
sādayanti muhuḥ sarvān naṣṭā rājan bhavatprajāḥ //
iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā rājā janakasaṃbhavaḥ /
dūtaiḥ kumbhakam āhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt //
tava sapta vṛṣā gopa nirdamāḥ sasyaghātakāḥ /
damyantām adya sarve te vṛṣāḥ sarvaprayatnataḥ //
anyathā daṇḍya eva syāt sabandhuḥ saprajo bhavān /
gaccha gopair matiyutair damane kuśalaiḥ samam /
damyantāṃ te vṛṣāḥ sapta na bhayaṃ vidyate tava //
atha rātrau kvacid dṛptān dānavān vṛṣarūpiṇaḥ /
rajjuhastās tadā sarve mandaṃ mandam upāyayuḥ //
atha te ballavān dṛṣṭvā rajjuhastān samantataḥ /
tān khuraiḥ śṛṅgakoṇaiś ca samājagmuḥ samantataḥ //
te hatā gopamukhyās tair gataprāṇāḥ samaṃ bhuvi /
dārakā dārikā vatsās tair hatāḥ patitā bhuvi /
śerate mṛtabhūyiṣṭhāḥ kumbhakasya vraje sma ha //
na śekus te vṛṣān roddhuṃ dṛḍhair dāmabhir udyatāḥ /
nirvīryāḥ sarva evāmī bhagnās tair vṛṣarūpibhiḥ //
vraje tasmin mahīpāla nihate ca tathā hate /
tato vimṛśya tair gopair matim evaṃ samādadhe /
taptānāṃ vṛṣamallānāṃ damitā yo bhaved bhuvi /
gopāḥ sarve samāyāntu ye gopā goṣu jīvinaḥ /
śūdrā vā ye samarthā syus te ca gacchantu sarvaśaḥ /
evam āghoṣayām āsa kumbhakaḥ sa vraje kila //
vṛṣān sapta samāhatya nīlāṃ gṛhṇāma yatnataḥ /
iti gopāḥ samājagmuḥ pratyekaṃ tāṃ jighṛkṣavaḥ //
mithilā rājadhānī sā na kvacid ballavair vinā /
rāmakṛṣṇau ca saṃyātau kumbhakasya vrajaṃ kila /
gopās te naubhir uttīrya yamunām ūrmimālinīm /
nandagopaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā saputraṃ ca samāgatam //
bṛsīṃ saṃcodayām āsa yaśodāṃ caiva dharmadā //
kṛsaraṃ pāyasaṃ caiva tathā dadhyodanaṃ bahu /
ūṣuḥ sukhaṃ tadā rātrau gopālāḥ sarva eva te //
atha tasyāṃ vṛṣā rātrau goṣu vaiśasanaṃ muhuḥ /
pratyekaṃ sapta te mallā dāvanā vṛṣarūpiṇaḥ /
vatsāñ jaghnur atho gāś ca kuṭīr bhūyo babhañjire //
āgantukāṃs tadā gopān rātrau yuddhāya niḥsṛtān /
jaghnuḥ śṛṅgaiḥ khuraiś caiva śiṣṭā gopāḥ diśo yayuḥ /
rajjūś chittvā ghaṭān bhittvā kīlakān atha śikyakān /
vatsān vidrāvayām āsur gāś ca rājan diśo daśa //
tataḥ prabhāte vimale vyuṣṭā sā rajanī kila /
atha tasyām avasthāyāṃ niśceṣṭaḥ kumbhakaḥ kila /
gopān sarvān samāhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt //
siṃhā iva grahākrāntā diggajā iva daṃśitāḥ /
yatnāś ca bahavo 'smābhiḥ kṛtā roddhum imān muhuḥ /
eṣām ekaṃ balād yoddhuṃ na śaktā smeti saṃgatāḥ /
bhītās tebhyo muhur gopā visaṃjñā paryaṭāmahe //
kiṃ ca rājñā muhur daṇḍyā vayaṃ mithilavarmaṇā /
gatim eṣāṃ na jānīmo nāgatiṃ na ca cintitam //
na ca te kevalavṛṣā rākṣasā vā vṛṣātmanā /
daityā vā dānavā vāpi yakṣagandharva eva vā /
yuṣmākam āgatānāṃ tu yo vṛṣān damayiṣyati /
ity uktvāhūya tāṃ kanyāṃ gopamadhye karotthitām /
yūnāṃ manāṃsi cākṣīṇi tasyām eva prapedire //
anyeṣām adhare caiva pareṣāṃ ca sumadhyame /
tatra nandasutaḥ kaścij jyeṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇasya saṃmataḥ /
sa tadāghoṣayad vācā damayiṣye vṛṣān amūn /
iti pratasthe tān hantuṃ daiteyān vṛṣarūpiṇaḥ //
bhujāv āsphoṭya ruddho 'pi pitrā yatnavatā tadā /
iyeṣa yoddhuṃ mandātmā yān na śaknoti mādhavaḥ //
rāvaṇasya raṇe hantā yaś ca hantā sumālinaḥ /
tena śabdena te sapta vṛṣā ghoṣavataḥ puraḥ /
āhato mastake so 'tha vṛṣo ghoṣavatā tadā /
agre khurābhyām āhṛtya ghoṣavantaṃ dadaṃśa ha //
punaḥ śṛṅgeṇa taṃ hatvā khurābhyāṃ dūrato 'kṣipat /
vyanīnadac ca sahasā gopān vidrāvayaṃs tadā //
yuvānas tv atha ye gopā nīlāgrahaṇalālasāḥ /
gopalīlāṃ prakurvantas teṣām agre padaṃ dadhuḥ //
sarvāṃs tāñ śṛṅgakoṇaiś ca nijaghnuḥ sarvatas tataḥ /
mastakaiś ca khuraiś caiva nyahanan muditā bhṛśam //
te gopā vṛṣadaityaiś ca nihatā bhuvi pātitāḥ /
gopālān gopamukhyāṃś ca balād vidrāvya daṃśitān /
kumbhako nandagopaś ca ye vṛddhā goṣu jīvinaḥ /
rājño bhītā babhūvuś ca daṇḍyā vayam iti sthitāḥ //
atha kṛṣṇas tadā rāmaṃ babhāṣe vaiśase sati /
naite vṛṣā mahābāho daityāḥ sapta samutthitāḥ //
kālanemisutā ārya māṃ hantum iha saṃgatāḥ /
purā mayā hatā yuddhe tadā tārāmaye vibho //
nihantavyā mayā rāma gogopān rakṣatā samam //
etair gopā hatā bhūyo bhūyo hantuṃ samudyatāḥ /
vayam etair yathāyogaṃ krīḍāṃ kūrmaḥ sagopakāḥ //
nandaś ca kumbhakaś cobhau viṣaṇṇau samapadyatām /
rakṣitavyau balād etau gopau bandhū mayā vibho //
nīlām enāṃ grahīṣyāmi hatvā sapta vṛṣān imān /
puras teṣāṃ padaṃ cakre vṛṣāṇāṃ balaśālinām //
te vṛṣā didijāḥ kruddhā viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puraḥsthitam /
te samaṃ sahasā petuḥ kṛṣṇasyopari dānavāḥ /
tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat teṣāṃ kṛṣṇasya ca prabho //
śṛṅgais te sahasā jaghnuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ hantum abhīpsavaḥ //
dantair dadaṃśur apare khurair anye janārdanam //
tataḥ kṛṣṇo ruṣā muṣṭiṃ saṃnihatya jaghāna ha /
teṣām ekaṃ kṣaṇād dhatvā punar anyaṃ jaghāna ha //
krameṇa muṣṭyā tān sarvān hatvā daiteyagopatīn /
nīlāṃ haste gṛhītvātha kṛṣṇas tasmin vyarocata //
saputrāḥ saha gopālaiḥ savatsā godhanaiḥ samam //
vṛṣaiś ca saptabhir nanda hatā gāvaḥ sahasraśaḥ /
garbhāś ca niḥsṛtās tāvad vatsās tāvanta eva hi /
yatas te nihatā nanda sukhaṃ tasmād avāpnumaḥ //
yāvad icchasi vā nanda tāvat te vai dadāmy aham //
alaṃ mama vibho tāta gobhir vatsair dhanair api /
tiṣṭhantām adya gāvas te gāvo me bahavo matāḥ //
yadā ca kṛṣṇa udbhūtas tadāprabhṛti me vraje //
yāvad dugdhaṃ samudbhūtaṃ tāvad eva ghṛtaṃ bhavet /
gulme gulme madhu bhavet svādu svādu bhavaty alam //
gāvo vatsāś ca nīrogā jāte kṛṣṇe vraje mama /
alpakaṃ na ca me syāt tad gehe svaṃ kṛṣṇasaṃnidhau //
ity uktvā prayayau nandaḥ savrajaḥ sahagogaṇaḥ //
kṛṣṇaś ca nīlayā sārdhaṃ śrīdāmnā saha saṃgatah /
sākaṃ ca balabhadreṇa yayau vṛndāvanaṃ vanam //
aho citram aho citraṃ mādhavasya jagatpateḥ /
paśyanti devam īśeśaṃ namas tebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ //
hatvā vṛṣān hariḥ sapta punar āgamya mādhavaḥ /
vṛndāvanaṃ sarāmas tu gopaiḥ saha mahāmune /
akarot kiṃ jagannāthas tan me brūhi tapodhana //
tasyāṃ śaradi govindaḥ sukhaṃ vṛndāvane vane /
body.note: h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 13, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit, extracted and edited by Peter Schreiner; version of March 5, 2002.:h
body.l: dadarśatuḥ samaṃ vatsān kālyānāṃś ca gogaṇān //
he vatsāḥ kva ca no mārgo yamunātīrthadarśane /
mārgajñā na vayaṃ bālā jñānibhyaḥ saṃpraśasyatām /
kuto 'tra yamunā śubhrā kuto mārgaḥ kuto vayam //
etasminn antare kṛṣṇas teṣāṃ vākyaṃ tayor api /
śrutvā tau samupāgamya vaktum evaṃ pracakrame //
eṣa vāṃ patha ādeṣṭā gavām iva suyantritaḥ /
ahaṃ nandasya tanayaḥ kṛṣṇa ity abhiviśrutaḥ //
mamāyam agrajo rāmaś candramā iva bhāsate /
āvayor gogaṇaḥ sarvo vacanaṃ ca niśamyatām //
etad dadhyodanaṃ samyag gṛhyatāṃ yadi rocate /
pāyasaṃ surasaṃ dugdhaṃ dhātāś ca guḍamiśritāḥ //
evam ukte tatas tasmin kṛṣṇe kamalalocane /
tau kāv imāv iti tadā samādhiṃ jagmatur munī /
tau netrāṇi samunmīlya prītau dṛṣṭvā jagatpatim /
idam ūcatur adhyātmaṃ munī kṛṣṇasya saṃmatam //
tvam ādiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ madhyam antas tathā bhavān /
sraṣṭā sarvasya lokasya pātā bhoktā janārdana //
sraṣṭā vedasya yajñasya haviṣām ṛtvijāṃ hare /
karmaṇāṃ phalabhoktā ca phaladaḥ karma kurvatām //
niṣeddhā duṣṭasattvasya hantā tvaṃ tamasāṃ paraḥ /
netre te bhānuśaśinau nāsikā ca samīraṇaḥ //
vācaḥ sarasvatī devī jihvā meghaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
dantāś ca parvatā jñeyā karṇaḥ pātālagocaraḥ //
lakṣmīr vakṣas tu vijṭeyā vāmo bāhus tu śaṃkaraḥ /
skandhaś ca dakṣiṇo bāhur aṇgulyaḥ sāgarāḥ smṛtāḥ //
ambaraṃ kukṣir ity uktaṃ vivarāṇi diśaḥ smṛtāḥ /
rodasī tava pādau ca keśā devāḥ smṛtā hareḥ /
yāny eva vastujātāni loke dṛṣṭāni mādhava /
tāni gātreṣu paśyāmaḥ puruṣottama te hare //
bhavantam ūrdhvaṃ paśyāmo bhavantam atha pṛṣṭhataḥ /
pārśvataḥ purataś caiva bhavantaṃ vīkṣya nirvṛtāḥ //
tvam ādau kroḍadaṃṣṭrāgre adadhā gāṃ saparvatām /
daityendraṃ hatavān viṣṇo rājyaṃ dattvā marutvate //
raghor anvayam āpannas tvam eva jagatāṃ pate /
rāvaṇaṃ sasutaṃ hatvā sānujaṃ sabalaṃ prabho /
baler vāmanatāṃ gatvā mahīm ādāya māyayā /
idānīm api deveśa devadeva yadoḥ kule //
pralambaṃ keśinaṃ hatvā hantā kaṃsasya mādhava /
aho ramyam idaṃ viṣṇo vapur nīlotpalacchavi /
aho manoramaṃ rūpaṃ paśyāmas tava mādhava //
gopālās te ciraṃ dhanyā ye rūpam idam īdṛśam /
paśyanti nityaśo viṣṇo namas te puruṣottama //
bhūyaḥ punar namasyāmas tava yogapadaṃ hare /
sādhayāmo namas te 'stu tīrthāya jagatāṃ pate //
ity uktvā harim īśeśaṃ tīrthāya munipuṃgavau /
jagmatus tatra bhāṇḍīre sthitau tau rāmakeśavau /
body.note: h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 14 transliterated by Peter Schreiner; Version of March 4, 2002. :h
k: After 73.9, N(except Ś1,Ñ1),T,G,M4,G(ed.) ins. App.I No. 14. :k
body.l: katham uktaṃ nāradena rājan devarṣiṇā purā /
āścaryam etat kathitaṃ tvattaḥ śrutam ariṃdama //
katham anyena jātas tvam ugrasena pitur vinā /
tava mātrā kathaṃ rājan kṛtaṃ karmedam īdṛśam //
anyāpi prākṛtā nārī na kuryāc ca jugupsitam /
vistaraṃ śrotum icchāmi hy atra kautūhalaṃ hi me //
yathā kathitavān vipro maharṣir nāradaḥ prabhuḥ /
tathāhaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yadi te śravaṇe matiḥ //
āgataḥ śakrasadanāt sa vai śakrasakho muniḥ /
tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā pūjayitvā yathāvidhi /
mukhaüupaviṣṭo 'tha muniḥ dṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ mama /
idaṃ eko mama vacaḥ śrūyatāṃ pratigṛhyatām //
tatra mantrayatām eva devatānāṃ mayā śrutam /
tatraiṣā devakī yā te mathurāyāṃ pitṛṣvasā /
yo 'syā garbho 'ṣṭamaḥ kaṃsa sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati //
devānāṃ sa tu sarvasvaṃ tridivasya gatiś ca saḥ /
paraṃ rahasyaṃ devānāṃ sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati //
yatnaś ca kriyatāṃ kaṃsa garbhānāṃ pātanaṃ prati /
nāvajñā ripave kāryā subaleṣv abaleṣu vā //
na cāyam ugrasenas tu pitā tava mahābala /
drumilo nāma tejasvī saubhasya patir ūrjitaḥ //
jātas tenāsi kaṃsa tvaṃ nograsenena vīryavān /
śrutvāhaṃ tad vacas tasya kiṃcid roṣasamanvitaḥ /
bhūyo 'pṛcchaṃ kathaṃ brahman drumilo nāma dānavaḥ //
mama mātrā kathaṃ tasya brūhi vipra samāgamaḥ /
etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa tapodhana //
hanta te vartayiṣyāmi śṛṇu rājan yathārthataḥ /
drumilasya ca mātrā te saṃvādaṃ ca samāgamam //
body.note: h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 15 transliterated by Peter Schreiner; Version of March 4, 2002. :h
k: After 73.18ab, all Mss. (except Ś1,Ñ1,M1-3), G(ed.) ins. App. I, 15. :k

body.l: avatīrya rathād dhṛṣtaś cacāra drumilo nṛpaḥ /
sa taṃ prāpya parvatendram avatīrya rathottamāt /
tato bahūny apaśyetāṃ kānanāni vanāni ca /
siṃhān vyāghrān varāhāṃś ca mahiṣāñ śrabhāñ śaśān /
tataś carantīṃ suśroṇīṃ sakhībhiḥ saha saṃvṛtām /
dṛṣṭvā bhaumapatir dūrād vismayan sūtam abravīt //
ailasya dayitā devī yoṣidratnaṃ kim urvaśī //
manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā amṛtārtheti naḥ śrutam //
tato amṛtāt samuttasthau devī śrīr lokabhāvanī /
tathā yoṣidgaṇān madhye rūpaṃ pradyotayad vanam /
kāmasya vaśam āpanno mano vihvalatīva me //
bhittvā hṛdi śarāḥ pañca nirdahantīva me manaḥ /
kāmaḥ śaraiḥ pañcabhir me hṛdayaṃ nirdahann iva /
katham adya bhavet kāryaṃ śāntyarthaṃ manmathārciṣaḥ /
kenopāyena kiṃ kurma bhajen māṃ mattakāśinī //
evaṃ bahu cintayāno nopalabhya ca dānavaḥ /
sūtam āha muhūrtaṃ tu tiṣṭhasva tvam ihānagha //
ahaṃ yāsyāmi tāṃ draṣṭuṃ kasyeyam iti yoṣitam /
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ sūtas tathāstv iti ca so 'bravīt //
evam uktvā dānavendro gamanāya mano dadhe /
ugrasenasya patnīti jñātvā harṣam avāpa saḥ //
ugrasenasya vai rūpaṃ kṛtvā svaṃ parivartya saḥ /
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No.16, transliterated by John Brockington, proof--read by John Brockington, version of 31st December 2001 :h
k: D6 T2 G1.3.5 M4 ins. after the ref. of Adhy. 81; T1 M1-3 after 81.3; G2 after line 14 of App.I (No. 18); G3 after adhy. 80. :k
body.l: tau gatvā mathurāṃ vīrau dvāṣthena prativeśitau //
āsanasthaṃ tadā rājann ugrasenaṃ patiṃ nṛpa /
tatpārśve ca sthitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ balabhadreṇa saṃgatam //
anyāṃś ca yādavān dṛṣṭvā samīpasthān mahīpateḥ //
tau tu sarvān samābhāṣya kaṃsasya pitaraṃ tadā /
ūcatuḥ sukham āsīnau vāsudevaṃ ca sāgrajam //
śrūyatāṃ mama yad vākyaṃ duḥkhitasyābalasya me //
yat tu kaṃso hataḥ saṃkhye kṛṣṇena hi balīyasā /
yat tu yuddhaṃ balavatā kṛṣṇena kṛtam ity api /
nātra me vismayaḥ kāryo balavān sa hi sāgrajaḥ //
kiṃ tu duḥkhaṃ mahad bhūtaṃ duḥsahaṃ mama jāyate /
tad duḥkhaṃ duḥsahaṃ manye vaktuṃ ca mama duḥsaham //
citram etan mahārāja yat kṛtaṃ mayi jīvati //
kṛṣṇena sukṛtaṃ karma māṃ matvā paśum ity api /
kṛṣṇe tv asukṛtaṃ karma mama tvāṃ paśya ity api /
kiṃ nūnaṃ duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtvā kṛṣṇas tu jīvati //
jīvitaṃ tu samāptaṃ me kṛṣṇe jīvati saṃprati //
yadi kṛṣṇaṃ sthitaṃ saṃkhye haniṣye yadi manmukhe //
nāhaṃ kaṃso na vā keśī nāriṣṭo na ca pūtanā /
imām apy aparāṃ rājan pratijñāṃ śṛṇu keśava /
yadi tvaṃ matpuro bhūyās tadā hanmi sabāndhavam //
yatra yatra bhavān yāti tatra tatrāham āsthitaḥ //
jīvati tvayi govinda jarāsaṃdho na jīvati /
sātyake yuktam evaitat kṛtaṃ kṛṣṇena kiṃ prabho /
vasudeva yaduśreṣṭha yuktaṃ putreṇa kiṃ tava /
akrūra vada satyena yuktaṃ vātrānyathāpi vā //
mṛdhe kṛṣṇa yaduśreṣṭha sthiro bhava na cañcalaḥ /
bahunātra kim uktena na sthiraṃ tava jīvitam //
śvaḥ purīṃ tava rotsyāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
ko nv idaṃ sāhasaṃ kuryāt tvāṃ vinā kṛṣṇa sāṃpratam //
ity uktvā tau mahāvīryau virāmaṃ jagmatus tadā //
ity ukto roṣatāmrākṣaḥ kṛṣṇa ūce vacas tadā /
hataḥ kaṃso mahārāja kim ataḥ sāhasaṃ kṛtam /
kiṃ citraṃ vada rājendra hataḥ kaṃsa itīha naḥ //
idaṃ ca tasmai vaktavyaṃ bhavadbhyāṃ rājasattamau /
sthito 'smi yuddhasaṃrakto jeṣyāmi ca raṇe ripūn //
tvāṃ hatvā sabalaṃ saṃkhye rājyam ādāya sāṃpratam /
ugrasenāya dāsyāmi satyena ca śapāmy aham //
tau tu gatvā tadā sarvaṃ tasmai ca procatuḥ prabho //
sa pratāpo hi balavān magadhendrasya sarvataḥ //
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No.17, transliterated by John Brockington, proof--read by John Brockington, version of 31st December 2001 :h
k: T1.3 G3.5 M ins. after 82.5; D6 T2 G1.4.5 cont. after *932. :k
body.l: rukmī tu vāsudevasya jyāṃ chettuṃ paricakrame /
jñātvaiva vāsudevo 'pi dhanuś ciccheda tasya ha //
tayā jaghne hariṃ vīraḥ so 'cchinat tāṃ śarair api //
punar anyāṃ mahārāja gadāṃ preṣitavān nṛpa /
tilaśaś ca tathā deva tac cakraṃ kṛtavāñ śaraiḥ //
tattat tatra dvidhā kṛtvā jahāsa yadunandanaḥ //
avekṣya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo rukmiṇaṃ na vyaśātayat /
bhīṣmako 'tha ca rājendra śarāṇāṃ ca paraḥśataiḥ /
āhukas tu dhanuś chittvā bhīṣmakasya mahātmanaḥ /
rathaṃ cāsya praciccheda dhvajaṃ ca yadupuṃgavaḥ //
sārathiṃ ca hayāṃs tasya jaghāna yadunandanaḥ /
apāyāt samarāt tasmād bhīṣmakas tu śramānvitaḥ //
vasudevas tu rājendra krāthaṃ vivyādha patribhiḥ /
krāthas tu rājan vivyādha śaraiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥ /
vasudevas tataḥ kruddho dhanuś ciccheda patribhiḥ /
viratho vidhanuṣkaś ca prayayau māgadhaṃ prati //
babhruḥ kauśikarājaṃ taṃ vivyādha vividhaiḥ śaraiḥ /
atha babhrur mahātmānaṃ vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ //
kauśikaś ca tathā babhruṃ marmajño marmabhedibhiḥ /
bhṛśaṃ vivyādha samare tad adbhutam ivābhavat //
atha hatvā mahātmānaṃ babhruś ca sumahābalaḥ /
gadaś ca niśitair bāṇaiś cedirājam apāhanat /
cedirājas tu sahasā gadaṃ yaduvaraṃ raṇe /
virathaṃ vidhanuṣkaṃ ca kṛtavāṃś cedipaḥ kila /
dantavaktraṃ mahārāja śaṃbhus tu bahuśas tadā /
tau ca rājan mahātmānau sātyakiṃ satyavikramam /
sātyakir vimukhīkṛtya tau ca rājan mahābalau /
tau ca taṃ sātyakiṃ vīraṃ jaghnatuś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
sātyakiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā tau ca rājan mahāmatim /
sātyakeś ca dhanur bāṇaṃ rathaṃ sārathim eva ca /
kruddho 'tha sātyakis tau tu gadayābhijaghāna ha /
stanayoś ca tadā rājan bāhvor urasi cārpayat /
rathaṃ ca cūrṇayām āsa tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī /
āyudhāni ca sarvāṇi pothayām āsa yādavaḥ //
punaś ca gadayā cāśu jaghāna yadunandanaḥ /
gadāṃ ca prāhiṇot tābhyāṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥ //
saptatriṃśat tu vārṣṇeya ekalavyas tu viṃśatim /
lokeṣu pravarau vīrau dhanvināṃ pravarau raṇe //
parasparaṃ dhanuś chittvā dhvajaṃ caiva parasparam /
tāv ubhāv ubhayo rājan rathau jaghnatur āśugaiḥ //
dhvajau ca cicchidur vīrau sārathī ca mahābalau //
tau tu bhūmigatau bhūtvā gadām ādāya satvarau /
gadāṃ ciccheda bhūyas tu tasya rājñaḥ sa yādavaḥ //
jānubhyāṃ talapādaiś ca jānupādaiś ca yatnataḥ /
sa ca tādṛgvidhaṃ cakre yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśāradaḥ //
punaś ca muṣṭinā rājan rājā yadukulodvaham /
tataś ca sainikāḥ sarve vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ /
samantāj jagmatus tau tu yuddhāya ca mahāraṇe //
ājaghne muṣṭinā taṃ tu jarāsaṃdhasya paśyataḥ //
pradyumnas tu tataḥ kruddho muṣṭinā taṃ jaghāna ha /
udvamañ śoṇitaṃ vaktrād gatāyur iva niḥśvasan /
gantum aicchat tadā yuddhāt pradyumnena prapīḍitaḥ //
na gantavyaṃ raṇe vīra kṣatriyo 'sīti cābravīt //
anyeṣāṃ ca mahān āsīd yodhānāṃ dāruṇo raṇaḥ /
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No. 18, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, 04.05.2003, version of May--June 2003. :h
k: After adhy. 82, N (except Ś1) S G(ed.) ins. App.I No. 18: :k
body.l: sa kṛṣṇas tatra sahito rauhiṇeyena saṃgataḥ /
mathurāṃ yādavādhīnāṃ purīṃ tāṃ sukham āvasat //
kasyacit tv atha kālasya rājā rājagṛheśvaraḥ /
body.note: k: Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn2 Ds D4.6 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: na śarma labhate rātrau na divā śokakarṣitaḥ //
sarvaiḥ sa pārthivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mantrayan guptamantravit /
aho dhik pauruṣaṃ manye sarveṣāṃ sarvapārthivāḥ /
te gacchāmaḥ punas tatra mathurāṃ caturaṅgiṇaḥ /
balena mahatā yuktā yatra tau gopakilbiṣau /
anyathā hy ayaśo 'smākam yāval lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
ūcuś ca vacanaṃ tasya sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan //
bhūmeḥ samantataḥ kṛtvā yadūn sarvān nihatya ca /
tatas te susthirāṃ kṛtvā matiṃ yuddhāya pārthivāḥ /
daśa sapta ca saṃgrāmāñ jarāsaṃdhasya yādavāḥ /
dadur na cainaṃ samare hantuṃ śekur mahārathāḥ //
kṛṣṇasya vadham anvicchan bhūyo vai saṃnyavartata //
taṃ śrutvā sahitāḥ sarve nivṛttaṃ magadheśvaram /
yaduvaṃśaṃ śrotum icche prāptakālaṃ ahaṃ tava /
prādhānyena dvijaśreṣṭha brūhi taṃ vai viśeṣataḥ //
yuktaṃ cen manyase sādho kariṣyasi vaco mama //
yathā me kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ vyāsena viditātmanā //
āsīd rājā manor vaṃśe śrīmān ikṣvākusaṃbhavaḥ /
tasyāsīd dayitā bhāryā madhor daityasya sā sutā /
devī madhumatī nāma yathā devī śucī tathā //
sā tam ikṣvākuśārdūlaṃ kāmayām āsa kāminī //
sa kadācin naraśreṣṭho bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena mādhava /
ehy āgaccha nṛpaśreṣṭha tyaja rājyakṛtāṃ spṛhām //
gacchāva sahitau vīra madhor mama pitur gṛham /
sahitau tatra raṃsyāvo yathā divigatau tathā //
pitur me dayitas tvaṃ hi mātuś ca mama pārthiva /
matpriyatvāt priyataro bhrātuś ca lavaṇasya me //
raṃsyāvas tatra sahitau rājyasthāv iva kāmagau /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G4.5 ins. :k
body.l: tatra gatvā naraśreṣṭha hy amarāv iva nandane /
vihariṣyāma bhadraṃ te yathā devasutau tathā //
āvayor dveṣiṇaṃ nityaṃ mattaṃ rājyamadena vai //
dhig imaṃ garhitaṃ vāsaṃ bhṛtyavac ca parāśrayam /
gacchāva sahitau vīra pitur me bhavanāntikam //
kāmārtasya narendrasya patnyās tad ruruce vacaḥ //
tato madhupuraṃ rājā haryaśvaḥ sa jagāma ha /
svāgataṃ vatsa haryaśva prīto 'smi tava darśanāt //
yad imaṃ mama rājyaṃ vai sarvaṃ madhuvanaṃ vibho /
vane 'smiṃl lavaṇaś cāyaṃ maithunaṃ te bhaviṣyati /
lavaṇaś cāpy ayaṃ rājan vīryavān balavattaraḥ /
atra te vasatas tāta durgaṃ giripuraṃ mahat /
ānartaṃ nāma tad rāṣṭraṃ bhaviṣyaty āyataṃ mahat //
tad bhaviṣyam ahaṃ manye kālayogena pārthiva /
adhyāssva ca yathākāmaṃ pārthivaṃ vṛttam uttamam //
body.note: k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: yāyātam api vaṃśas te sameṣyati ca yādavam /
atra vaṃśe ca vaṃśas te somasya bhavitā kila //
eṣa me viṣayas tāta tavaiva viṣayopamaḥ /
bāḍham ity eva haryaśvaḥ pratijagrāha tatpuram /
sa ca daityas tapovāsaṃ jagāma varuṇālayam //
satyanāma ca tad rāṣṭraṃ surāṣṭraṃ godhanāyutam /
śaśāsa sa nṛpaḥ sphītaṃ tad rāṣṭraṃ rāṣṭravardhanaḥ /
sa hi rājyasthito rājye rājavṛttena śobhitaḥ /
prāptaḥ kulocitāṃ lakṣmīṃ vṛttena ca nayena ca //
madhumatyāṃ suto jajñe yadur nāma mahāyaśāḥ //
body.note: k: K4 T3 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k
k: T3 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) cont.; K1 Ñ2.3 V B Ds D2-4.6 ins. :k
body.l: yathāsya pūrvako rājā pūruḥ sa sumahāyaśāḥ /
sa eka eva tasyāsīt putraḥ paramaśobhanaḥ /
yadur indrapratīkāśo nṛpo yena sma yādavāḥ //
sa kadācin nṛpaś cakre jalakrīḍāṃ mahodadhau /
dāraiḥ saha mahodāraiḥ satāra iva candramāḥ //
sa tatra sahasā kṣiptis titīrṣuḥ sāgarāmbhasi /
sa tad dadarśa rājendro majjitaḥ sāgarāmbhasi /
svasthaś caiva pure tatra praviveśa nṛpo yaduḥ /
pitā te svargatiṃ prāptaḥ kṛtvā vaṃśam imaṃ mahat /
yādavo nāma vaṃśo 'yaṃ yathā te putrasaṃjñitaḥ /
pitrā te tāta loke 'smin sthāpitaḥ pārthivākaraḥ //
vaṃśe cāsmiṃs tava vibho devānāṃ tanayāvyayāḥ /
body.note: k: note hiatus at end of pāda a :k
body.l: tan mameha sutāḥ pañca kumāryo vṛttasaṃmatāḥ /
varaṃ ca te pradāsyāmi varārhas tvaṃ mato mama //
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2.3(both times).4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k
body.l: dāśārhā vṛṣṇayaś ceti khyātiṃ yāsyanti sapta te //
sa tasmai dhūmavarṇo vai kanyāḥ kanyāvrate sthitāḥ /
varaṃ cāsmai dadau prītaḥ sa vai pannagapuṃgavaḥ /
etāsu te sutāḥ pañca sutāsu mama mānada /
utpatsyante pitus tejo mātuś caiva samāśritāḥ //
sa varaṃ kanyakāś caiva labdhvā yaduvṛṣas tadā /
sa tad antaḥpuraṃ sarvaṃ dadarśa nṛpasattamaḥ /
samāśvasya ca tāḥ sarvāḥ patnīr vai pāvakopamāḥ /
jagāma svapuraṃ rājā gatvā vai ramate bhṛśam //
body.note: k: After 141a, K1 Ñ3 V B1 Dn D2.3.5.6 T2 G2.5 M ins. :k
body.l: sa tāsu nāgakanyāsu kālena mahatā nṛpaḥ /
janayām āsa vikrāntān pañca putrān kulodvahān //
mādhavaṃ sārasaṃ caiva haritaṃ caiva pārthivam //
etān pañca sutān saumyān pañcabhūtopamān bhuvi /
te prāptavayasaḥ sarve sthitāḥ pañca yathādrayaḥ /
te jitā baladarpeṇa ūcuḥ pitaram agrataḥ //
tāta yuktāḥ sma vayasā bale mahati tasthuṣaḥ /
kṣipram ājñaptum icchāmaḥ kiṃ kurmas tava śāsanāt //
sa tān nṛpatiśārdūlaḥ śārdūlān iva tejitān /
niveśayatv ayaṃ tāvan mucukundaḥ suto mama //
sahyasya copari purīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritaḥ /
sāraso me puraṃ tatra niveśayatu putrakaḥ //
mādhavo 'yaṃ mama suto jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca dharmavit /
svaṃ svaṃ niveśanaṃ sarve bhejire nṛpasattamāḥ /
sa tu taṃ śodhayām āsa vivikte vicacāra ha /
setuṃ caiva samaṃ cakre parikhāś cāmitodakāḥ //
rathyā vīthyo nṛṇāṃ mārgāś catvarāṇi gṛhāṇi ca //
body.note: k: K1.2 Ñ3 V B1 Dn Ds D2-6 Cal. ed. ins. :k
body.l: nāma cāsyāḥ śubhaṃ cakre nirmitaṃ svena tejasā /
madhye niveśayām āsa śriyā paramayā vṛtām //
body.note: k: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G M4 ins. (T1 after line 182) :k
body.l: nirmitā sā purī rājñā purīkā nāma nāmataḥ //
sa te dve vipule puryau rājapuryupame śubhe /
pālayām āsa dharmātmā rājā dharmeṇa vīryavān //
viṣayasyālpatāṃ jñātvā saṃpūrṇaṃ rāṣṭram eva ca /
niveśayām āsa nṛpaḥ sa vapraprāyam uttamam //
puraṃ tu tasya tac chrīmad drumaiḥ sarvartukair vṛtam //
tasya dāśā jale magnā madgurā nāma viśrutāḥ /
saṃcinvanti sadā yuktā jātarūpaṃ ca mauktikam //
jalajāni ca ratnāni niṣādās tasya mānavāḥ /
matsyamāṃsena te sarve vartayanti sadā narāḥ /
haritaṃ tarpayanty ekaṃ yathaiva dhanadaṃ tathā //
caturdhā yaduputrais tu caturbhir bhidyate punaḥ //
sa yadur mādhave rājyaṃ visṛjya yadupuṃgave /
triviṣṭapaṃ gato rājā tyaktvā dehaṃ mahītale //
satvatasya suto rājā bhīmo nāma mahān abhūt /
yena bhaimāḥ sma saṃvṛttāḥ satvatāt sātvatāḥ smṛtāḥ //
rājyasthe tu nṛpe tasmin rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati /
śatrughno lavaṇaṃ hatvā ciccheda sa madhor vanam //
tasmin madhuvanasthāne purīṃ ca mathurām imām /
paryāye caiva rāmasya bharatasya tathaiva ca /
sumitrāyāḥ sutābhyāṃ ca sthānaṃ prāptaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam //
body.note: k: For line 221, K1.2.4 V2 B Ds D3.5 M1-3 subst. :k
body.l: yādavena purī vyāptā bhīmena tu mahātmanā /
svavaṃśe sthāpitā pūrvaṃ svayam adhyāsitā tathā //
tataḥ kuśe sthite rājye lave ca yuvarājani /
andhako nāma bhīmasya suto rājyam akārayat //
andhakasya suto jajñe raivato nāma pārthivaḥ /
ṛkṣas tu raivatāj jajñe ramye parvatamūrdhani //
nāmnā raivatako nāma bhūmau bhūmidharaḥ smṛtaḥ //
vasur babhruḥ suṣeṇaś ca śubhākṣaś caiva vīryavān /
tair ayaṃ yādavo vaṃśaḥ pārthivair bahulīkṛtaḥ /
ye sma te kṛṣṇa loke 'smin prajāvantaḥ prajeśvarāḥ //
janayām āsa caivātra suprabhe dve ca dārike //
kuntīṃ ca pāṇḍor mahiṣīṃ devatām iva bhūcarīm /
body.note: k: For line 241, K Ñ3 V1.2 B D T2-4 G1.4.5 subst. :k
body.l: eṣa te svasya vaṃśasya prabhavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
tvaṃ tv idānīṃ pranaṣṭe 'smin vaṃśe vaṃśabhṛtāṃ vara /
na tvāṃ paurāṇamātreṇa śaktā gūhayituṃ vayam /
śaktaś cāsi jarāsaṃdhaṃ nṛpaṃ yodhayituṃ prabho /
śakyaṃ cemaṃ jarāsaṃdhaṃ nṛpaṃ drāvayituṃ hare /
jarāsaṃdhas tu balavān nṛpāṇāṃ mūrdhani sthitaḥ /
na ceyam ekāham api purī rodhaṃ sahiṣyati /
kaṃsasya balavattvāt tu nātiguptā purī janaiḥ //
balaṃ saṃmardabhagnaṃ ca kliśyamānaṃ pareṇa ha /
asaṃśayam idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ janaiḥ saha vinaṅkṣyati //
ārto vakṣyati naḥ sarvo rudhyamānaḥ pure janaḥ /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V1 B D T2.3 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k
body.l: te sarve dvaidham icchanti yat kṣamaṃ tad vidhīyatām /
etan mama mataṃ kṛṣṇa viśrambhāt samudāhṛtam /
tvayi sarvasvam ity eva paras tvaṃ caiva buddhimān //
body.note: k: For l. 267, K Ñ2 B1.3 D T2-4 G1.4 subst. :k
body.l: tvaṃ tu vijñāpitaḥ sarvaṃ na punaḥ saṃprabodhitaḥ /
yad atra naḥ kṣamaṃ kṛṣṇa tat svairam abhidhīyatām /
tvam asya netā sainyasya vayaṃ tvacchāsane sthitāḥ //
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 (G2 after l. 268) ins. :k
body.l: tvanmūlaś ca virodho 'yaṃ rakṣāsmān ātmanā saha /
vikadros tu vacas tathyaṃ niśamya yadupuṃgavaḥ /
body.note: k: After line 270,K2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn D2-6 Bom. Poona eds ins. :k
body.l: sat tattvaṃ ca hitaṃ caiva kṛṣṇoktaṃ khila dhīmatā /
bhāṣitā rājadharmāś ca satyāś ca jagato hitāḥ //
etac chrutvā pitur vākyaṃ vikadroś ca mahātmanā /
body.note: k: After l. 4, Bom. Poona ed. ins. :k
body.l: vikadruṇā yaduśreṣṭha yad dhitaṃ tad vidhīyatām /
bruvatāṃ vaḥ śrutaṃ vākyaṃ hetutaḥ kramatas tathā /
śrūyatām uttamaṃ vākyaṃ mama buddhyā ca gṛhyatām /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k
body.l: saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva yānam āsanam eva ca /
dvaidhībhāvaṃ saṃśrayaṃ ca ṣāḍguṇyaṃ cintayet sadā //
balinaḥ saṃnikarṣe tu na stheyaṃ paṇḍitena ca /
apakramed dhi kālajñaḥ samartho yuddham āvahet //
vikadros tad vacaḥ śrutvā baladevānujasya ca /
praśaśaṃsa tathā mene tathyaṃ tadvacanaṃ hitam /
kṛṣṇaṃ prāha rato raṅgaṃ gamyatāṃ tatra saṃgatau /
drakṣyāvas tatra sahitau gomantaṃ ca nagottamam //
āvayor gamanaṃ śrutvā jitakāśī ca pārthivaḥ /
tataḥ sahyavaneṣv eva rājā yāsyati sānugaḥ /
eṣā naḥ śreyasī yātrā bhaviṣyati kulasya vai /
paurāṇām atha puryāś ca deśasya ca sukhāvahā //
na ca śatrau paribhraṣṭe rājāno vijigīṣavaḥ /
evam uktvā tu tau vīrau kṛṣṇasaṃkarṣaṇāv ubhau /
body.note: k: D6 S (except T3.4) G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: māgadhasya puraḥ sthitvā vākyam etad avocatām //
āvāṃ paśya mahārāja yat kāryaṃ tad vadasva nau /
yac ca kartuṃ pravṛtto 'si tat kuruṣva yathecchasi //
tac chrutvā roṣatāmrākṣo babhāṣe māgadhas tadā /
eṣa vāṃ pratiyotsyāmi haniṣyāmi ca vāṃ yudhi //
ity uktvā dhanur ādatta jarāputraḥ pratāpavān /
tac chrutvā tau tu deveśau gantuṃ vyavasitau kila //
tau tu rāṣṭrāṇi śataśaś carantau kāmarūpiṇau /
dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya ceratur mārgagau sukham //
tau tatra gatvā veṇṇāyā nadyās tīraṃ samāśritau /
body.note: k: T1 G2.3.5 M G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: yasya nāmāni rājānaḥ śrotuṃ śaktāḥ sadā na hi //
bhārgavaṃ rāmam āsīnaṃ mandarasthaṃ yathā ravim //
nyāyatas tau tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā pādamūle kṛtāsanau /
kṛṣṇas tam ṛṣiśārdūlam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ /
body.note: k: K Ñ V B D T2-4 G1 M4 ins. :k
body.l: sahyasya ca nikuñjeṣu sphīto janapado mahān /
tvayā ca sāgaro vipra velām utsārito mahān /
tad icchāvas tvayā vipra kaṃcid artham upaśrutam /
yādavau svo muniśreṣṭha yadi te śrutim āgatau //
vasudevo yaduśreṣṭhaḥ pitā nau hi dhṛtavrataḥ /
āvāṃ ca prathamaṃ prāptau mathurāṃ ca praveśitau //
tāv āvāṃ vyutthitaṃ hatvā samāje kaṃsam ojasā /
svam eva karma cārabdhau gavāṃ vyāpārakārakau //
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k
body.l: saṃgrāmān subahūn kṛtvā labdhalakṣāv api svayam /
śrutvaitad bhāṣitaṃ rāmas tayor vākyam aninditam /
eka eva vinā śiṣyair yuvayor mantrakāraṇāt //
vidito me vraje vāsas tava padmanibhekṣaṇa /
dānavānāṃ vadhaś cāpi kaṃsasya ca durātmanaḥ //
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M3(marg.).4 ins. :k
body.l: jāne tvāṃ kṛṣṇa goptāraṃ jagataḥ prabhum avyayam /
na tvayāviditaṃ kiṃcit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate /
tathāpi bhaktimātreṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te vacaḥ //
pūrvajais tava govinda pūrvaṃ puram idaṃ kṛtam /
tan neha bhavataḥ sthānaṃ rocate me nararṣabhau /
tīrtvā veṇṇām imāṃ puṇyāṃ nadīm adyaiva saṃgatāḥ /
