ramyaṃ yajñagiriṃ nāma sahyasya praruhaṃ girim /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 (M4 after 364)ins. :k
body.l: uṣya tatra niśām ekāṃ khaṭvāṅgāṃ nāma nimnagām /
drakṣyāmas tatra tān viprāñ śrāmyato vai tapodhanān //
tāṃ tīrtvā nimnagāṃ tatra tāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā tapodhanān /
vaṃśajas tatra te rājā kṛṣṇa dharmarataḥ sadā /
tataś cyutā gamiṣyāmaḥ sahyasya vivare girim /
udayāstamane sūryaṃ somaṃ ca jyotiṣāṃ patim //
bhavadbhyām api yuddhe tu pravṛtte tatra dāruṇe /
āyudhaiḥ saha saṃyogaṃ paśyāmi nacirād iva //
saṃgrāmaś ca mahān kṛṣṇa nirdiṣṭas tatra daivataiḥ /
tatra cakraṃ halaṃ caiva gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ tathā /
saunandaṃ musalaṃ caiva vaiṣṇavāny āyudhāni ca //
body.note: k: After line 399a, T1 G2.3.5 M4 ins. :k
body.l: sa cakramusalo nāma saṃgrāmaḥ kṛṣṇa viśrutaḥ /
tatra te kṛṣṇa saṃgrāme suvyaktaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ vapuḥ /
drakṣyanti ripavaḥ sarve surāś ca surabhāvana //
tāṃ bhajasva gadāṃ kṛṣṇa cakraṃ ca ciravismṛtam /
bhajasva svena rūpeṇa surāṇāṃ vijayāya vai //
balaś cāyaṃ halaṃ ghoraṃ musalaṃ cārimardanam /
eṣa te prathamaḥ kṛṣṇa saṃgrāmo bhuvi pārthivaiḥ /
lakṣmyāś ca tejasaś caiva vyūhānāṃ ca vidāraṇam //
bhaviṣyati mahān kṛṣṇa bhārataṃ caiva vaiśasam //
tad gaccha kṛṣṇa śailendraṃ gomantaṃ ca nagottamam /
body.note: k: For line 417, K1.3.4 Ñ2 B D2.4.5 T3.4 subst. :k
body.l: jarāsaṃdho mṛdhe cāpi vijaye tvām upasthitaḥ /
body.note: k: K2 Ñ3 V Dn Ds D1.3.6 T2 G1.4.5 M4 G(ed.) ins., K1.3.4 Ñ2 B D2.4.5 T3.4 cont. :k
body.l: pītvā gacchata bhadraṃ vo mayoddiṣṭena vartmanā //
body.note: k: K1 om. the ref. K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. after the ref., K2 after line 418:k
body.l: tat tu dhenvāḥ payaḥ pītvā baladarpasamanvitau /
body.note: k: After line 418, K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k
body.l: śobhayanti sma panthānaṃ tridivaṃ tridaśā iva //
adhvānaṃ vidhinā sarve tribhis te divasaiḥ kramāt /
gomantam agamaṃ prāptā mandaraṃ tridaśā iva //
kīrṇaṃ mṛgagaṇaiḥ kāntair mainākam iva kāmagam /
body.note: k: Ds D5 cont., K Ñ3 V1.2. B Dn D1-4.6 T2-4 ins. (Ñ2 V3 after line 438; G2.4.5 after line 446) :k
body.l: hintālaiś ca tamālaiś ca punnāgaiś copaśobhitam //
jaleṣu jalajaiś caiva sthaleṣu sthalajair api /
body.note: k: Ds Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k
k: After line 457a, K2 Ñ2.3 V1 B Ds D6 T2-4 G1.2 ins. :k
k: Ñ2.3 V1 B T3.4 cont. (K3.4 V2 Dn D2-5 ins. after line 456):k
body.l: kāñcanaiḥ sānubhir yuktaṃ visarpadbhir iva śriyam /
darībhiḥ sundarībhiś ca kandarābhis tathaiva ca //
teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu sadāram iva śobhitam /
pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca gāhayantam iva sthitam //
body.note: k: T1.3 G2.3 M ins. (T2 G1 cont. after *46):k
body.l: te tam āsādya gomantaṃ ramyaṃ bhūmidharottamam /
ruruhus te girivaraṃ kham ūrdhvam iva pakṣiṇaḥ /
te tu tasyottamaṃ śṛṅgam ārūḍhās tridaśā iva /
kṛṣṇa yāsyāmy ahaṃ tāta puraṃ sūrpārakaṃ vibho /
kṛṣṇaṃ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ caiva yāsye śūrpārakaṃ prati /
yuvayor nāsti vaimukhyaṃ saṃgrāme dānavair api //
prāptavān asmi yāṃ prītiṃ mārgānugamanād api /
sā me kṛṣṇānugṛhṇāti śarīram idam avyayam //
devānāṃ mukhya vaikuṇṭha viṣṇo devair abhiṣṭutaḥ /
body.note: k: D6 T1-3 G M G(ed.) ins. :k
k: T1.3 G3 ins. after line 4a (G2 after line 4) :k
body.l: kṛṣṇa sarvasya lokasya śṛṇu me naiṣṭhikaṃ vacaḥ //
yad idaṃ prastutaṃ karma tvayā govinda laukikam /
tasyāyaṃ prathamaḥ kalpaḥ kālena bhuvi yojitaḥ /
svayam evātmanā kṛṣṇa tvam ātmānaṃ vidhatsva ha //
pṛthivyām amarārthe ca kīrtyarthaṃ ca satāṃ vara //
body.note: k: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V1.3 Dn D2-5 T2-4 G1.4 subst. :k
body.l: kuru śīghraṃ mahābāho govinda vadatāṃ vara //
tvayi mānuṣyam āpanne yuddhe ca samupasthite //
tvarasva kṛṣṇa yuddhāya dānavānāṃ vadhāya ca /
svargāya ca narendrāṇāṃ devatānāṃ sukhāya ca //
satkṛto 'haṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa lokaiś caiva sahāmaraiḥ /
body.note: k: Ñ3 V ins. (B3 B6 subst. for line 507):k
body.l: smartavyas tatra tatrāhaṃ yatra yuddhaṃ bhavet sadā /
na ca kṛtyaṃ mayā tubhyaṃ tvaṃ ca kartā jagadguruḥ /
māṃ smṛtvā yo raṇaṃ yāti dhruvaṃ tasya jayo bhavet /
body.note: k: B1 Ds2 D5 cont. (Ñ3 V B3 D6 after *54); K Ñ2 Dn Ds1 D1-4 T G M4 ins. :k
body.l: ity uktvā jāmadagnyas tu kṛṣṇam akliṣṭakāriṇam /
atha saṃkarṣaṇaḥ śrīmān vinā kṛṣṇena vīryavān /
sa phullasya kadambasya pracchāye niṣasāda ha /
tṛṣito madirānveṣī tatas taṃ tarum ākṣipat //
tasya prāvṛṣi phullasya yad ambho jaladojjhitam /
tāṃ tu tṛṣṇābhibhūtātmā pibann ārta ivāsakṛt /
madāc ca calitākāraḥ samajāyata sa prabhuḥ //
madirā rūpiṇī bhūtvā kāntiś ca śaśinaḥ priyā /
śrīś ca devī variṣṭhā strī svayam evāmbujadhvajā //
ahaṃ te dayitā kāntā vāruṇī samupasthitā //
tṛṣitaṃ manyamānā tvāṃ svena rūpeṇa chāditā //
tvayopayoktum icchāmi saṃmatas tvaṃ hi me guruḥ //
nāhaṃ tvayā vinā lokān utsahe deva sevitum //
ahaṃ candrād api guruṃ sahasraśirasaṃ prabhum /
svair guṇair anuraktā tvāṃ yathaiva madirā tathā //
śrīś ca padmālayā devī vidheyā vaiṣṇavorasi /
sā mālām amalāṃ gṛhya balasyorasi daṃśitā /
body.note: k: Ñ3 V2 B2 D6 T1.2 G2-5 M G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: yady asti mayi kāruṇyaṃ vijñāpyaṃ śrūyatām idam /
kāntyā mayā ca deveśa saṃgataś candramā yathā //
iyaṃ ca sā mayā maulir uddhṛtā varuṇālayāt /
mūrdhni śīrṣasahasrasya yā te bhānur ivābabhau //
saṃgṛhya tam alaṃkāraṃ tāś ca tisraḥ surastriyaḥ /
mudaṃ paramikāṃ lebhe grahamuktaḥ śaśī yathā //
tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ saṃlāpe vartamāne gṛhe yathā /
viṣṇoḥ kirīṭaṃ daityena hṛtaṃ vairocanena vai //
tadarthaṃ tena saṃgrāmaḥ kṛto gurvartham ojasā /
mokṣayitvā kirīṭaṃ tu vaiṣṇavaṃ patatāṃ varaḥ /
sa dadarśa guruṃ śaile viṣṇuṃ kāryāntarāgatam /
abhijñas tasya bhāvānām garutmān patatāṃ varaḥ /
cikṣepa khagato mauliṃ viṣṇoḥ śirasi hṛṣṭavat //
body.note: k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k
k: M1-3 (G2.5 M4 after line 1 of *61) ins. :k
body.l: saṃyuktaḥ kṛṣṇaśirasā sa maulim adhikaṃ babhau /
tvarate tu kāryārtho devatānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
mūrdhni dṛṣṭvātra daityena hṛtā kṣiptvā garutmatā /
body.note: k: V3 (cont.) K2 Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn2 Ds2 D2.5.6 T1.2 G4 M4 (Dn after line 598) ins. :k
body.l: śakrasya sadṛśaṃ rūpaṃ divyam āsthāya sāgarāt /
body.note: k: K2 Ñ2.3 V1.3 B3 Ds D2.6 G M4 subst. (V2 B1.2D4.5 T1.3 ins. after line 598) :k
k: K Ñ3 V1.2 B D T2-4 G1.4 M4 subst. for line 602:k
body.l: chatrāṇy ārya virājante daṃśitāni sitāni ca //
abhivartanti naḥ śubhrā yathā khe haṃsapaṅktayaḥ //
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k
body.l: etāni nūnaṃ samare pārthivair āyudhāni ca /
kāle khalu nṛpaḥ prāpto jarāsaṃdho mahīpatiḥ /
ārya tiṣṭhāva sahitau na khalv anvāgate nṛpe /
evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saṃsthaḥ saṃgrāmalālasaḥ /
vīkṣamāṇaś ca tān sarvān nṛpān yaduvaro 'vyayaḥ /
ātmānam ātmanovāca yat pūrvaṃ divi mantritam //
ime te pṛthivīpālāḥ pārthive vartmani sthitāḥ /
prokṣitān khalv imān anye mṛtyunā nṛpasattamān /
body.note: k: K1 Ñ1.3 V B2 Dn Ds D2-4.6 ins. :k
k: After the ref., Ds1(marg.) ins. :k
body.l: nirgataṃ sa hariṃ jñātvā mathurāto mahīpatiḥ /
tatas te calitāḥ sarve gomantaṃ sabalā nṛpāḥ /
sa rathair neminirghoṣair gajaiś ca madasiñjitaiḥ /
heṣadbhiś caiva turagaiḥ kṣveḍitograiś ca pattibhiḥ //
saṃnādayan diśaḥ sarvāḥ sarvāṃś cāpi guhāśayān /
body.note: k: D6 S (except T4) G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: rathī khaḍgī śarī cāpī niṣaṅgī hemakuṇḍalī /
kim etair nṛpasiṃhaiś ca ity avocan mahābalaḥ /
turagaiś ca sitābhrābhaiḥ pattibhiś cāpi daṃśitaḥ /
babhau tasya niviṣṭasya babhau śrīḥ śibirasya vai /
vītarātre tataḥ kāle nṛpās te kṛtakautukāḥ /
cerur mā śabda ity evaṃ bruvanto rājaśāsanāt //
ūrdhvaṃ cāpi pravāhyantāṃ prāsā vai tomarāṇi ca //
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: ūrdhvaṃ prekṣamāṇārthāya dṛḍhāni ca laghūni ca /
yathā narapatiḥ prāha tathā śighraṃ vidhīyatām //
dāryatām eṣa ṭaṅkaughaiḥ khanitaiś ca nagottamaḥ /
teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu śīghram āruhyatāṃ giriḥ //
drumaḥ kiṃpuruṣaś caiva pārvatīyāś ca mānavāḥ /
pauravo veṇudāriś ca vaidarbhaḥ somakas tathā /
rukmī ca bhojādhipatiḥ sūryākṣaś caiva yāvanaḥ //
chāgaliḥ purumitraś ca virāṭaś ca mahīpatiḥ /
bhūriśravās trigartaś ca bāṇaḥ pañcanadas tathā /
ulūkaḥ kaitaveyaś ca vīraś cāṃśumataḥ sutaḥ /
uttamaujās tathā sālvaḥ kairaleyaś ca kaiśikaḥ /
vaidiśo vāmadevaś ca suketuś cāpi vīryavān //
pūrvaṃ parvatanirvyūham eteṣv āyattam astu naḥ /
ahaṃ ca daradaś caiva cedirājaś ca saṃgataḥ /
evam eṣa giriḥ kṣipraṃ samantād veṣṭito balaiḥ /
gadino ye gadābhis te parighaiḥ parighāyudhāḥ /
body.note: k: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2.6 ins. :k
body.l: gomantaṃ veṣṭayām āsuḥ sāgarāḥ pṛthivīm iva /
uvāca rājā cedīnāṃ devānāṃ maghavā iva //
kiṃ no yuddhena durge 'smin gomante ca nagottame /
kāṣṭhais tṛṇaiś ca bahubhiḥ parivārya samantataḥ /
adyaiva dīpyatāṃ kṣipram alam anyena karmaṇā //
na yuktāḥ parvate durge niyoktuṃ pādayodhinaḥ //
śakya eṣa giris tāta devair apy abhimarditum //
vayaṃ bahava ity evaṃ nāpy eṣa nipuṇo nayaḥ /
yādavau nāvamantavyau dvāv apy etau raṇe sthitau //
karmabhis tv amarau vidmo bālāv atibalānvitau //
karmabhis tv atulair vīrāv ubhāv api balotkaṭau /
body.note: k: K Ñ V B D T G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: vākyam etat tu ruruce sabalānāṃ mahīkṣitām /
tataḥ kāṣṭhais tṛṇair vaṃśaiḥ śuṣkaśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ /
dadus te sarvatas tūrṇaṃ pāvakaṃ tatra pārthivāḥ /
sa dahyamānaḥ śailendro mumoca vipulāḥ śilāḥ /
dhātubhiḥ pacyamānaiś ca jvaladbhiś caiva pādapaiḥ /
pratataṃ dahyamānas tu sa śailaḥ kṛṣṇavartmanā /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: vajreṇa puruhūtasya yathā syād dāritas tathā //
babhūvuś ca mahāśabdāḥ śiloccaiḥ sphāṭitair nṛpa /
kṛṣṇavartmā pumān natvā tayor agre samāgataḥ //
namaś cakāra haraye uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ /
tvaṃ tv enaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva kavacaṃ rāmasaṃyutam /
tvām ayaṃ na mahābhāga parābhūtāgnim ulbaṇaḥ /
ity uktvā pradadau vahniḥ kavacadvayam uttamam //
tatas tv antardadhe rājann ekaikaṃ rāmakṣṛṇayoḥ /
na tu cakre tayoḥ sparśaṃ vahnitāpo mahīpate //
ādīpya taṃ te śailendraṃ kṣatriyā vyūhadaṃśitāḥ /
saroṣaṃ hi tadā rāmo vacanaṃ keśisūdanam /
ayaṃ yady āvayor arthe gomantas tāta dahyate /
ayaśasyam idaṃ loke kaulīnaṃ ca bhaviṣyati //
kṣatriyān nihaniṣyāmi dorbhyām iva yudhāṃ vara //
ete te kṣatriyāḥ sarve girim ādīpya daṃśitāḥ /
evam uktvā gireḥ śṛṅgān meruśṛṅgād ivoḍurāṭ /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k
body.l: tatas taṃ pīḍayām āsa padbhyāṃ girivaraṃ hariḥ //
sa pīḍito giris tena nirmamajja samantataḥ /
sa tena vāriṇā vahnis tatkṣaṇāt praśamaṃ yayau /
body.note: k: Aftr line 775a, D6 T1-3 G M2.4 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: rāmād anantaraṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pluto rāmād anantaraḥ //
tābhyām avaplutābhyāṃ ca caraṇaiḥ pīḍito giriḥ /
body.note: k: K2 Ñ2.3 V B D (except D3) T1-3 G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: tau nagād āplutau dṛṣṭvā vasudevasutāv ubhau /
body.note: k: After the ref., D6 S (except T4) ins. :k
body.l: tato devāḥ sagandharvā yakṣāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
tuṣṭuvur devam īśānaṃ mantrair bhāgavatais tadā //
bāhupraharaṇau tau tu ceratus tatra yādavau /
tābhyām mṛdhe praviṣṭābhyāṃ yādavābhyāṃ matis tv abhūt /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 (T1 G2.3 M4 after line 785) ins. :k
body.l: yāni vai māthure yuddhe prāptāny āhavaśobhinoḥ //
body.note: k: T1 G2.3.5 M4 cont. (M3 ins. after line 784) :k
k: K Ñ2.3 V B D ins. :k
body.l: nikṣipya yāni tatraiva tāni prāptau sma yādavau /
halaṃ saṃvartakaṃ nāma saunandaṃ musalaṃ tathā /
cakraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma gadā kaumodakī tathā //
khaḍgaṃ ca kheṭakaṃ caiva tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau //
jagrāha prathamaṃ rāmo halam apratimaṃ raṇe /
nāmnā sudarśanaṃ nāma prīto jagrāha keśavaḥ //
body.note: k: V2 B3 Dn D2 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: nāmnā śārṅgam iti khyātaṃ prīto jagrāha vīryavān //
samare pratirūpau tau viṣṇur eko dvidhākṛtaḥ /
halam udyamya rāmas tu sarpendram iva kopitam /
cakāra roṣaṃ saphalaṃ nāgeṣu ca hayeṣu ca //
dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttiṃ vaḥ samare kātarātmanām //
bhītāḥ kiṃ vinivartadhvaṃ dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttitām //
body.note: k: Ñ2.3 V B1.2 Dn Ds D5.6 ins. :k
body.l: atha vā tiṣṭhata rathaiḥ prekṣakāḥ samavasthitāḥ /
yāvad etau raṇe gopau preṣayāmi yamakṣayam //
tatas te kṣatriyāḥ sarve jarāsaṃdhena coditāḥ /
tad yuddham abhavat tatra tayos teṣāṃ ca saṃyuge /
gadābhiś caiva gurvībhiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ /
na śekus te raṇe sthātuṃ pārthivāḥ naṣṭacetasaḥ //
rathayūthāni bhagnāni na śekuś calituṃ raṇe //
petur gatāsavas tatra yathā vajrahatās tathā //
vaiṣṇavānāṃ nṛpās te tu draṣṭum apy abalīyasaḥ //
body.note: k: After line 860a, T1 G2.3.5 M1.2.4 ins. :k
body.l: rakṣāṃsi ca piśācāś ca dṛśyante 'tra sahasraśaḥ /
rudhirodā nadī tatra cchādayām āsa medinīm //
body.note: k: D6 T1-3 G M1.2.4 ins. :k
body.l: jāmbuke ca tathā yūthe rākṣaseṣu samantataḥ //
body.note: k: T1-3 G M (D6 after line 876) ins. :k
body.l: śārṅgaṃ caiva mahācāpaṃ bāṇāni vividhāni ca /
body.note: k: K2 Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Ds D2-5 T1-3 G1.3-5 M ins. (D6 cont. after *95):k
body.l: kiṃ nu yudhyata vai śūrā hastyaśvarathasaṃyutāḥ /
kim idaṃ gamyate śūrāḥ kṛtāstrā nṛpapuṃgavāḥ /
ahaṃ sapūrvajaḥ saṃkhye padātiḥ pramukhe sthitaḥ //
taṃ dṛṣṭvā roṣatāmrākṣo halī musalam ādade /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T3.4 (T2 G1.4.5 after second occurrence of line 882):k
body.l: babhāṣe sa tu tāmrākṣaṃ ukṣāṇam iva sevanī /
ehy ehi rāma yudhyasva mayā sārdham ariṃdama //
evam ukte tu nṛpatir darado nāma vīryavān /
tad yuddham abhavat tābhyāṃ rāmasya daradasya ca /
yojayitvā tataḥ skandhe rāmo daradam āhave /
tāv ubhau paramācāryau loke khyātau mahābalau /
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
savyaṃ maṇḍalam āśritya baladevas tu dakṣiṇam //
dantābhyām iva mātaṅgau nādayantau diśo daśa //
gadā gadābhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vindhyaṃ girim ivānalaḥ //
rāmasya tu gadāvegaṃ rājā sa magadheśvaraḥ /
sehe dhairyeṇa mahatā śikṣayā ca vyapohayat //
na tvayā rāma vadhyo 'yam alaṃ khedena mānada //
vihito 'sya mayā mṛtyus tasmāt sādhu vyupārama /
jarāsaṃdhas tu tac chrutvā vimanāḥ samapadyata /
na prāharat tatas tasmai punar eva halāyudhaḥ //
body.note: k: Dn Bom. Poona eds. ins. :k
body.l: tau vyupāramatāṃ yuddhād vṛṣṇayas te ca pārthivāḥ /
body.note: k: T3 G2.5 M4 G(ed.) ins. (D6 after line 919) :k
body.l: punar āhatya rājānaṃ muṣṭinā ca samāhanat /
talenāhatya tarasā gadayā sa punaḥ punaḥ //
upāramat tadā yuddhāc cāpaṃ saśaram eva ca //
te nṛpāś coditair nāgaiḥ syandanais turagais tathā /
body.note: k: D6 T2.3 G1.2.4.5 M4 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: tena sarve nṛpatayo bhītā rājan diśo gatāḥ /
punaś ca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ śaṅkharājaṃ samāśvasat //
pūrvajena tadā kṛṣṇa śrāntena yudhi bhārata //
body.note: k: T1 G3 M1-3 ins. (T2 G1.5 cont. after *103) :k
body.l: jarāsaṃdhe gate rājñi kṛṣṇād bhīte raṇotsavāt /
sabalas tvām upāvṛttas tvaṃ hi me dayitaḥ prabho //
tad eṣa sa parityakto mama vākyasya dūṣakaḥ /
bhagno yuddhe jarāsaṃdhas tvayā dravati sānugaḥ //
tvayy eva bhūyo 'py aparaṃ darśayiṣyati kilbiṣam //
body.note: k: D6 T3 G2.3.5 M ins. :k
body.l: tad imāṃ saṃtyajāśu tvaṃ mahīṃ hatanarākulām /
sṛgālaṃ vāsudevaṃ vai drakṣyamas tatra pārthivam //
tad gaccha rāmasahitaḥ sahāyaiḥ saha saṃgataḥ /
pitṛṣvasuḥ pater vākyaṃ śrutvā cedipates tadā /
vākyaṃ hṛṣṭamanāḥ kṛṣṇo jagāda jagato guruḥ //
cedinātha sanāthau svaḥ saṃvṛttau tava darśanāt /
nāvayoḥ kiṃcid aprāpyaṃ yayos tvaṃ bandhur īdṛśaḥ //
jarāsaṃdhasya nidhanaṃ ye cānye tatsamā nṛpāḥ /
yuddham apratimaṃ viddhi pravṛttaṃ nau raṇe nṛpaiḥ /
mayā tena mahārāja jarāsaṃdhena vai tadā /
saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān vṛttaḥ pratyakṣaṃ tava cedipa //
yadūnāṃ prathamo bandhus tvaṃ hi sarvamahīkṣitām /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 ins. :k
body.l: śravaṇād dhāraṇāc cāsya svargalokaṃ vrajanti vai //
śivāya ca śive deśe niviṣṭās tridaśopamāḥ //
body.note: k: After the ref., D6 T1-3 G1.3-5 M (G after line 965) ins. :k
body.l: prātaḥ praviśya taddvāri dvāḥsthaṃ vacanam abravīt /
dvāḥstho 'py atha tathety uktvā tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayat //
sāvitre niyame pūrṇe yaṃ dadau savitā svayam /
sa sṛgālo 'bhyayāt kṛṣṇaṃ śalabhaḥ pāvakaṃ yathā //
body.note: k: D6 T1-3 G1.3-5 M ins. :k
body.l: rathī khaḍgī śarī cāpī niṣaṅgī kuṇḍalī balī /
muhur muhur jyācapalaṃ vikṣipan duḥsahaṃ dhanuḥ /
gurutvena ca nāmyantī cacālorvī yathā purā //
sṛgālaṃ lokapālābhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇo na vivyathe //
sṛgālaś cāpi saṃrabdhaḥ taṃ rathaṃ sādhu coditam /
sa tasya vismayaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratiyoddhum upasthitaḥ /
tad yuddham abhavat tābhyāṃ samare ghoradarśanam /
ubhābhyām iva mattābhyāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ yathā vane //
body.note: k: D6 T1-3 G1.3-5 M ins. :k
body.l: sṛgālābhaṃ sṛgālaṃ ca jaghāna navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
tataḥ pañcaśatā viṣṇuṃ sṛgālo 'tha jaghāna ha /
tair astrais tau tu rājendra vāsudevau raṇotsukau /
yuyudhāte ruṣā yuktau saṃdaṣṭoṣṭhau tadā raṇe //
māheśvaraṃ sṛgālas tu raudraṃ caiva janārdanaḥ /
gomāyur atha yāmyaṃ tu kālam astraṃ janardanaḥ //
te śastre niṣphale rājan bhūmiṃ jagmatur āture /
kṣurapreṇa sṛgālas tu chettum aicchat tu śārṅgiṇaḥ /
jyāṃ jātaroṣo dhanuṣā tasya devasya paśyataḥ //
taj jñātvā bhagavān viṣṇur dhanuś ciccheda sāyakaiḥ /
visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ punar anyat samādade //
tac cāpi bhagavān viṣṇuś ciccheda ca nanāda ca /
punar anyat samādatte cāpaṃ bhārasahaṃ nṛpa //
tena cāpena govindaṃ jaghāna niśitaiḥ śataiḥ /
navatyā ca punar viṣṇur navabhiś ca punar nṛpaḥ //
aśītyā ca punar devaṃ samājaghne paraḥ śaraiḥ /
śarāṇām atha lakṣāṇāṃ samājaghne hariṃ ruṣā //
tataḥ kruddho 'tha bhagavāṃś ciccheda dhanur uttamam /
sārathiṃ cāsya hatvā tu jaghāna prāṣṭhisārathim //
tataḥ sṛgālo vikrāntaś cāpaṃ bhārasahaṃ mahat /
ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtvā dhanus tadā //
sṛgālas tv abravīt kṛṣṇaṃ samare samupasthitam /
gomante yuddhamārgeṇa yat tvayā kṛṣṇa ceṣṭitam /
sa me suviditaḥ kṛṣṇa kṣatriyāṇāṃ parājayaḥ /
kva yāsyasi mayā ruddho raṇeṣv apariniṣṭhitaḥ //
na cāham ekaṃ sabalo yuktas tvāṃ yoddhum āhave /
aham ekas tvam apy eko dvau yudhyāva raṇe sthitau //
kiṃ janena nirastena tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca raṇe sthitaḥ /
hate mayi tvam eko vā vāsudevo bhaviṣyasi //
iṣṭataḥ praharasveti tam uktvā cakram ādade //
pātayām āsa govinde sa sṛgālaḥ pratāpavān //
body.note: k: After line 1020a, D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. :k
body.l: yadi śaknoṣi rājendra vahaitac cakram udyatam /
chetsyāmi te śiraḥ kāyāc cakreṇānena rājaka /
body.note: k: Ñ2 V2.3 Ds2 D2 (marg.) ins. :k
body.l: tataḥ sudarśanaṃ cakraṃ punar āyād guroḥ karam //
tasya sainyāny apayayur vimanāṃsi hate nṛpe //
body.note: k: K Ñ3 V2 B Dn Ds D1.3-6 T1.3.4 G2.4.5 (Ñ2 V1.3 D2 after line 1029) ins. :k
body.l: kecit tatraiva śocantaḥ smarantaḥ sukṛtāni ca /
patitaṃ bhūmipaṃ bhūmau na tyajanti sma duḥkhitāḥ //
na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam iti tān abhyabhāṣata //
patito vai sṛgālākhyo bhraṣṭaḥ san dīnamānasaḥ //
te sma paśyanti patitaṃ dharaṇyāṃ dharaṇīpatim /
vilapanti sma te sarve sacivāḥ saprajā bhṛśam /
tās taṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ślāghyaṃ bhūmipatiṃ patim /
urāṃsy urasijāṃś caiva śirojāny ākulāny api /
nirdayaṃ tāḍayantyas tā visvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ //
petur ūrdhvabhujāḥ sarvāḥ kṛttamūlā latā iva //
tāḥ patiṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyo hṛdi tāḍitāḥ /
śakradevaṃ pituḥ pārśve dviguṇaṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ //
imaṃ te paśya vikrāntaṃ bālaṃ putram apaṇḍitam /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.2.5 ins. :k
body.l: tvadvihīnaḥ katham ayaṃ pade sthāsyati paitṛke /
katham ekapade tyaktvā gato 'sy antaḥpuraṃ param //
atṛptās tava saukhyānāṃ kiṃ kurmo vidhavā vayam //
gṛhītvā taṃ sutaṃ tatra vāsudevam upasthitā //
yas tvayā pātito vīra raṇaproktena karmaṇā /
tasya pretagatasyāyaṃ putras tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ //
yadi tvāṃ praṇametāsau kuryād vā śāsanaṃ punaḥ /
body.note: k: Ñ1.2 T1 G3 M subst. for line 1052 (V3 T3 ins.):k
body.l: yadi tvaṃ bāndhavaḥ ślāghyaḥ putrasya praṇatasya me /
yadi kuryād ayaṃ mūḍhas tvayi bāndhavakaṃ vidhim /
tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mahiṣyā yadunandanaḥ /
mṛdupūrvam idaṃ vākyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ //
prakṛtisthā vayaṃ jātā devi saiṣo 'smi bāndhavaḥ //
roṣo me vigataḥ sādhvi tava vākyair akilbiṣaiḥ /
yo 'yaṃ putraḥ sṛgālasya mamāpy eṣa na saṃśayaḥ //
abhayaṃ cābhiṣekaṃ ca dadāmy asmai sukhāya vai /
tataḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvāḥ purodhā mantriṇas tathā /
body.note: k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.2.4.5 ins. :k
body.l: sahitau tāv anugatau mathurāṃ prati jagmatuḥ /
body.note: k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. (after line 1072) :k
body.l: āpṛcchya keśavaṃ rājā svāṃ purīṃ pratijagmivān //
body.note: k: D6 T2 G1.4.5 cont.;; K B Dn Ds D1-5 T3.4 G2 ins. (after line 1072):k
body.l: naidhanena vidhānena cakrus te tasya satkriyām /
prodyattejombujākṣaṃ hṛdaya bhaja sadā tvaṃ vapuḥ prāṃśu jiṣṇoḥ |
tau tu svalpena kālena pañcarātroṣitau pathi /
body.note: k: After line 1073a, K Ñ1.2 V3 Dn D2.3.5.6 T3 G2 ins. :k
k: After line 1073, K1(marg.).2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1.4.6 T1.3 G2.3.5 M ins. :k
body.l: jagmatuḥ sahitau vīrau mudā paramayā yutau //
body.note: k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahāśaṅkhaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ ca yādavaḥ /
body.note: k: Ds D5 T2 G2 ins. :k
body.l: akrūraḥ sātyakiś caiva mantriṇaś ca yathocitāḥ /
sve pure nibhayāḥ sarve krīḍadhvaṃ yādavāḥ sukham //
na tatra kaścid dīno vā malino vā vicetanaḥ /
śivāś ca pravavur vātā virajaskā diśo daśa /
daivatāni ca sarvāṇi hṛṣṭāny āyataneṣv api //
yāni liṅgāni lokasya vṛttānīha kṛte yuge /
tāni sarvāṇy adṛśyanta bhrātror āgamanaṃ prati //
hariyuktena tau vīrau praviṣṭau mathurāṃ purīm //
viśantaṃ nagarīṃ ramyāṃ govindaṃ rāmam eva ca /
tāv āyudhāni vinyasya gṛhe sve svairacāriṇau /
body.note: k: K1(marg.).2 Ñ2 Dn G2 (Ñ3 V B2 after line 1100) ins. :k
body.l: tatas tau vasudevasya pādau samabhipīḍya ca /
kṛtvā prayāṇaṃ gomantād rājā sa magadheśvaraḥ /
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No. 18A, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, 22.06.2003, version of June 2003. :h
k: After line 880 of App.I No. 18, D6 S ins. :k
body.l: ity uktvā pārthivān sarvān kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇāmbudopamaḥ /
pralaptaś ca tathā rājā viṣṇunā prabhviṣṇunā //
dhnavī bāṇi rathī khaḍgī kuṇḍalī kavacī balī /
śūrāṇām agraṇīḥ sākṣād eka evātulo nṛpaḥ /
kim etais tucchavākyair hi tiṣṭhedānīṃ mamāgrataḥ /
yad balaṃ yac ca te vīryaṃ darśayasva yadīcchasi //
eṣa tvāṃ prahariṣyāmi tiṣṭha tāvad raṇe kṣaṇam //
ete ye nihatā gopa rājāno balamohitāḥ /
eṣa tvāṃ darśayiṣyāmi yamarājānam eva hi /
ity uktvā sa jarāsaṃdhaḥ kṛṣṇam abhyadravad raṇe //
taṃ dṛṣṭvā roṣatāmrākṣaṃ kṛṣṇo vākyam uvāca ha /
eṣa te pramukhe rājan sthito 'haṃ kiṃ vikatthase /
naitāvatā raṇe rājañ śūrāḥ santi nṛpottamāḥ //
śarair vā yadi vā śastrair darśayasva parākramam /
ity uktvā sa jagannāthaḥ sarveṣām agraṇīr hariḥ /
suparṇadhvajam āsthāya kṛṣṇas tu ratham uttamam /
tam abhyayāj jarāsaṃdhaṃ śarair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ //
sārathiṃ cāsya vivyādha pañcabhiḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
senānīḥ kauśikaś caiva kṛṣṇaṃ vivyādha pañcabhiḥ //
tribhir vivyādha saṃkruddhaḥ kāmapālaṃ tu kauśikaḥ /
sajyaṃ kṛtvā mahāvīraḥ keśavaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
punar vivyādha niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ śailopamais tathā /
taṃ citrasenaḥ saṃrabdho vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
tribhis tribhiś ca nārācais tān bibheda janārdanaḥ /
pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiś caiva baladevas tu tān arīn //
jarāsaṃdhas tu balavān keśavaṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ //
punar navatyā vivyādha punaś caiva hi saptabhiḥ /
utsṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ gadām ādāya vīryavān //
jaghāna ca tadā viṣṇuṃ bāhudeśe balī tadā /
gadayā caiva govindo jaghānāsya ca vakṣasi //
hariś ca gadayā rājañ jarāsaṃdham amarṣaṇam //
hataḥ kṛṣṇo hataḥ kṛṣṇa iti vācaṃ samādade //
taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ krodhād dviguṇavikramaḥ /
punaś ca gadayā rāmo lalāṭe taṃ jaghāna ha /
ciccheda tāṃ gadāṃ vīraḥ kṛṣṇasya puratas tadā //
jarāsaṃdhas tu balavān utsṛjya mahatīṃ gadām /
ādāya niśitāṃ ghorāṃ tāṃ jaghāna halāyudham /
punaś ca gadayā taṃ tu lalāṭe 'bhyahanad balī //
muṣṭinā ca samāhatya gadayā ca tadā bhṛśam /
siṃhanādaṃ tataś cakre rājā sa magadheśvaraḥ //
etasminn antare viṣṇuḥ saṃjñāṃ prāpya jarāsutam /
jarāputras tadā tasmai prāhiṇoc chaktim uttamām //
tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya gṛhītvā viṣṇur avyayaḥ /
tasminn eva dadau vīraḥ sākṣād viṣṇur baler iva //
sa tayā tāḍito rājā papāta ca mumoha ca /
ubhau tau lokavikhyātau bale cāstre ca viśrutau /
ubhāv eva raṇe vīrau yuddhe ca pariviśrutau //
etasminn antare viṣṇuḥ śārṅgam ādāya vīryavān /
arditaḥ sa tu rājendro gadayāpothayad dharim /
sa hitvā tu tadā śārṅgaṃ gadayā taṃ jaghāna ha //
tadantare prāha vīro darado nāma pārthivaḥ /
na yuktaṃ rāma rāmeti parāsaktaṃ prati prabho //
taṃ dṛṣṭvā roṣatāmrākṣo halī musalam ādade /
tayos tad yuddham abhavad gajayūthapayor iva //
body.note: h: HV (CE) App.I No. 19, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, 22.06.2003, version of June 2003. :h
k: T1.3 G3 M cont. after App.I No. 18: :k
body.l: sabalaḥ sānugaś caiva kiṃ matvā svagṛhaṃ gataḥ //
purataḥ kṛtavān brahman na yuktaṃ pratibhāti me /
lajjākaram idaṃ manye tasya rājño dvijottama /
pṛṣṭhataś ca samāgamya purastāt paśyator yayau //
kim uttaraṃ tato rājā jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān /
etad ācakṣva me brahman vistareṇa tapodhana //
dagdhvā prayāto gomantād rājā sa magadheśvaraḥ /
na śarma labhate rātrau na divā śokakarśitaḥ //
nṛpān sarvān samāhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt //
sa sarvaiḥ pārthivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mantrayām āsa mantravit /
aho dhik pauruṣaṃ manye yad asmān prati pārthivāḥ //
nirotsyāmaḥ purīṃ ramyāṃ madhurāṃ yādavair vṛtām //
balena mahatā yuktā hantuṃ tau gopakilbiṣau //
pratijñā ca mamāpyp eṣā śrūyatāṃ pārthivottamāḥ //
yau tau gopakavīrau hi tau hatvā tu svakaṃ puram /
yāsyāmi satyam etad dhi balair bahubhir anvitaḥ //
niḥsādhanau yādavakau niṣkośā durbalā hi te //
atha sādhyā purī sarvā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
tato yūyaṃ sthirā kṛtvā buddhiṃ yuddhāya pārthivāḥ /
nirmūlā caiva sā kāryā bhavadbhiḥ khyātakīrtibhiḥ //
body.note: h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 20, transliterated by François Painchaud, proof--read by André Couture, version of December 2004 :h
k: After adhy. 83, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T2-4 G1.2.4.5 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: prakāśaṃ sma kathās tatra śrūyante manujeritāḥ /
rukmiṇī kila nānmā strī rukmiṇaḥ prathitā svasā //
bhāvī svayaṃvaras tatra tasyāḥ kila janārdana //
ity artham ete nṛvarā gacchanti sabalānugāḥ //
śrutvaitat keśavo vākyaṃ hṛdi śalyam ivārpitam /
niryayuḥ syandanair divyair garvitās tridaśā iva //
body.note: k: For the second occurrence of line 29, Ñ2 V3 subst. :k
k: Note: The next star--passage is numbered *5; *3 and *4 do not exist. :k
body.l: tiṣṭha tvaṃ nṛpaśārdūla bhrātrā me sahito 'nagha //
purīṃ śūnyām imāṃ vīra jaghanyāḥ pīḍayanti naḥ //
śrūyatāṃ yad ahaṃ tv adya vakṣyāmi ripusūdana //
tvayā vihināḥ sarve sma na śaktāḥ sukham āsitum /
pure 'smin viṣayānte vā patihīnā iva striyaḥ //
bibhīmo na narendrāṇāṃ sendrāṇām api mānada /
tasya rājño vacaḥ śrutvā sasmitaṃ devakīsutaḥ /
yatheṣṭaṃ bhavatām adya tathā kartāsmy asaṃśayam //
evam uktvā tu kṛṣṇo hi jagāmāśu rathena vai /
raṅgaṃ suvipulaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājasīṃ tanum āviśat //
kampitā manujāḥ sarve nyubjāś ca patitā bhuvi /
tān saṃnipatitān dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇo girir ivācalaḥ /
taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dhvajaṃ prāptaṃ sacivaṃ sāṃparāyikam /
etasminn eva kale tu rājā nayaviśāradaḥ /
argham ācamanaṃ dattvā sa rājā kaiśikaḥ svayam /
pūrvam eva tu kṛṣṇāya kāritaṃ divyamandiram /
viveśa sabalaḥ śrīmān kailāsaṃ śaṃkaro yathā /
te kṛṣṇam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā vaineteyaṃ mahādyutim /
te sametya gatā rājan rājāno bhīmavikramāḥ /
niṣedus te nṛpavarā devā devasabhām iva //
śrūyatāṃ bho nṛpaśreṣṭhā bhīṣmakaś ca mahāmatiḥ /
yo 'sau kṛṣṇa iti khyāto vasudevasuto balī /
avaśyaṃ kurute yatnaṃ kanyāvāptir yathā bhavet //
yad atra kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sunayopetavad hitam /
yat kṛtaṃ sumahad ghoraṃ bhavadbhir viditaṃ hi tat //
kaḥ sthāsyati raṇe tasminn api śakraḥ suraiḥ saha //
yadā cāsmai nāpi sutā kadācit saṃpradīyate /
tato hy ayaṃ balād enāṃ netuṃ śaktaḥ suraiḥ saha //
purā ekārṇave ghore śrūyate medinī tv iyam /
kālanemiś ca daityo vai devatānāṃ bhayapradaḥ /
kaṃsaṃ ca balināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sagaṇaṃ devakīsutaḥ /
taṃ manye keśavaṃ viṣṇuṃ surādyam asurāntakam /
iti me niścitā buddhir jāto 'yaṃ mathurādhipaḥ /
kule mahati vai rājñāṃ vipule cakravartinām /
katham anyasya martyasya garuḍo vāhanaṃ bhavet //
kaḥ sthāsyati pumān adya garuḍasyāgrato balī //
viṣṇor āgamane caiva mahān doṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ bhūpaṃ magadhānāṃ janeśvaram /
samudrāḥ kṣubhitāḥ sarve cacālādrir mahī muhuḥ /
vayaṃ sarve susaṃtrastaḥ kim utpāteti viklavāḥ //
yadā saṃnahya yudhyeta ārūḍhaḥ keśavena saḥ /
kṛto naravarair ādyair yaśodharmasya vai nidhiḥ //
yadi sā varayed anyaṃ rājñāṃ madhye nṛpātmajā /
kṛṣṇasya bhujayor vīryaṃ kaḥ pumān prasahiṣyati //
tadartham āgataḥ kṛṣṇo vayaṃ caiva narādhipāḥ //
ity evam ukte vacane sunīthena mahātmanā /
yuktapūrvam idaṃ manye yad asmākaṃ vaco hitam //
ka eṣa nikhilaṃ vaktuṃ śakto vai rājasaṃsadi //
kiṃ tv anusmaraṇārthe 'haṃ yad bravīmi śṛṇuṣva me /
kim atra doṣo gauṇo vā kanyāhetoḥ samāgatāḥ //
tatra yuddhakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ kathaṃ vaḥ kartum arhatha //
kim atra vihito doṣo yenāsmābhir vayodhikaiḥ /
puraṃ balaṃ samutsṛjya gomantaṃ parvataṃ gatau /
pratiyuddhe kṛte tv evaṃ dūṣayāmo janārdanam //
yatra yatra prayāsyāmo vayaṃ tatra bhavet kaliḥ /
martye 'smin puruṣendro 'sau na kaścit prākṛto naraḥ /
devānām api kartāsau lokānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
na deve bāliśā buddhir na cerṣyā na ca matsaraḥ //
na stabdho na kṛśo nārtaḥ praṇatārtiharaḥ sadā /
eṣa viṣṇuḥ prabhur devo devānām api daivatam //
iyaṃ yātrā vijānīdhvaṃ prītyarthaṃ hy āgato hariḥ /
evaṃ saṃdhānataḥ kṛtvā kṛṣṇena sahitā vayam /
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā dantavaktrasya dhīmataḥ /
sālvaḥ pravadatāṃ śreṣṭhas tān uvāca narādhipān //
kiṃ bhayenāsya naḥ sarve nyastaśastrā bhavāmahe /
parastavena kiṃ kāryaṃ vinindya balam ātmanaḥ /
teṣāṃ kāpuruṣā buddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavitum arhati //
ahaṃ jānāmi vai kṛṣṇam ādidevaṃ sanātanam /
saṃgrāmam atulaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇunā saha bhūmipāḥ /
taṃ ca jānāmi rājendrāḥ kālenāyuḥkṣayo bhavet //
nākāle mriyate kaścit prāpte kāle na jīvati /
evaṃ viniścayaṃ budhvā na kuryāt kasyacid bhayam //
sa eva bhagavān viṣṇur ālokya tapasaḥ kṣayam /
evamādīni cānyāni viṣṇoś ceṣṭāni vai nṛpāḥ /
tasmād asmāsu yuktaṃ tad bhavatāṃ vigrahe matiḥ /
na ca saṃgrāmahetor hi kṛṣṇasyāgamanaṃ tv iha /
yasya vā tasya vā kanyā varayiṣyati tasya sā /
kim atra vigraho rājñāṃ prītir bhavati vai dhruvam //
na kiṃcid abravīd rājā bhīṣṃakaḥ putrakāraṇāt //
kṛṣṇaṃ na sahate nityaṃ putro me baladarpitaḥ /
nityābhimānī ca raṇe na bibheti ca kasyacit //
dveṣī caivābhimānī ca kuto jīvati me sutaḥ /
jīvitaṃ nātra paśyāmi mama putrasya keśavāt //
kārayiṣye kathaṃ yuddhaṃ putreṇa saha keśavam //
na ca nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ varam icchati rukmiṇaḥ /
na ca nārāyaṇād devo varadṛṣṭas tu rukmiṇaḥ /
vṛndāvane vasañ śrīmān keśavo balināṃ varaḥ /
duṣkaraṃ karma saṃsmṛtya manaḥ sīdati me bhṛśam //
yathā vai damito nāgaḥ kāliyo yamunāhrade /
gomanto sumahad yuddhaṃ bahubhiś caiva tāv ubhau /
na nāgā na ca daityendrā na piśācā na guhyakāḥ //
tam anusmṛtya saṃgrāmaṃ bhṛśaṃ sīdati me manaḥ //
kṛtvā govardhanaṃ veśma rakṣitā gā nṛbhiḥ saha /
na mayā śrutapūrvo vā dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ kuto 'pi vā /
ye viśiṣṭāś ca rājāno vidarbhāyāṃ narādhipaiḥ /
tair āgamya svabhūpeṣu raho gatvā niveditam //
śrutvā kṛṣṇābhiṣekaṃ tu kecid dhṛṣṭā narādhipāḥ /
vyatikramam acintyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ nṛpatinā svayam //
lekham uddhṛtya śirasā viviśus te nṛpārṇavam //
hatvā kaṃsaṃ mahāvīryaṃ devair api durāsadam /
amānam atulaṃ prāpya kṣāntavān kena hetunā //
sa cāpi kṣamayā yuktaḥ kāraṇaṃ kim apekṣitam /
etad ākhyāhi bhagavan paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me //
dṛṣṭvāścaryaṃ hi naḥ sarvān dhruvaṃ pāpakṣayo bhavet /
body.note: k: After line 347a, K4 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: ataḥ pātrataraḥ ko 'nyas triṣu lokeṣu vidyate /
pātram āsādya vai rājan yathā dharmo na lupyate //
svaṃ rājyaṃ dātukāmau tau jagmatuḥ keśavāntikam //
ūcatus tau mahātmānau praṇamya śirasā harim //
adyāvāṃ saphalaṃ janma adyāvāṃ saphalaṃ yaśaḥ /
adyāvāṃ pitaras tṛptā deve tvayi gṛhāgate //
cāmaraṃ vyajanaṃ chatraṃ dhvajaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ balam /
āvām iha hi rājye tvām abhiṣiñcāva vai prabho //
āvayor yat kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ bahubhiḥ pārthivair api /
śakyate nānyathā kartuṃ jarāsaṃdhena vā svayam //
śatrus te māgadho rājā jarāsaṃdho mahādyutiḥ /
kathāṃ te bruvate nityaṃ nṛpāṇām abhayapradaḥ //
siṃhāsanam anadhyāsya puraṃ cāsya na vidyate /
na cāgamiṣyate cāsmin kanyārthe ca svayaṃvare //
iti saṃcodyamānas tu śrutvāsau bhīṣmako nṛpaḥ /
nivedayām āsa tadā tasyābhilaṣitaṃ tv idam //
tava viśrāmahetor hi kāritaṃ ca gṛhottamam /
āsyatām āsane śubhre śvaḥ prabhāte mahādyute //
preṣayām āsa tau vīrau raṅgamadhye nṛpair vṛte //
prāptam ālokya pātro'; yam iti saṃcintya bhūpatiḥ /
idam āsanam āssveti bhrātrā me sahito 'naghāḥ /
na yuktam āsanaṃ dātuṃ tvayāsīnaṃ narādhipa /
nāgamiṣyati yaḥ kaścit so 'sya vadhyo bhaviṣyati //
eṣa śakrasya saṃdeśaḥ kathito vo narādhipāḥ /
iti saṃcodya svastho 'sau devadūto gato divam /
yuṣmābhir darśane yuktam adbhutaṃ bhuvi durlabham /
dṛṣṭvāścaryaṃ hi naḥ sarvān dhruvaṃ pāpakṣayo bhavet /
āgacchadhvāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭā na bhayaṃ kartum arhatha /
māgadhasya viśeṣeṇa na vairaṃ hṛdi dṛśyate /
yad atra kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ tad bhavadbhir vicintyatām //
bhūyaḥ śuśruvū rājendra rājānaḥ sarva eva te //
na yuktaṃ vadatānyonyaṃ kṛṣṇena saha vairiṇā /
mānuṣāṇāṃ nṛpā devā nṛpāṇāṃ devatāḥ surāḥ /
tasyāpi devaḥ sa śivaḥ śivasyāpi janārdanaḥ /
eṣa viṣṇuḥ prabhur devo devānām api daivatam /
abhiṣicya suraiḥ sārdhaṃ kim icchadhvam ataḥ param //
tābhyāṃ saha nṛpaśreṣṭhāḥ kṛtvā sumahad utsavam /
jarāsaṃdhaḥ sunīthaś ca rukmiṇaś ca mahārathaḥ /
gamanāya matiṃ cakruḥ sarva eva nṛpottamāḥ //
bhiṣmakaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā prayātāḥ svabalair vṛtāḥ //
gandharvā munayaś caiva kiṃnarāś ca samantataḥ /
stuvanti munayaḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
svayam āgamya rājendro devaiḥ saha śacīpatiḥ /
body.note: k: For lines 476-477, K1.3.4 Ñ3 V1.2 B1(marg.).2 Dn D1-5 T2-4 G1.4.5 subst. :k
body.l: aṣṭau ye lokapālās te svāsu dikṣu samāsthitāḥ /
śrutvā sutumulaṃ nādaṃ sarva eva narādhipāḥ /
dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam āśritya āsanastho babhūva ha //
krathakaiśikau ca tau vīrau vāmapārśve sva āsane /
sacivaiḥ śrāvitāḥ pūrvaṃ praviṣṭās te narādhipāḥ /
yathārheṇa ca saṃpūjya rājānaḥ sarva eva te /
avijñātā nṛpāḥ sarve mānuṣo 'yām iti prabho /
bhavantam uparundhānā deva tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi //
na me vairaṃ nivasati ekāham api kaiśika /
teṣāṃ ko hetunā kopaḥ kartavyas tv avanīśvarāḥ //
yad gataṃ tad atikrāntaṃ ye mṛtās te divaṃ gatāḥ /
eṣa dharmo nṛloke 'smiñ jāyanti ca mriyanti ca //
tasmād aśocyaṃ bhavatāṃ mṛtānaṃ vai narādhipāḥ /
evam uktvā narendrāṃs tān āśvāsya madhusūdanaḥ /
etasminn eva kale tu bhīṣmako nayakovidaḥ /
putro me bālabhāvena bhaginīṃ dātum icchati /
atīva bālabhāvatvād dātum icchen matir mama /
ekā tv ekaṃ samālokya varayiṣyati me matiḥ //
prasādaṃ kuru deveśa kṣantum arhasi me prabho //
yadā bhavati vai prauḍhaḥ kīdṛśo 'vinayo bhavet //
na sa tiṣṭhati loke 'smin nirdahed daṇḍavāhninā //
eṣa dharmo narendrāṇām iti te viditaṃ prabho /
kathaṃ tava sutas teṣām agrato manujeśvara /
tādṛśaṃ raṅgam atulaṃ kārayaṃs tanayas tava /
kathaṃ tvayā hy avijñāta iti me saṃśayo mahān //
yathārheṇa tu saṃpūjya ātithyaṃ kṛtavān asi //
kathaṃ na jñātavān rājaṃs tava putrasya ceṣṭitam //
kathaṃ na jñāyate rājann iti me buddhisaṃśayaḥ //
mamāgamanam eveha prāyeṇa na hitaṃ tava /
ato na kṛtam ātithyam apātrāya narādhipa //
pātrebhyo dīyatāṃ kanyā mām apāsya mahābhuja /
ato 'rthaṃ na praviṣṭo 'haṃ raṅgamadhye viśāṃ pate /
uṣitau ca yathā svarge purā garuḍakeśavau //
evam evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāgvajracoditam /
bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāpya devānām api daivatam /
samyag bhavatu me dṛsṭiḥ saṃpatsyantu ca me kriyāḥ //
bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāpya nātibādhati me bhayam /
yan mayā cintitaṃ kāryaṃ tad bhavāñ śrotum arhati //
na dātum icche kanyāṃ vai pārthivebhyaḥ svayaṃvare /
prasādaṃ kuru deveśa na kopaṃ kartum arhasi //
pūrvam eva hi govinda kathitaṃ nāradena yat /
eṣā tavānujā bālā śrīr eṣā hy avatāriṇī //
kṛṣṇārthe janmam āsādya punar jātā tu sā svayam //
nāradena yathoktaṃ vai vitathaṃ na vaded dvijaḥ //
vacanena kim uktena tvayā rājan mahāmate /
khakanyāṃ dāsyase neti ko 'tra netā tavānagha /
mā dehīti na cākhyeyaṃ dadasveti na me vacaḥ /
tadā nisṛṣṭā sā pūrvaṃ gaccha tvaṃ patinā saha //
tenāhaṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi rājan na kṛtakaṃ vacaḥ /
śrutvā svayaṃ viniścitya yad yuktaṃ tat kariṣyasi //
rukmiṇī nāma te kanyā na sā prakṛtimānuṣī /
śrīr eṣā brahmavākyena jātā kenāpi hetunā //
ekā tv ekāya dātavyā iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ //
na ca tāṃ śakyase rājaṃl lakṣmīṃ dātuṃ svayaṃvare /
sadṛśaṃ varam ālokya dātum arhasi dharmataḥ //
tāṃ ca kanyāṃ varārohāṃ padmena rahitāṃ śriyam //
kṣantavyam iti yat proktaṃ tvayā rājan mamepsayā /
yuktapūrvam ahaṃ manye kaluṣāya na pārthiva //
pūrvam eva mayā kṣāntaṃ yenāsmi viṣaye tava //
katham asmadvidhe rājan kaluṣo vasate hṛdi //
bhavādṛśe kathaṃ rājan kaluṣo hṛdi vartate //
pālayasva purīṃ samyak kaluṣo yadi vartate /
na cāhaṃ senayā sārdhaṃ yāsyāmi ripuvāhinīm //
sthitaḥ sann arkasaṃkāśāny āyudhāni kare vahan //
mānyo 'smākaṃ bhavān rājan vayasā ca pituḥ samaḥ /
pālayasva purīṃ samyak putreṣu pitṛvad vasa //
kaluṣo nāma rājendra vaset kāpuruṣeṣu vai /
jānīdhvam eṣā me vṛttiḥ putreṣu pitṛvad dhi saḥ /
tena dānaphalenābhyāṃ daśa pūrve divaṃ gatāḥ //
anayoḥ suciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā rājyam akaṇṭakam /
evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ bhīṣmakaṃ yadupuṃgavaḥ /
sabhāṃ niṣkramya deveśo jagāma ratham antikam //
tataḥ sa dṛṣṭvā rājarṣir bhīṣmakaḥ kila keśavam /
varado bhava me nityaṃ tvadbhaktāya surottama /
lokanātho 'si nāthas tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ viditātmanām //
evaṃ stutvā mahādevaṃ nṛpāṇām agrato nṛpaḥ /
kāmarūpāya divyāya kāśyapāya ca vai namaḥ //
pratigṛhya ca satkāraṃ nṛpān āmantrya vīryavān /
jagāma mathurāṃ kṛṣṇo dyotayāno diśo daśa /
bṛṃhitena ca nāgānāṃ hayānāṃ heṣitena ca /
gate kṛṣṇo mahāvīrye ādāya param āsanam //
sabhām ādāya devāś ca prayayus tridaśālayam //
prayayus te nṛpāḥ sarve punar eva svayaṃvaram //
evam ābhāṣya tān sarvān satkṛtya ca yathāvidhi /
tato visarjayām āsa nṛpāṃs tān madhyadeśajān /
yathārheṇa ca saṃpūjya jagmus te narapuṃgavāḥ //
jarāsaṃdhaḥ sunīthaś ca dantavaktraś ca vīryavān /
sālvaḥ saubhapatiś caiva mahākūrmaś ca pārthivaḥ //
ete cānye ca bahavo dakṣiṇāpathikā nṛpāḥ /
śrotukāmā raho vākyaṃ sthitā vai bhīṣmakāntike //
tān vai samīkṣya rājendraḥ sa rājā bhīṣmako balo /
vacanaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ śrutvā kṛtaṃ me kāryam īdṛśam /
evam uktvā tu rājā sa bhīṣmako nayakovidaḥ /
manye bālān imāṃl lokān sa eṣa puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ /
kīrtiḥ kīrtimatāṃ śreṣṭo yaśaś ca yaśabhāg balī /
dhanyā khalu mahābhāgā devakī yoṣitāṃ varā /
niyatā gatir martyānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ /
balakeśavayor anyas tṛtīyaḥ kaḥ pumān iha //
raṇe yodhayituṃ śaktas tava putraṃ mahābalam /
ripuṃ vārayituṃ śakto dhanur gṛhya mahābhujaḥ //
ayaṃ tu puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇo hy anādinidhano 'vyayaḥ /
taṃ vijetā na loke 'sminn api śūladharaḥ svayam //
viditvā devam īśānaṃ na yodhayati keśavam //
asti tasya raṇe jetā yavanādhipatir nṛpaḥ /
sa kālayavano namā avadhyaḥ keśavasya ha //
putrakāmena muninā toṣya rudrāt suto vṛtaḥ /
māthurāṇām avadhyo 'yaṃ bhaved iti ca śaṃkarāt /
evam astv iti rudro 'pi pradadau munaye sutam //
evaṃ gargasya tanayaḥ śrīmān rudravarod bhavaḥ /
kṛṣṇo 'pi balavān eṣa māthure jātavān ayam /
sa jeṣyati raṇe kṛṣṇaṃ mathurāyāṃ samāgataḥ //
manyadhvaṃ yadi vo yuktāṃ nṛpā vācaṃ mayeritām /
śrutvā saubhapater vākyaṃ sarve te nṛpasattamāḥ /
kurma ity abruvan hṛṣṭāḥ sālvarājaṃ mahābalam //
sa teṣāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā jarāsaṃdho mahīpatiḥ /
babhūva vimanā rājan brahmaṇo vacanaṃ smaran //
yad ahaṃ kṛṣṇahetor hi saṃśrayāmi balādhikam //
śreyo hi maraṇaṃ mahyaṃ na cānyaṃ saṃśraye nṛpāḥ //
kṛṣṇo vā baladevo vā yo vā so vā naro 'paraḥ /
eṣā me niścitā buddhir etat supuruṣavratam /
bhavatāṃ sādhuvṛttānām ābādhaṃ na karoti saḥ /
tena dūtaṃ pradāsyāmi nṛpāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāya vai //
vyomamārgeṇa yātavyaṃ yathā kṛṣṇo na bādhate /
yathā vayaṃ ca tuṣyāmas tathā nītir vidhīyatām //
evaṃ saṃdiśya sarvāṃs tān bhīṣmakaṃ pujya dharmataḥ /
prayayau svapuraṃ rājā svena sainyena saṃvṛtaḥ //
sālvo 'pi nṛpatiśreṣṭhas tāṃś ca saṃpūjya vīryavān /
bhīṣmakaḥ saha putreṇa tāv ubhau cintya durṇayam /
gatvā tu sā sakhīmadhye uvāca vrīḍitānanā /
na cānyeṣāṃ narendrāṇāṃ patnī bhavitum utsahe /
kṛṣṇāt kamalapatrākṣāt satyam etad vaco mama //
vividhāś ca kathā divyāḥ kathyamānaiḥ parasparam //
kasmād ity evamanasaḥ sabhāyāṃ ye samāhatāḥ /
tatropaviṣṭaṃ śrīmantaṃ saubhasya patim ūr jitam /
uvāca yavanendro vai mitraṃ pravadatāṃ varaḥ /
dṛṣṭvārgham udyātaṃ rājñā sa sālvo rājasattamaḥ /
tena manye mahārāja nārghārho'; smīti rājasu //
jānāmy ahaṃ mahābāho dautyena tvām ihāgatam /
tena tvām arcaye rājan viśeṣeṇa mahāmate /
bhavaty abhyarcite rājñāṃ sarveṣām arcitaṃ bhavet /
body.note: k: Ñ2 V1 .2 Ds D3-6 G2 ins. :k
body.l: mānite tava rājendra sarveṣāṃ mānitaṃ bhavet /
āsyatām āsane divye mayā sārdhaṃ janeśvara //
yad bāhubalam aśritya vayaṃ sarve narādhipāḥ /
kim asādhyaṃ bhaved asya yenāsi preṣito mayi /
vada satyaṃ vacas tasya kim ājñāpayati prabhuḥ /
kariṣye vacanaṃ tasya api karma suduṣkaram //
viditvā tasya durvṛttam ahaṃ hantuṃ samudyataḥ //
dṛṣṭvā rāmo gireḥ kūṭād āpluto hematāladhṛk //
vicaran vividhān mārgān nidāghe bhāskaro yathā //
cakraṃ cakrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā //
cakraṃ sa ca mahātejāḥ kālīṃ caivāyasīṃ gadām /
cakraṃ sudarśanaṃ cakrī gavāṃ caiva gadāgrajaḥ /
tatrāhaṃ yudhyamānas tu bhrātāsya balavān balī /
halaṃ saunandam uddhṛtya gadayā mām atāḍayat //
vaiśākhaṃ sthānam āsthāya guhaḥ krauñcaṃ yathā purā /
tathā māṃ dīrghanetrābhyām īkṣate nirdahann iva //
jīvitārthī nṛloke 'smin kaḥ pumān sthātum arhati //
śrūtvā tvam eva rājendra kartum arhasi madvacaḥ //
prāptavān devadevāt tvām avadhyaṃ māthurair janaiḥ //
tau vijeṣyasi saṃgrāme gatvā tāṃ mathurāṃ purīm //
vākyaṃ te kathitam idaṃ hitaṃ nṛpāṇām |
tat sarvaṃ saha sacivair vimṛśya buddhayā @
dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me /
prahṛṣṭai rājasiṃhais tair avadhārya jayo mama /
yāsyāmi mathurāṃ rājan vijetuṃ keśavaṃ raṇe //
evam ābhāṣya rājānaṃ saubhasya patim ūr jitam /
brāhmaṇebhyo dadau cittaṃ siddhādeśāya vai nṛpaḥ /
kim arthaṃ garuḍo nītaḥ kiṃ ca karma cakāra saḥ //
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ brahman brūhi tattvaṃ mahāmune //
śrṇu rājan suparṇena kṛtaṃ karma hy amānuṣam /
yad uktaṃ devadevena nṛpāṇām agrataḥ prabho /
raivataṃ ca giriṃ ramyaṃ nandanapratimaṃ vanam /
tāṃ samantāt samālokya vāsārthaṃ te kṣamākṣamam /
yadi syād bhavate ramyā praśastā nagarīti ca /
kṛṣṇo 'pi yadubhiḥ sārdhaṃ viveśa mathurāṃ purīm //
svaireṇa cograsenaś ca nāgarāś caiva sarvaśaḥ /
rājendreṣvarbudaṃ dattaṃ mānaveṣu ca vai daśa //
najendraṃ cārghayuktaṃ ca kṛtvā vai mānuṣeṣu ca /
ye tatra samanuprāptā narendrās te gṛhaṃ gatāḥ /
rāmeṇa saha saṃmantrya nirgato ratham antikam //
tasminn evāntare rājañ śaṅkhadhvanir abhūn mahān //
striyo vṛddhās ca bālāś ca sūtamāgadhabandinaḥ //
te niryayur mahāsenā rāmaṃ kṛtvāgrato nṛpa /
body.note: k: After line 973, all Mss. (Ñ2 D4 om.) ins. :k
body.l: dṛṣṭvā sa rājā rājendraṃ harṣagadgadayā girā /
rathena na mayā gantuṃ yuktapūrvaṃ vicintya vai /
avatīrṇo mahābhāga gaccha tvaṃ syandanena ca //
tam ahaṃ stotum icchāmi sarvabhāvena keśavam //
na yuktaṃ nṛpate stotuṃ vrajantaṃ devasattamam /
tuṣṭasya stutibhiḥ kiṃ te darśanena tava stutiḥ //
tat tvaṃ kiṃ stutavān rājān divyaiḥ stotrair amānuṣaiḥ /
yan mayā cābhiṣiktas tvaṃ mathureśo bhavatv iti /
na yuktam anyathā kartuṃ mathurādhipate svayam //
na dātum arhase rājann etan me manasaḥ priyam //
tvam eva māthuro rājā nānyathā kartum arhasi //
sthānaṃ bhāgaṃ ca nṛpate dāsyāmi tava dakṣiṇam /
yathā nṛpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tathā te sthāpito 'grataḥ //
māthurāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhāgā dīnārikā daśa /
nṛpena saha tiṣṭhanti vikadrupramukhāś ca ye /
dīpyamānaḥ samantāc ca devā iva triviṣṭapam //
bṛṃhitena ca nāgānāṃ hayānāṃ heṣitena ca //
bandibhiḥ stūyamānaṃ ca namaś cakrur api prajāḥ /
dattvā dānam ananto 'pi na yayau vismayaṃ hariḥ //
anahaṃkārabhāvāc ca vismayaṃ na jagāma ha //
dṛṣṭvā mathuravāsinyo namaś cakruḥ pade pade //
nāgaparyaṅkam ut sṛjya gato 'yaṃ mathurāṃ purīm //
badhvā baliṃ mahāvīryaṃ durjayaṃ tridaśair api /
hatvā daityagaṇān sarvān kaṃsaṃ ca balināṃ varam /
rājendratvam abhīpsan vai mathurām āviśat tataḥ //
kiṃ vā śakṣyāmahe vaktuṃ guṇānāṃ te guṇodadhe /
kiṃ tv adbhutam idaṃ loke mānavendreṣu bhūtale /
na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyaṃ ca śakrād āsanam āgatam //
na śrutaṃ na ca dṛṣṭaṃ vā tena manyāmahe 'dbhutam //
dhanyā devī mahābhāgā devakī yoṣitāṃ varā /
body.note: k: D2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: argham ācamanaṃ dattvā pādyṃ pādyeti cābravīt //
praṇamya śirasā kṛṣṇaṃ ratham āruhya vīryavān //
prasādayiṣye bhagavan na kopaṃ kartum arhasi //
devakī vasudevaś ca rohinī ca viśāṃ pate /
kaṃsamātā tato rājann argham ādāya keśavam /
na cāhaṃ mathurākāṅkṣī na mayā vittakāṅkṣayā /
ghātitau tava putrau tau kālena nidhanaṃ gatau //
yajasva vividhān yajñān dadasva vipulaṃ dhanam /
nayasva vittanicayaṃ mayā dattaṃ punas tava //
iti prāśvāsya rājānaṃ kṛṣṇo 'tha halinā saha /
pitṛmātros tu pādau vai namaś cakratur ānatau //
tasmin muhūrte nagarī mathurā tu babhūva sā /
manasā cintayām āsur devalokaṃ na bhūtalam //
etasminn eva kāle tu mahotpāto babhūva ha /
samudrāḥ kṣobhitāḥ sarve vibhrāntā bhogināṃ varāḥ /
kampitā yādavāḥ sarve nyubjāś ca patitā bhūvi /
tau tān nipatitān dṛṣṭvā rāmakṛṣṇau ca niścalau /
tam uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sthitaṃ deham ivāparam /
avadhyo 'sau kṛto 'smākaṃ sumahac ca ripor balam /
kṛtaḥ sainyakṣayaś cāpi mahān iti narādhipaiḥ //
balāni ca sasainyāni hantuṃ varṣaśatair api /
na śakṣyāmaḥ kṣayaṃ netuṃ jarāsaṃdhasya vāhinīm //
ato 'rthaṃ vainateya tvāṃ bravīmi mathurāṃ purīm /
vasator āvayoḥ śreyo na bhaved iti me matiḥ //
vāsārtham īkṣituṃ bhūmiṃ tava deva kuśasthalīm //
gatvāhaṃ khe samāsthāya samantād avalokya tām /
raivataṃ ca giriśreṣṭhaṃ kuru deva surālayam /
nāmnā dvāravatī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā /
yadi syāt saṃvṛtāṃ bhūmiṃ pradāsyati mahodadhiḥ /
praviveśa balī śrīmān svapitur bhavanaṃ nṛpa /
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhojarājo mahāyaśāḥ /
śrūyatāṃ yad ahaṃ tvādya vakṣyāmi ripusūdana //
tvayā vihīnāḥ sarve sma na śaktāḥ sukham āsitum /
pure 'smin viṣayānte vā patihīnā iva striyaḥ //
bibhīmo na narendrāṇāṃ sendrāṇām api mānada //
tasya rājño vacaḥ śrutvā sasmitaṃ devakīsutaḥ /
yatheṣṭaṃ bhavatām adya tathā kartāsmy asaṃśayam /
body.note: h: HV (CE) chapter 9210, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof--read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of May 2, 2005 :h
k: After adhy. 87.28, D6 S (except G2) ins. :k
body.l: yathārhaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ praśrayaṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ //
sarvamantaḥ puraṃ caiva vivāhe sotsukaṃ kila //
śvobhūte tu vivāhaḥ syāc caidyasyeti ca bhūmipāḥ /
etasminn eva kāle tu nārado munisattamaḥ /
tasyām eva sabhāyāṃ tu yadubhir vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha /
tadabhyāśe sthitaṃ rāmam ugrasenaṃ ca sātyakim /
anyān api yadūn sarvān dadarśa muditān mahān //
taṃ dṛṣṭvā yādavāḥ sarve pratyujjagmuḥ sasaṃbhramam //
bhagavān api govindo rāmeṇa saha keśavaḥ /
idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam ity ūce taṃ munīśvaram //
tac ca sarvaṃ yathāprāptam upayujya munīśvaraḥ /
āsane ca samāsthāya nyaṣīdan muditas tadā //
āsanasthaṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ yādavāḥ sarva eva te /
keśavo 'pi ca dharmātmā rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ /
api te kuśalaṃ vipra tapaso munisattama //
kuśalaṃ tava vīṇāyā vada vipra yathātatham //
jagatām adya viprendra kā vārtā vada me prabho //
atha vā kuśalaṃ nāma yuṣmākaṃ niyatātmanām /
diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si saṃprāptaḥ pāvayānaś ca no vibho //
prītā vayaṃ muniśreṣṭha pūtāś caiva tvadāgamāt /
ādyo hi munimukhyānāṃ bhavāṃl loke prathiṣyati /
dhanyāḥ khalu vayaṃ vipra yato dṛṣṭās tvayā vibho /
tac chrutvā kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā /
sarvāṃs tahtā yadūn vipraḥ samābhāṣya vacas tadā //
kim ayaṃ kuśalapraśnaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇa mayi prabho /
na yuktaṃ pratibhāty etad devadeva jagatpate //
yatas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānām ādiḥ kuśaladas tadā /
vayaṃ tu devadeveśa nityaṃ kuśalino hare /
tathā hi mūlabhṛtyā vai viṣṇo tava yuge yuge //
idaṃ tu citraṃ deveśa yad uktaṃ bhavato hare /
tvaṃ hi śuddhaḥ sadā yogī pūtaḥ kila mamāgamāt /
kim anyad vada deveśa prasādāt tava mānada //
prasādāt iśayād etad yuktaṃ vaktuṃ jagatpate /
idaṃ niścitavān adya prasanno mayi mānada //
sarvathā kṛtakṛtyo 'smi dṛṣṭo yena tvayā vibho /
prītir me hy atulā viṣṇo tava saṃdarśanena hi //
ity uktvā sa jagannāthaṃ bhūyaḥ stotuṃ pracakrame /
purāṇajñaḥ sadā vipro munīnām ādir avyayaḥ //
ādāya nihitāṃ vīnāṃ saṃsthāpya layam uttamam //
body.note: k: Pāda b begins with three stars in the original, probably marking lacuna. The numbering of *--passages continues from app. 20. :k
body.l: tantrīṃ ca sudṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā jagau geyair jagatpatim /
udgīthāya namas tubhyaṃ rathaṃtara namo 'stu te /
so 'si deva jagannātha yo dṛṣṭo brahmavādibhiḥ //
yaṃ prāpya na nivartante yogino yatacetasaḥ /
so 'si deva purāṇātmaṃs tubhyaṃ deva namo namaḥ //
tvām āhuḥ sakalā vedā brahmeti jñānaniścaye /
ahaṃ mānakṛtā bhraṣṭrāḥ patanti narakeṣu ca /
ye ca tvāṃ viṣṇur ity āhus te ca tvāṃ yānti yatnataḥ //
te tu tvāṃ devadeveśa praviśanti purātanam //
tavaiṣā bhagavan māyā yām āśritya jaganmayīm /
prāṇino niḥśvasanti sma duḥsahā sā hi nityaśaḥ /
vihāraḥ sarva evaiṣa prāṇinām udayāya hi //
adadhā bhūtadhātrīṃ tvaṃ prāṇināṃ ca hitāya hi /
punar aśvaśirā bhūtvā vedān āhṛtya tiṣṭhasi //
āsīr vāmanarūpas tvam abadhnā balim adhvare /
āhṛtya rājyaṃ tasmāt tvam indrāya prāhiṇor vibho //
abhūs tvaṃ nārasiṃhaś ca hatavān daityapuṃgavam //
āsīś ca rāmasaṃjñas tvaṃ rāvaṇaṃ hatavān vibho /
abhūś ca jāmadagnyas tvaṃ gṛhītvā paraśuṃ prabho /
niḥkṣatriyam imaṃ lokam adadāḥ kāśyapāya vai //
hatavān pūtanāṃ bālye gokule viharan prabho /
punaś ca krīḍatā viṣṇo tvayaiva nihato hayaḥ //
adadhās tvaṃ punaḥ śailaṃ gavāṃ saṃrakṣaṇāya hi /
nanarta bhagavān bhūyo yamunāyā hrade hare /
sa idānīṃ sthito rājye tvām āśrityendravad divi //
kim anena jagannātha sarvaṃ tvadvaśagaṃ jagat /
namas te devadeveśa namo bhūyo namo namaḥ //
iti stutvā jagannātham upāraṃsīt sa nāradaḥ /
tac chrutvā yādavāḥ sarve paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ //
dhanyā vayaṃ jagannātham āśritya sukhinas tathā /
nirvṛtā vayam eveti nāradaṃ ca śaśaṃsire //
punaḥ prītiyutāḥ sarve vilokya ca parasparam /
dhanyā vayaṃ punar dhanyā dhanyānām agrataḥ sthitāḥ //
kimartham iha saṃprāpto vada nārada sāṃpratam /
alam etaiḥ stutipadair yathārthair vāpi nārada //
tvad āgamanajaṃ vipra tatkāryaṃ vada sāṃpratam /
kutūhalaṃ mama vibho vṛṣṇīnāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ //
arcayitvā haraṃ śarvaṃ dakṣine sāgare vibhum //
praviśya ca purīṃ tāṃ tu vidarbhasya mahīpateḥ /
tatra dṛṣṭo hṛṣīkeśa rājñāṃ samudayo mahān //
jarāsaṃdhaṃ puraskṛtya rājānaḥ sarva eva hi /
śiśupālo hi nṛpatiś cedīnām īśvaraś ca saḥ /
pauṇḍrako vāsudevaś ca nityaṃ tvāṃ dveṣṭi yo vibho //
drṣṭaś cātha mayā rājā bhīṣmako mābravīd vacaḥ /
bhavitā śvaḥ prabhāte tu tadarthaṃ rājasaṃgamaḥ //
tac chrutvā tvarito deva prāptas tvāṃ vṛṣṇipuṃgava /
tad gaccha vṛṣṇibhiḥ sārdhaṃ nagaraṃ tasya dhīmataḥ //
udvaheta jagannātha yadi rājā sa rukmiṇīm /
akṛtyam ayaśasyaṃ ca bhavato nātra saṃśayaḥ //
yācitā sā bhavadbhis tu na dattā bhīṣmakeṇa hi //
ekalavyo hṛṣīkeśa rukmī tasya tu dāsyati //
bhavantaṃ yaḥ sadā dveṣṭi na tvāmāhvayati prabho //
jarāsaṃdhas tu vṛṣṇīnāṃ sadā dveṣṭā na saṃśayaḥ /
tad gacchatu bhavāñ śīghraṃ yānair aśvair gajair api //
tām ādāya jagannātha gatvā yāsyasi māciram //
tvayy eva mana ādhāya sadā tvāṃ smarati prabho //
yadi bhartā bhavec caidyaḥ syān mṛtā rukmiṇī hare /
ity ahaṃ deva saṃprāptaḥ kṛtyaśeṣaṃ vicintyatām /
na kiṃcid api duḥsādhyaṃ cakrapāṇe hare tava //
sādhayāmo vayaṃ deva gacchet yuktvā jagāma saḥ //
ity uktvā nārade yāte brahmalokaṃ sanātanam /
vāsudevas tu dharmātmā yadūnām agraṇīr hariḥ //
uvāca ca yadūn sarvān sajjībhavata māciram //
asminn eva muhūrte tu yāsyāmaḥ kuṇḍinaṃ prati /
rathamānaya me śīghraṃ sārathe dāruka prabho //
āruhyantāṃ rathā aśvā gajāś ca parikalpitāḥ //
agrataś cāstu no vīraḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ /
madhyato balabhadras tu rājā caiva tu pṛṣṭhataḥ //
ahaṃ khaḍgī gadī cakrī śārṅgī śāṅkhī talatravān /
badhvā vā bhīṣmakaṃ saṃkhye hatvā caiva tu rukmiṇam /
ānayiṣyāmi tāṃ rājan rukmiṇīṃ matpriyāṃ sadā //
sajjībhavantu rājāno rathair aśvair gajais tathā /
kiṃ vilambatha rājāno yāsyāmaḥ sarva eva hi /
rathān āruhya yātās te saṃnaddhāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ //
sātyakis tu mahārāja ratham āruhya daṃśitaḥ /
dhanvī khaṅgī rathī bāṇī sainyāgre pratyadṛśyata /
gantum aichaj jagannātho hartuṃ bhojapateḥ sutām //
samāśvastā tadā sā tu sa ca rājā suduḥkhitaḥ //
āhatya duṃdubhīn sarve śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak /
krameṇaiva gatās te tu bhīṣmakasya purīṃ prati //
body.note: h: HV (CE) chapter 9220, transliterated by Kreṣimir Krnic, proof--read by Kreṣimir Krnic, version of May 2, 2005 :h
body.l: pitṛṣv asuḥ priyārthaṃ ca rāmakṛṣṇāv ubhāv api /
pūjayām āsa pūjārhān niviṣṭān bahir eva tān /
nyaveśayac ca tān sarvān bhīṣmako nagarād bahiḥ //
sthite tasmiñ jarāsaṃdhe ripau teṣāṃ mahātmani /
śaṅkhāś ca paṭahāś caiva sasvanuḥ sarvatas tadā /
brāhmaṇāś ca samāyātā nānādigbhyas tathaiva ca /
ucchritāś caiva sarvatra dhvajā vai samalaṃkṛtāḥ //
śvobhāvini vivāhe tu rukmiṇī niryayau bahiḥ /
keśavo me bhaved bhartā nānyaḥ kaścid bhaved iti /
evaṃ manasi saṃkalpaṃ kurvatī rukmiṇī śubhā /
tāṃ dadarśa tadā kṛṣṇo lakṣmīṃ sākṣād iva sthitām /
vahner iva śikhāṃ dīptāṃ māyāṃ bhūmigatām iva /
marīcim iva somasya saumyāṃ strīvigrahām iva /
kṛṣṇena manasā dṛṣṭā durnirīkṣyā surair api //
nāsty anyā pramadā loke rūpeṇa yaśasā śriyā /
tāṃ dṛṣṭvāṃ vavṛdhe kāmaḥ kṛṣṇasya priyadarśanām /
rukmiṇī ca tathā devī dadṛśe kṛṣṇam īśvaram /
acintayac ca sā devī dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam avasthitam /
so 'yaṃ viṣṇur jagannāthaḥ sākṣād rāmānujaḥ kṛtī //
asya cakraṃ sadā śaṅkho bhujayor ubhayor api /
sadā bhāti mahācāpaṃ loke khyātataraṃ hareḥ //
yamāśritya sadā devaṃ gadā kaumodakīti sā /
ripūn hanti mahāvīryān asahyān daivatair api //
yo nanarta hrade tasyā yamunāyās tadā hariḥ /
līlayā sa jagannātho golakaṃ bālako yathā //
ayaṃ sa puṇḍarīkākṣo yo gajaṃ prajaghāna ha //
yaś cāṇūraṃ mṛdhe hatvā kaṃsaṃ caiva mahābalam /
nanarta raṅge govindo gopaiḥ sārdhaṃ sayādavaiḥ //
so 'yam adya jagannāthaḥ prāpto mām iha yādavaḥ /
evaṃ vicintayitvā sā vavande taṃ śacīṃ tadā //
rāmeṇa saha niścitya keśavas tu mahābalaḥ /
unmathya sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ svaṃ nināya rathottamam //
samanahyanta dāśārhās tad ājñāya tu sarvaśaḥ //
ādāya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo jagāmāśu puraṃ prati /
rāme tv āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yuyudhāne ca vīryavān //
akrūre vipṛthau caiva gade ca kṛtavarmaṇi /
vasudeve sudeve ca sāraṇe ca mahābale //
gurum āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yayau dvāravatīṃ prati //
te cāpi yādavāḥ sarve yuddhāya samupasthitāḥ //
body.note: h: HV (CE) App. 22A, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof--read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of May 2, 2005 :h
k: For 87. 49-77, D6 S (except G2) subst. :k
body.l: cacāla rājakaḥ sarvas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ /
hatā vayaṃ nirānandā avajñātāś ca savaśaḥ /
ity ūcus te nṛpatayo māgadhapramukhās tadā //
uvāca rājñas tān sarvān māgadhaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ /
śrūyatāṃ mama vākyāni rājānaḥ sarva eva hi /
tasyādya phalabhākso æstu yadi jīvāmi bhūmipāḥ //
eṣo æhaṃ sagaṇaṃ hatvā gopālaṃ nṛpasaṃjñitam /
saṃnahyantāṃ rathaśreṣṭhā ratha āyātu me tvarāt //
cacāla ca balaṃ sarvaṃ jarāsaṃdhapriye sthitam //
sthātavyaṃ bhavatā rājan sthite mayi narādhipa /
bhṛtyo æsmi tava rājendra kim etat sāhasaṃ tava //
sthite bhṛtye kathaṃ svāmī kāryaṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ /
aham ekaḥ sa evaikaḥ kṛṣṇo gopakakilbiṣaḥ //
hatvā taṃ gopakaṃ yuddhe balabhadrasya paśyataḥ /
vṛkebhyo hi prayacchāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
hate tasmiñ jarāsaṃdha gopake mama nāmake //
ity uktvā dhanur ādāya jagarja nṛpasaṃsadi //
caidyo æpy atha mahārāja sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ /
ādāya parighaṃ ghoram idam āha nṛpottamān //
anenaiva tu rājāno yādavān sabalān yudhi /
tat tu yuktaṃ yadukule kṣatriyā na hi te vibho /
gavāṃ vṛttiṃ tu gopālā vartayanti sadā tathā /
kṛṣṇo æpi gokule vṛddho gopaiḥ sahacaraḥ kila //
sarvathā taṃ durātmānaṃ haniṣye sagaṇaṃ raṇe /
tāṃ cānayāmi rājānas tiṣṭhadhvam iha bhūmipāḥ //
kva nu te bāndhavās teṣāṃ yānāśritya tu yādavāḥ /
avajñāṃ kṛtavanto no yuṣmābhir iha cintyatām //
ity uktvātha sa caidyas tu yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ /
te ca sarve nṛpatayaḥ kruddhā yuddhāya daṃśitāḥ /
jarāsaṃdho ætha nṛpatī ratham āruhya daṃśitaḥ /
yuddhāya vai mahārāja mano dadhre mahīpatiḥ //
pauṇḍro æpy atha mahārāja vāsudevo mahābalaḥ /
ratham āruhya sahasā yuddhāyaiva mano dadhe //
niryayau cedirājaś ca bhrātṛbhiḥ saha bandhubhiḥ //
kva vāsudevaḥ kva ca gopakas tathā @
kuto nu vīro yudhi sātyakiḥ kila ||
mādhavo 'pi mahārāja śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pṛthak tadā //
bherīṇāṃ ca mṛdaṅgānāṃ jharjharīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat senayor ubhayos tadā /
saṃkarṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtya vāsavaṃ tv amarā iva //
akrūro dantavaktraṃ tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
taṃ pratyavidhyat kārūṣo bāṇair daśabhir āśugaiḥ //
vipṛthuḥ śiśupālaṃ tu śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ /
gaveṣaṇo 'pi caidyaṃ tu ṣaḍbhir vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ /
jaghāna cāśvāṃś caturaś caturbhir vipṛthoḥ śaraiḥ /
hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā vipṛthuḥ sumahābalaḥ /
paṭuśaḥ pañcabhiś cāpi vivyādha yudhi mārgaṇaiḥ //
tābhyāṃ sa viddho daśabhir bāṇair marmātigaiḥ śitaiḥ /
tato balī śakradevaṃ bibheda daśabhiḥ krudhā //
vidūratho 'pi taṃ ṣaḍbhir vivyādhājau śitaiḥ śaraiḥ //
triṃśatā pratyavidhyat taṃ balī bāṇair mahāratham /
nyahanat sārathiṃ cāsya dhvajaṃ ciccheda sūcchritam /
prativivyādha taṃ kruddhaḥ pauṇḍraḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ //
tomareṇāṃ sadeśe taṃ bibheda ca kaliṅgajaḥ /
gajenāsādya kahvas tu gajam aṅgasya vīryavān //
citrakaś ca śvaphalkaś ca sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ /
jaghāna rāmaḥ saṃkruddho vaṅgarājaṃ ca saṃyuge //
taṃ hatvā gajam āruhya dhanur ādāya vīryavān /
ṣaḍbhir nihatya kārūṣān maheṣvāsāṃś ca vīryavān /
tam āpanantaṃ vivyādha nārācair māgadhas tribhiḥ /
cāpaṃ ca mahādāyattaṃ śarair eva halāyudhaḥ /
rathaṃ cāsya mahārāja tilaśaś ca samāhanat //
vivyādha balabhadraṃ tu ciccheda ca punaḥ punaḥ /
rathaṃ ca cūrṇayām āsa gadayāsya sa māgadhaḥ //
sātyakes tu rathaṃ prāyāt sarvakṣatrasya paṣyataḥ /
sātyakis tu mahārāja śarair vivyādha māgadham //
jaghāna māgadhaṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva giriṃ hariḥ //
tad yuddham abhavat teṣāṃ ghoraṃ devāsuropamam /
gajair gajāś ca saṃkruddhāḥ saṃnipetuḥ sahasraśaḥ /
rathā rathais tu saṃrabdhāḥ sādibhiś cāpi sādinaḥ //
chindantaś cottamāṅgāni vinedur yudhi te pṛthak //
śarāṇāṃ patatām ājau pakṣiṇām iva śuśruve //
babhūva ghoṣaḥ śastrāṇāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca mahātmanām //
mūrchāṃ jagāma rājā tu nipapāta ca bhūtale //
sātyakir vaṅgarājaṃ tu jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
tat sainyaṃ vimukhaṃ cāsīj jarāsaṃdhe nipātite //
sātyakir balabhadraś ca jitvā yodhān sahasraśaḥ /
śaṅkhaṃ dadhmatū rājānau sarveṣām agrataḥ sthitau /
tataś ca vidrute sainye jarāsaṃdhe parājite //
tayoḥ śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā gacchann eva janārdanaḥ /
ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān /
body.note: h: HV (CE) chapter 9230, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof--read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of August 23, 2002 :h
body.l: alaṃ kurvantu rathyāś ca patākāś caiva sarvaśaḥ //
sūtāś ca māgadhāś caiva bandinaś ca tathāpare //
kalaśāś ca prapūryantāṃ sumudrair api vāribhiḥ /
purohitāś ca hūyantāṃ kumārāś caiva sarvataḥ /
nṛtyantāṃ nartakāḥ sarve gāyantāṃ gāyakās tathā /
bhojyantāṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sarve dīyantāṃ ca dhanāni ca //
alaṃ kriyantāṃ sarvatra prāsādāḥ sarva eva hi /
te ca sarve yathājñaptaṃ cakruś caiva sahasraśaḥ //
kvacic ca susvaraṃ geyaṃ gāyakāś cakrire tadā /
kvacid gajā hayāś caiva heṣāṃ cakrur mahotsave /
adhyakṣaḥ sātyakiś cāsīt keśave hy utsavonmukhe /
itaś cetaś ca saṃyāti niyuṅkte tatra tatra ha //
yasya yasya ca yatkāryaṃ taṃ taṃ tatra niyuktavāṇ //
baladevo æpi dharmātmā rājabhiḥ sārdham acyutaḥ /
anujñātaś ca tai rājan dhautavāsāḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ /
rukmiṇyāḥ keśavaḥ pāṇiṃ jagrāha vidhivat prabhuḥ //
papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca vavau vāyuḥ sukhaṃ tathā //
brāhmaṇebhyas tadā dattvā ratnāni ca janārdanaḥ /
saṃyojya ca hṛṣīkeśo vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca //
gajānāṃ ca śataṃ sāgraṃ sahasram ayutaṃ gavām /
yad yac ca śobhanaṃ vastu dīyantām ratnasaṃjñitam /
arcitāś cārthino rājan bhūyāsuś ca mahotsave //
evam ājñāpya govindo rukmiṇyā saha yādavān /
ugrasenaṃ ca rājendraṃ vṛddhān anyān sayādavān /
te sarve cakrur aśrūṇi harṣajāni yadūttamāḥ //
nirvṛtte tu tadā rājan vivāhe keśavasya ha /
ye ye samāgatās tatra nṛpā viprāḥ samantataḥ /
anubhūya vivāhaṃ tu jagmuḥ sarve yathāgatam //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix 24, transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March 5, 2002 :h
k: K Ñ2.3 V2 B Dn D1-5 S (T3 missing) ins. after adhy. 99, V1.3 Ds D6 after adhy. 89 :k
k: K3 Dn Ds D4 ins. :k
body.l: pradyumne dvārakāṃ prāpte hatvā taṃ kālaśambaram /
yaṃ japtvā tu nṛpaśreṣṭha sāyaṃ prātaḥ śubhaṃ labhet //
dharmakāmaiś ca munibhir ṛṣibhiś cāpi kīrtitam //
mahadbhir munibhiś caiva ṛṣibhiś cāpi kīrtitam /
body.note: k: Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: kiṃcit stotraṃ mama brūhi yaj japtvā nirbhayo 'bhavam /
ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni cchandāṃsy ātharvaṇāni ca /
purāṇam itihāsaṃ ca khilāny upakhilāni ca /
aṅgāny upāṅgāni tathā savyākhyānāni pāntu mām //
pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam /
indriyāṇi mano buddhis tathā sattvaṃ rajas tamaḥ //
vyānodānaḥ samānaś ca prāṇo 'pānaś ca pañcamaḥ /
vāyavaḥ sapta caivānye yeṣv āyattam idaṃ jagat //
āvāhaḥ pravahaś caiva udvahaḥ saṃvahas tathā /
body.note: k: the first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many :k
body.l: marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ /
bhṛgur vasiṣṭho bhagavān pāntu te māṃ maharṣayaḥ //
kaśyapādyāś ca munayaś caturdaśa diśo daśa /
naranārāyaṇau devau sagaṇau pāntu māṃ sadā //
rudrāś caikādaśa proktā ādityā dvādaśaiva tu //
aṣṭau ca vasavo devā aśvinau dvau prakīrtitau //
hrīḥ śrīr lakṣmīḥ svadhā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ smṛtir dhṛtiḥ /
aditir ditir danuś caiva siṃhikā daityamātaraḥ //
body.note: k: the first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many :k
body.l: śeṣaś ca vāsukiś caiva viśālākṣaś ca takṣakaḥ /
tathā pūraṇakaś caiva nāgaś ca karavīrakaḥ //
maṇināgaś ca bhagavāṃs triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ //
ete cānye ca bahavo ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ //
samudrāḥ pāntu catvāro gaṅgā ca saritāṃ varā //
irāvatī vipāśā ca śarayūr yamunā tathā //
kauśikī devikā caiva puṇyā divyā dṛṣadvatī /
kulmāṣī rathavāmā ca bāhudā ca hiraṇyadā /
plakṣā cekṣumatī caiva tāpanī ca bṛhadrathā /
khyātā carmaṇvatī caiva puṇyā caiva vadhūsarā //
etāś cānyāś ca sarito yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ /
nadī vaitaraṇī puṇyā vidarbhā narmadā śubhā /
vitastā vai bhīmarathī elā caiva mahānadī /
kālindī gomatī puṇyā nadaḥ śoṇaś ca viśrutaḥ //
etāś cānyāś ca vai nadyo yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ /
siprā carmaṇvatī puṇyā mahī sābhramatī tathā /
sindhur vetravatī caiva bhojā ca vanamālikā //
mitraghnī cendumālā ca tathā madhumatī nadī //
umā gurunadī caiva tāpī ca vimalodakā /
etāś cānyāś ca vai nadyo yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ /
tā māṃ samabhiṣiñcantu paścimām āśritā diśam //
body.note: k: Ñ2 V1 B1.2 D2.3 T1 ins. :k
body.l: sā tu dahatu me pāpaṃ kīrtitā śaṃbhunā dhṛtā /
prabhāsaṃ ca prayāgaṃ ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkarāṇi ca /
gaṅgādvāraṃ kanakhalaṃ somo vai yatra cotthitaḥ //
magadheṣu tapodaś ca gaṅgodbhedaś ca viśrutaḥ //
body.note: k: Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. after line 73, Dn1 after line 74:k
body.l: sūkaraṃ yogamārgaṃ ca śvetadvīpaṃ tathaiva ca /
taṃ śāpamocanaṃ tīrthaṃ punantv etāni kilbiṣāt /
varuṇo 'ṃśo 'tha dhanado yamo niyama eva ca //
kālo nayaḥ saṃnatiś ca krodho mohaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ /
āmodaś ca pramodaś ca praharṣaḥ śoka eva ca /
manyus tamas tapaḥ satyaṃ siddhir vṛddhiḥ śrutir dhṛtiḥ //
rudrāṇī bhadrakālī ca bhadraṣaṣṭhā ca vāruṇī /
bhāsī ca kālikā caiva śāṇḍilī ceti viśrutāḥ //
āryā kuhūḥ sinīvālī bhīmā citravatī ratiḥ /
ekānaṃśā ca kūṣmāṇḍī devī kātyāyanī ca yā //
lohityāyanamātā ca devakanyāś ca yāḥ smṛtāḥ /
gonandā devapatnī ca māṃ rakṣantu sabāndhavam //
mātaro mātṛvat putraṃ rakṣantu mama nityaśaḥ //
ete grahāś ca satataṃ rakṣantu mama sarvataḥ //
devaś ca vāmadevaś ca ghaṇṭākarṇaḥ karaṃdhamaḥ //
kūṣmāṇḍaḥ kumbhamūrdhā ca rocano vaikṛto grahaḥ //
aniketaḥ surārighnaḥ śivaś cāśiva eva ca /
teṣāṃ gaṇānāṃ patayaḥ sagaṇāḥ pāntu māṃ sadā //
pitaraḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryam ādhayo vyādhayas tathā //
dvaipāyano vidarbhaś ca jaiminir māṭharaḥ kaṭhaḥ //
viśvāmitro vasiṣṭhaś ca lomaśaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ /
uttaṅkaś caiva raibhyaś ca paulomaś ca dvitas tritaḥ //
body.note: k: T4 M1-3 ins. after line 167, K2 after line 166 :k
body.l: ṛcīko jamadagniś ca tathaurvas tapasāṃ nidhiḥ //
bṛhadagnir hariśmaśrur vijayaḥ kaṇva eva ca //
body.note: k: G5 ins. after line 171, T1.2 G1.3 after the repetition of line 165:k
body.l: vaitaṇḍī dīrghatapāś caiva vedaś cāthāṃśumāñ śivaḥ /
body.note: k: The first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many. :k
body.l: aṣṭāvakro dadhītiś ca śvetaketus tathaiva ca //
agniveśyaḥ śamīkaś ca pramucur mumucus tathā //
ete cānye ca bahavo ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ /
ṛjavaḥ ślāghinaḥ śāntāḥ śāntiṃ kurvantu me sadā //
trayo 'gnayas trayo vedās traividyaṃ kaustubho maṇiḥ /
uccaiḥśravā hayaḥ śrīmān vaidyo dhanvaṃtarir hariḥ //
amṛtaṃ gauḥ suvarṇaṃ ca dadhigaurāś ca sarṣapāḥ /
dūrvā hiraṇyaṃ gandhāś ca vālavyajanam eva ca /
śveto vṛṣaḥ karī mattaḥ siṃho vyāghro hayaḥ śarāḥ /
ṛṣipatnyaś ca kanyāś ca śrīmad bhadrāsanaṃ dhanuḥ /
puṇyaṃ vai vigatakleśaṃ śrīmad vai maṅgalānvitam /
yaś cedaṃ śrāvayed vidvān yaś caivaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ /
na ca prāpnoti vaikalyaṃ paratreha ca nandati //
śrīmat svargyaṃ sadā puṇyam apatyajananaṃ śivam //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix 25 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March 5, 2002 :h
k: After 91.6ab, D6 S (except G2) ins. :k
body.l: sa jātu vismayaṃ kurvan diśāṃ dānavasattamaḥ /
indrasya sadanaṃ gatvā kavāṭaṃ ghaṭṭayan danuḥ /
yudhyatām iti hovāca jayo vā pratidīyatām //
tac chrutvā devarājo 'pi devaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ /
nijaghnuḥ samare tatra khaṅgaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ //
siṃhanādaṃ mahac cakrur daityā yudhi mahābalāḥ /
devān babādhire te tu pratyakṣaṃ ca śacīpateḥ //
śakreṇa vāritāś cāpi sthātuṃ śaktā na devatāḥ //
tāṃs tu vidrāvitān dṛṣṭvā vṛtrahā balasūdanaḥ /
sthātavyam iti hovāca nirjarān sa mahāprabhuḥ //
yakṣaiś ca guhyakaiś caiva saha vaiśravaṇas tathā //
varuṇo yādasāṃ rājā vāruṇaiś ca samanvitaḥ /
taiḥ sārdhaṃ devarājo 'pi yuddhaṃ cakre mahāmatiḥ /
hayagrīvo nisumbhaś ca muraś ca ripumardanaḥ /
cakrur yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ narakeṇa saha prabho //
cakre yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ yathā vṛtravadhe purā //
te ca devā mahārāja dānavaiḥ saha saṃgatāḥ //
paraḥśataiḥ śarāṇāṃ tu vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ //
śarāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi tatra devapatī raṇe /
mumoca yudhi pāśeśas tam asyantaṃ śitāñ śarān //
visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ pāśam ādāya pāśabhṛt /
tam āpatantaṃ vegena pāśaṃ jagrāha dānavaḥ /
tenaiva taṃ samājaghne varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim /
sa tu pāśo 'tra nirvīryaḥ svāminaṃ na babādha ha //
tataḥ kruddho hayagrīvo varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim /
jaghāna gadayā rājan mūrdhni deśe mahābalam //
sa tenābhihato mūrdhni vamañ soṇitam ulbaṇam /
jaghāna dānavaṃ saṃkhye paśyatas tu śacīpateḥ //
nisumbho roṣatāmrākṣo dhanuś ciccheda tasya tat //
utsṛjya dhanuratnaṃ ca daṇḍam udyamya dānavam /
dhāvati sma yamo rājan hantukāmo mahābalaḥ //
utsṛjya tu mahārāja dānavo dhanur uttamam /
ādāya niśitaṃ khaṅgaṃ prāyāt pretapatiṃ tadā //
khaṅgena prāharat taṃ tu yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ yudhi //
muraṃ tu mauravaiḥ sārdhaṃ samājaghne paraḥśataiḥ /
jaghāna rājarājaṃ tu śaraiḥ suniśitair api /
vidhvā tu rājarājaṃ taṃ guhyakāṃś ca samāhanat //
khaḍgaiḥ pāśaiḥ samājaghne yakṣān devaripus tadā /
yakṣāś ca guhyakāś caiva bhītā dudruvur āhavāt /
sa cāpy ārto viṣaṇṇaś ca nirjagāma raṇājirāt //
te ca yakṣās tadā rājan guhyakāś ca samantataḥ /
yamo 'tha varuṇaś caiva kuberaś ca mahāmatiḥ /
nirjitā dānavendreṇa svaṃ svaṃ nagaram āyayuḥ //
devāś ca nirjitāḥ sarve dānavair nagasaṃnibhaiḥ /
diśo daśa drutāḥ sarve bhītā vṛttavilocanāḥ //
māhendram atha cāpaṃ ca sajyaṃ kṛtvā sudāruṇam /
nanāda vividhaṃ nādaṃ siṃho gajapatiṃ yathā //
āgaccheti tadovāca jyāghoṣaṃ ca cakāra saḥ /
tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ yathā vṛtravadhe purā //
samāśvastas tadā śakraḥ śarair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ /
rathaṃ vivyādha saptatyā sārathiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ //
kṣurapreṇa tadā rājan dhvajaṃ ciccheda cottamam /
sārathiṃ prāhiṇot tasya yamāya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ //
jaghānāśvāṃś caturbhis tu bāṇaiḥ suniśitair api /
vyāvidhya tu punar daityo devarājasya vakṣasi /
nāgaṃ taṃ pothayām āsa kumbhadeśe sa dānavaḥ /
sa ca nāgo mahārāja prādravac ca bhayāt tadā //
nanāda vividhān nādān rodasī ca vinādayan //
amarāvatīṃ tadā daityaḥ praviśya ca mahāsuraiḥ /
body.note: k: the first Pada of this line has one syllable too many :k
body.l: urvaśīṃ ca samāhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt //
bhaja mām iha vāmoru nirjitaḥ śakra āhave /
aham indro yamo rājā varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ /
aham eva sadā bhadre rājarājo 'smi suprabhe //
ṛṣayo yadi te rājan yakṣyanti kratubhiḥ sadā /
tadā bhajāmi daityendra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
evam uktas tadā daityo bāḍham ity abravīd vacaḥ //
jagāma daityarājas tu yatheṣṭaṃ dānavaiḥ saha //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix 26, transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June 9, 2002 :h
k: After the addl. colophon of 91.21, D6 S (except G2) ins. :k
body.l: babādhe mānuṣān sarvān ṛṣīn viprāṃś ca dānavaḥ //
rakṣaty eva jagannāthe viprān munigaṇāṃs tathā /
bādhate sma tadā daityo viprān munigaṇāṃś ca saḥ //
badaryāṃ hi mahārāja yaṣṭuṃ munigaṇāṃs tadā /
satreṇa śakraṃ deveśaṃ tathā devagaṇān api //
dṛṣṭvā tān munivīrāṃs tu narako dānavottamaḥ /
jitaḥ śakro raṇe viprā lokapālaiḥ sahāmaraiḥ /
tata ijyo namaskāryo vandyo lokahitāya vai //
tad etad vacanaṃ śrutvā narakasya durātmanaḥ /
yakṣyāmo na vayaṃ daitya dānavo 'si durātmavān /
tac chrutvā roṣatāmrākṣo dānavān idam abravīt /
na tvāṃ yakṣyāma he daitya ity ūcuḥ kila tāpasāḥ //
te ca sarvaṃ tathā cakrur dānavā duṣṭacetasaḥ //
yajñavāṭaṃ samāloḍya cakrur bhasma tadā nṛpa /
tāvat tāni havīṃṣy atra bhakṣayām āsur ojasā /
teṣv eva cāgnimukhyeṣu dagdhvā te dānavottamāḥ //
evaṃ te dānavāḥ sarve cakrur vighnakriyāṃ tadā /
te ca sarve munivarāḥ palāyanti diśo daśa //
tatra yā munikanyās tu jahāra narakas tadā /
prāgjyotiṣaṃ jagāmāśu kanyābhis tābhir eva ca /
yatheṣṭaṃ mumude tatra priyābhiḥ saha dānavaḥ //
body.note: k: D6 T1.4 G3.5 M subst. :k
body.l: yadi sa pratikuryādd hi tan naḥ śreyo bhaviṣyati //
yadi jīved asau pāpo narako dānavottamaḥ /
jagan na sthāsyate samyag vinaṣṭaś ca bhavej janaḥ //
te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ mārgam āsthitāḥ //
vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ /
kaṇvo dhūmro bṛhaddurgo bharadvājaś ca gālavah /
kavaṣo dhūmraketuś ca kāśyaḥ kāpilakas tathā //
ete cānye ca munayo narakeṇa durātmanā /
gaṅgāṃ ca samanuprāpya sthitās tasyās taṭe taḍā /
atra snātvā vayaṃ yāmo draṣṭuṃ lokahitaiṣiṇaṃ /
iti saṃcintya munayaḥ snānaṃ cakrur yathāvidhi /
yena yogyā munivarā draṣṭuṃ keśavam avyayam /
tasmin gaṅgāmbhasi snātvā sarve śuddhās tapodhanāḥ //
avatīrya tato gaṅgāṃ naubhir munivarās tadā /
praviśya dvārakāṃ te tu vasiṣṭhādyā munīśvarāḥ /
yā sabhā lokavikhyātā sudharmeti ca viśrutā /
tasyā dvāraṃ samāsthāya dvāḥsthaṃ procur maharṣayaḥ //
nivedayām āsa tadā yad uktaṃ munisattamaiḥ //
arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tadā pātram āsanāni samantataḥ /
ānīyantāṃ yathāyogaṃ sa ca sarvaṃ cakāra ha //
te praviṣṭā munivarās tāṃ sabhāṃ sabhyapūjitām //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix 27 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June 9, 2002 :h
k: After 91.24, D6 S (except G2) ins. :k
body.l: tāṃ sabhāṃ viviśur hṛṣṭāḥ saśiṣyā munisattamāḥ /
arghyaṃ ca tebhyaḥ pradadau pādyam ācamanaṃ tathā //
utsṛjya gāṃ jagannātho madhuparkaṃ dadau punaḥ /
andhakā vṛṣṇayaś caiva praṇāmaṃ cakrire munīn //
tair apy anumatāḥ sarve yādavā munisattamaiḥ /
svaṃ svaṃ hi bhejire te tu āsanaṃ lokaviśrutāḥ //
body.note: k: The counter for line 10 is wrongly printed after line 9; thus, the automatically inserted line counter differs from the printed one for the rest of this appendix. :k
body.l: keśavo 'pi mahārāja svaṃ sthānaṃ samavāpa ha //
uvāca vacanaṃ kāle sopaskaram idaṃ hariḥ //
yādavāś ca parāṃ prītim āsthitā munisattamāḥ /
yuṣmadāgamanād viprāḥ kim u vaktavyam atra ha //
kulaṃ pūtaṃ sadā viprā yasmin viprāḥ samāgatāḥ /
yuṣmadāgamanapraśno na yukto vaktum atra naḥ //
tasmād viprā yathātattvaṃ vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadā //
evaṃ pṛṣṭās tadā viprāḥ keśavena mahātmanā /
jaghnus te dānavā deva hutaṃ hotavyam eva ca /
idaṃ covāca duṣṭātmā ijyo 'smīti ca mādhava /
na kvacic charma deveśa lapsyāmo yadi jīvati //
tasmin duṣṭe jagannātha dhig gatā nirayaṃ vayam /
rakṣa naḥ sakalān hatvā dānavān duṣṭapauruṣān //
rakṣā hi tvayi govinda sthitā nityaṃ jagatpate //
kṣātraṃ vṛttaṃ samāsthāya dvāravatyāṃ vasan hare /
nigṛhya duṣṭān rakṣasva sādhūn sādhupriyo hy asi /
ārtā vayaṃ jagannātha hatās tena durātmanā //
iyaṃ ca bhavate deva nītā hy asmābhir acyuta /
ity uktvā munayas te tu daduḥ sarvaṃ jagatpateḥ /
kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭaṃ mahaj jātam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām /
arthyābhir vāgbhir iṣṭābhir īśvaraṃ praṇatās tadā //
namas tubhyaṃ namas tubhyaṃ deva deva hare hare /
yat padaṃ paramaṃ nityaṃ tava viṣṇo hare param /
taṃ namāma jagannātha yat tu paśyanti yoginaḥ /
namo namo hare viṣṇo namo mādhava keśava //
yat tu paśyanti satataṃ yogino yatacetasaḥ /
yat prāpya na nivartante tan namāma padaṃ tava //
yā māyā tava govinda durjñeyā yogacintakaiḥ /
tāṃ natāḥ sma jagannātha yām āśritya sthitiṃ sthitāḥ /
yā rakṣati jagadviṣṇo tāṃ namāma hare sadā //
ṛgyajuś ca tathā sāma yaṃ stauti satataṃ hare /
dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ tribhiś caiva pañcabhiś ca janārdana //
punaś caiva jagannātha dvābhyāṃ stauti jagadpate /
taṃ tvāṃ natāḥ sma deveśa ṛgyajuḥsāmarūpiṇam //
makāro 'si tathā viṣṇo namas te praṇavātmaka //
udgīthāya namo nityaṃ namo hotre janārdana /
adhvaryave namas tubhyaṃ yaṣṭṛrūpāya te namaḥ //
jagat sarvaṃ tvam evāsi jagac ca tvayi tiṣṭhati //
saṃhartā cāsi jagatāṃ tathā pātā jagatpate /
sraṣṭāsi ca tathā deva sthitau sthitimatāṃ vara //
vāsudeveśa bho viṣṇo tvayi sṛṣṭiṃ jagatpate /
namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ bhūyo bhūyo namo namaḥ //
evaṃ stutvā jagannāthaṃ praṇāmaṃ cakrire hareḥ //
utthāya cāsanāt sarve praṇāmaṃ cakrire hareḥ //
so 'yam eṣa jagannāthaḥ pāti no 'smin vasan sadā /
āśrityainaṃ sukhaṃ sarve vatsyāmo yādavīṃ purīm //
iti matvā tadā sarve yādavāḥ kṛṣṇam avyayam //
sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sukhaṃ svapsyati māciram /
muraṃ ca dānavaṃ viprā hatagrīvaṃ ca dānavam /
ārabhyantāṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kiṃ vilambatha māciram //
munayaś ca tadā deve pratijñāte tu keśave /
āśīrvādāṃs tadā viprā dadus tasmai mahātmane //
svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmo badarīṃ tava śobhanām //
ity uktvā munayaḥ sarve praṇipatya ca keśavam /
jagmuḥ śiṣyair mahārāja badarīṃ tāṃ tapodhanāḥ //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix 28, transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June 9, 2002 :h
k: D6 S ins. after 91.52, D3 after 91.52cd :k
body.l: dhanur ādāya visphārya nādena mahatā tadā /
nādayan rodasī yāyād yuddhāya narako balī //
keśavaṃ purato dṛṣṭvā gadinaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ tathā /
uvāca narako daityaḥ ko bhavān kim ihāgataḥ /
daityendro narakaḥ praṣṭā jetā śakrasya saṃyuge //
ko 'yaṃ pakṣī sthitaḥ pārśve kaiṣā te vada sāṃpratam /
enāṃ grahītum icchāmi jānīyāṃ yadi sāṃpratam //
evam ukto jagannāthaḥ prahasya suciraṃ tadā /
ālokya satyabhāmāṃ tu vacanaṃ cedam abravīt //
vāsudevo 'smi daityendra yadi te śrutim āgataḥ /
eṣā satrājitaḥ putrī bhāryā mama yavīyasī //
eṣa tārkṣyo garutmāṃs tu vāhanaṃ mama daityapa /
tvāṃ hantum iha saṃprāpto vadāmi kim ataḥ param //
śrutvaitad dānavo ghoro vihasya suciraṃ tadā /
vāsudevo 'si saṃprāpto māṃ hantuṃ kila yādava //
diṣṭyā saṃprāptavān adya cintanīyaḥ sadā mayā /
kadāsau dṛśyate yuddhe haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ //
kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha yaduśreṣṭha kuru yuddhaṃ yadīcchasi /
hatvā tvām adya saṃprāptam ānayāmi puraṃ mama //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix 28A transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June 9, 2002 :h
k: D3.6 T G1.3-5 M4 G(ed.) ins. after 91.55, M1-3 after 91.53 :k
body.l: garuḍaṃ pothayām āsa śarāṇāṃ ca paraḥśataiḥ /
iti saṃcintya manasā śarair vivyādha pañcabhiḥ /
aṣṭābhir dānavaṃ viṣṇur navabhiś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ //
tau tu yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ cakratur yuddhalālasau /
tam antare sarai rājan vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ /
pakṣe samāhataḥ pakṣī cacāla ca punaḥ punaḥ //
pakṣeṇa pakṣiṇāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pothayām āsa dānavam //
tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā vyāvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
nārācaḥ sa ca rājendra lalāṭe prāpatat tadā /
cacāla ca jagannāthas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ //
visaṃjñaś ca tato bhūtvā rathopastha upāviśat //
satyabhāmā ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsudevaṃ tathāgatam /
āśvasto 'tha hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṃjñāṃ prāpya ca keśavaḥ /
dhanus tasyai tato dattvā śārṅgaṃ bhārasahaṃ raṇe /
yudhyasva narakaṃ devi śrānto 'smi yudhi pīḍitaḥ //
evam uktā tadā devī satyā satyavatāṃ varā /
nārācair ardhacandraiś ca bhallaiḥ suniśitair api /
babādha dānavaṃ satyā satyaṃ satyetaraṃ yathā //
yudhyantīṃ tāṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā narako dānavottamaḥ /
bāhvantare tathā ṣaḍbhiḥ pārśve saptabhir āśugaiḥ //
satyabhāmā tataḥ kruddhā bāṇena niśitena ca /
dhvajaṃ chatraṃ tathā yaṣṭiṃ ratham aśvās tathaiva ca /
tac cāpi cicchide cāpaṃ mahiṣī śārṅgadhanvanaḥ /
punar anyat samādatte dvidhā tac cāpi sākarot //
tataḥ sa dānavaḥ kruddho gadāṃ suniśitāṃ tadā /
tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya tilaśaḥ sākarot tadā /
tataḥ śaktiṃ samādāya tasyai dātuṃ pracakrame //
tāṃ cāpi tilaśaḥ kṛtvā sasvaraṃ prajahāsa ca //
tataḥ parigham ādāya vyāvidhya narakas tadā /
prāhiṇoc ca tadā tasyai sāntare nijaghāna ha /
śaraiś ca niśitai rājan satyā vivyādha dānavam //
divi sthitā devagaṇā ṛṣayaś ca tathāmalāḥ //
sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyāc chareṇa nirakṛntata /
tatra prīto mahāviṣṇuḥ pariṣvajya ca tāṃ vibhuḥ /
mahāviṣṇuḥ sasvaje tāṃ satyabhāmāṃ priyāṃ tadā /
śramāmbhaś cāpi tasyās tu mārjayām āsa keśavaḥ //
tasyās tu kaṇṭhābharaṇaṃ dadau prīto janārdanaḥ /
na dattam atha rukmiṇyā dattaṃ tasyā mahātmanā /
badhvā kaṇṭhe tadā devī rarāja bahuśaḥ śubhā //
na hi labdhavatī pūrva tadā labdhaṃ jarārdanāt //
ity uktvā dhanur ādāya yuyudhe dānavaṃ raṇe //
ādāya paramaṃ cāpaṃ bāṇair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ //
sa vāsudevam āvidhya satyāṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
atho jagatpatir devaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃprati dānave /
ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ dhanuś ciccheda tasya hi /
rathaṃ ca sārathiṃ cāpi jaghāna yadunandanaḥ //
tataḥ kruddho rathāt tasmād āplutya narakas tadā /
garuḍaṃ pothayam āsa talena narakas tadā //
tāś ca sarvāḥ samājaghne śaraiḥ śārṅgaviniḥsṛtaiḥ //
tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ narake dānaveśvare //
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix 29, line 1-484, transliterated by Petteri Koskikallio, version of March, 2002, proof--read by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, April 2004; line 485--1585, transliterated by R. Söhnen--Thieme, version of March 2004, proof--read April 2004 :h
k: After 92.70, K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 29), Ñ1 ins. this after App. I (No. 42). :k
k: M4 om. the ref. T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 ins. after the ref.; M4 bfore line 1; G after line 4 :k
body.l: tad vadāśu guro mahyam aviglānaṃ kathaṃ hariḥ //
śṛṇvan vai nādhigacchāmi tṛptiṃ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ //
caritaṃ brūhi kṛṣṇasya sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava //
nibodha caritaṃ citraṃ tasyaiva sadṛśaṃ prabhoḥ //
rukmiṇyā sahito devyā yayau raivatakaṃ nṛpa //
kumārāḥ prayayus tatra putrā bhrātara eva ca /
ṣoḍaśa strīsahasrāṇi jagmur eva ca dhīmataḥ /
tatas tatra dvijātīnāṃ kāmān prādād adhokṣajaḥ /
yaunaiḥ śrautaiś ca mākhaiś ca śuddhānāṃ kurunandana //
tarpayitvā dvijān kāmair iṣṭair iṣṭaḥ satāṃ hariḥ /
body.note: k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. :k
body.l: kadācid atha rukmiṇyā vasan gehe janārdanaḥ /
bahu mene priyāṃ bhāryāṃ rukmiṇīṃ bhīṣmakātmajām //
pārśvasthā sā hi kṛṣṇasya bhojyā naravarābhavat //
pratigṛhya tu tat puṣpaṃ kāmāraṇir aninditā /
śuśubhe tena puṣpeṇa dviguṇaṃ rukmiṇī tadā //
tāṃ nāradas tathovāca munir brahmasutas tadā /
alaṃkṛtaṃ puṣpam etat saṃsargāt tava sarvathā /
atyarhā ca matā me tvam etat puṣpaṃ dhṛtavrate //
amlānam etat satataṃ puṣpaṃ bhavati kāmini //
īpsitān api gandhāṃś ca dadāti vadatāṃ vare //
śītoṣṇe cepsite devi puṣpam etat prayacchati /
sravaty api rasān devi manasā kāṅkṣitān varān //
sravaty api tathā gandhān īpsitān prativardhanān //
yāni yāni ca puṣpāṇi tvaṃ devy abhilaṣiṣyasi /
etad eva bhagādhānaṃ dharmiṣṭhe dharmadaṃ tathā /
matiṃ ca nāśubhe dhatte dhāryamāṇaṃ sadā śubhe //
yad yad icchasi varṇaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyati /
svalpaṃ vā yadi vā sthūlaṃ chandatas te bhaviṣyati //
bubhukṣā vā pipāsā vā glānir vāpy atha vā jarā /
anugītāni gītāni dāsyaty api ca cintite /
pūrṇe saṃvatsare devi puṣpam etat tavāntikāt /
kṛtir eṣā hi bhadraṃ te pārijātasya suprabhe /
dhārayed īśvarī nityaṃ puṣpāṇy etāni suprabhe //
sāvitrī vedamātā ca śrīś ca sarvaguṇodite //
saṃvatsaraḥ paraḥ kālaḥ sarveṣāṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ //
prakāśam adya saubhāgyam anivāryaṃ yaśaś ca te /
saubhāgyāḍhyaṃ sadā vetti yātmānaṃ subhagā satī //
saubhāgyaikaratho jaitras tava devy adya niḥsṛtaḥ /
ātmā dvitīyaḥ kṛṣṇasya bhoje tvam iti bhāmini //
nāradenaivam uktaṃ tu tathyaṃ vākyaṃ narādhipa /
devīnāṃ ca tathānyāsāṃ sapatnīnāṃ viśāṃ pate /
tac ca śrutvā sunikhilaṃ preṣyābhiḥ strīsvabhāvataḥ /
karṇākarṇi tato devyaḥ kaulīnam iva sarvaśaḥ /
mamṛṣe na sapatnyās tu tat saubhāgyaguṇodayam /
sā śubhaṃ kauṅkumaṃ vāsaḥ samutsṛjya śucismitā /
upaviṣṭaṃ muniṃ jñātvā rukmiṇyā saha keśavaḥ /
jānan sātrājitīṃ viṣṇur viveśa śanakair iva //
ruṣitām iva tāṃ devīṃ snehāt saṃkalpayann iva /
dārukaṃ dvāradeśe tu tiṣṭhety uktvā viveśa ha /
sa dadarśa priyāṃ dūrat krodhāgāragatāṃ tadā /
kṛtvā pṛṣṭhe 'tha vadanaṃ vihasantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ //
karapadme punaḥ śaśvan mukhapadmaṃ niveśya ca /
body.note: k: for line 138, V3 D3.4 G2 subst. :k
body.l: punar utthāya śayanāt patantīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ /
tās tāś ceṣṭās tathānyāś ca priyāyā dadṛśe hariḥ //
idam antaram ity eva tato matvā janārdanaḥ //
jagrāha vyajanaṃ caiva sthitvā sa paripārśvataḥ /
śanair avāsṛjad vātaṃ jahāsa śanakair iva //
apāvṛṇon mukhaṃ satyā kim etad iti cābravīt //
paryapṛcchad atho preṣyā gandhasya prabhavaḥ tadā //
