kapis kandhaḥ kṣobhaṇo 'tha kāñcan ākṣo gavekṣaṇaḥ /
samudro rabhasaś caṇḍo dhūmraś caiva priyaṃkaraḥ /
govrajo gokṣuro raudro godantaḥ svastiko dhruvaḥ //
māṃsapo māmsabhakṣaś ca vegavān ketumāñ śiniḥ /
variṣṭhaś ca gaviṣṭhaś ca bhūtalonmathano vibhuḥ /
divyaiś ca kavacair naddhā divyaiś caivocchritair dhvajaiḥ //
sahasrabāhur bāṇaś ca baleḥ putro mahāsuraḥ /
sarve māyādharā daityāḥ sarve divyās trayodhinaḥ /
syandanasthā vyarājanta śāradāḥ khe grahā iva //
subāhur meghanādaś ca bhīmavegaś ca vīryavān /
tathā gaganamūrdhā ca vegavān ketumān api //
anāyuṣāyāḥ putras tu balo nāma mahāsuraḥ /
sa tena śuśubhe daityo viśvakarmā mayo balī /
sa dhairyeṇodadhes tulyo vapuṣāgnir iva jvalan /
taṃ yāntam anuyānti sma dānavāḥ śatasaṃghaśaḥ //
body.note: k: For line 237, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
k: For line 240, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: parighair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca bhallaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ /
rathaiś cakraiś ca kavacaiḥ sajjamānā mahāsurāḥ //
ratham āruhya daityendro babhau merur ivāparaḥ /
body.note: k: For line 265, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
k: K1.2 Ñ2 V1.3 B Dn Ds D4-6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: anāyuṣāyāḥ putras tu vṛtro nāma mahāsuraḥ /
body.note: k: Ñ2 V2.3 B1.2 Ds ins. :k
body.l: mayena vihito divyas tasya ketur hiraṇmayaḥ /
īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca mahattvaṃ ca mahādyuteḥ //
sārdhaṃ putraiś ca pautraiś ca saṃnahyata mahābalaḥ //
mayena nirmitās teṣāṃ sarve māyāmayā rathāḥ //
divyāś ca khaḍgā viśikhāś ca dīptā @
sa tatra vastrāṇi śubhāś ca gāvaḥ @
daityānām atha saṃnāhaṃ dūtāc chrutvā surādhipaḥ //
surādhipas tu bhagavān ājñāpayata vai surān /
body.note: k: For line 491, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: mahārṇavāṃś ca śailāṃś ca tathā rudrān mahaujasaḥ /
ye tu siddhā mahātmānaḥ pitaraś ca manasvinaḥ /
rājarṣīṃś ca api śataśo yogasiddhāṃs tathaiva ca //
śakrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tataḥ sarve divaukasaḥ /
kecid āruruhur vyāghrān kecid āruruhur gajān /
kecid āruruhur nāgān kecid āruruhur vṛṣān //
rathaṃ harihayair yuktvā sa prāyāt samaraṃ prati //
dīptām amoghāṃ ca sa śaktim ugrām |
viśve ca devā marutaś ca sarve @
body.note: k: Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: manoḥ sutā vai vasavaś ca sarve @
body.note: k: Ñ2 B Dn Ds D2.3.6 T1 G3-5 ins. :k
k: Ñ2 B Ds D6 T1 G3.5 ins. :k
body.l: khaḍgāṃś ca te vajramukhāś ca śaktīḥ ||
śūlāṃś ca vṛkṣāṃś ca vigṛhya dīptān @
body.note: k: K1.3 Ñ2 V1.3 B Dn Ds D3-6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 732:k
body.l: khaḍgāś ca khaḍgaiḥ samam āhatā nṛpa |
marutāṃ pañcamo yas tu sa bāṇenābhyayudhyata /
mahābalaḥ suravaraḥ sāvitra iti yaṃ viduḥ //
anāyuṣāyāḥ putras tu balo nāma mahāsuraḥ /
hayagrīvas tu ditijaḥ saha pūṣṇā tv ayudhyata /
virocanas tu balavān baler balavataḥ pitā /
asilomā tu balinā mārutena samaṃ vibho /
anāyuṣāyāḥ putras tu vṛtro nāma mahāsuraḥ /
vṛṣaparvā tu balinā saha niṣkambhunā raṇe /
prahrādas tu mahāvīryo vīraiḥ svais tanayair vṛtaḥ /
yuyudhe saha kālena raṇe kāla iva sthitaḥ //
pravṛtto vai raṇaṃ kartuṃ daityānāṃ nandivardhanaḥ //
balis tu saha śakreṇa sureśena mahātmanā /
śeṣā devāś ca daityāś ca jaghnur anyonyam āhave /
adṛśyanta mahotpātā ye proktā jagataḥ kṣaye /
marutaḥ sapta te kṣubdhā vyaśīryanta mahīdharāḥ //
body.note: k: For line 783, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 cont., V3 B Ds D6 ins. after line 783:k
body.l: na hy antarikṣaṃ na diśo na bhūmir @
ete cānye ca bahavo dṛśyante devanirmitāḥ /
yugāntasamaye tathā ete cānye ca tattvataḥ //
apaśyata gurur brahmā sarvair eva suraiḥ saha //
vedaiś caturbhiḥ sāṅgaiś ca vidyābhiś ca sanātanaḥ /
padmayonir vṛtaḥ śrīmān siddhaiś ca paramarṣibhiḥ //
body.note: k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. after line 815, M2 after line 809:k
body.l: ubhayoḥ senayo rājaṃs tayor yuddham avartata /
body.note: k: After the ref., D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: kīrtanād yasya yuddhasya pāpmā sadyo vimucyate //
mantrā daityāḥ samākhyātā yajñakarmaṇi tatra vai //
anuyātaś ca pitaram adhiko vā parākrame /
body.note: k: For line 833, B1.3 D6 subst. :k
body.l: yaṣṭā vai tatra bāṇas tu samyag evāvatiṣṭhate /
body.note: k: On the other hand, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 833 :k
body.l: neṣṭā tatra sa bāṇas tu samare cāvatiṣṭhataḥ /
daityāś ca prathitā mantre yakṣakarmaṇi tatra vai /
udgātā ca mayaḥ śrīmān sthitaḥ sarvabhayaṃkaraḥ /
balis tu rājā dyutimāñ śaśvat tatra mahāsuraḥ /
body.note: k: For line 838, B1.3 D6 subst. :k
body.l: japair homaiś ca saṃyukto brahmatvam akarot prabhuḥ //
devo viṣṇuḥ surais tatra rathavedyāṃ susaṃskṛtaḥ //
balaś ca balakaś caiva pulomā ca mahāsuraḥ /
praśāntarūpaṃ kṛtvā tu mantraṃ samyak pravartayan //
asthīny atra kapālāni puroḍāśāḥ śirāṃsi ca /
ājyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ raudraṃ tasmin yajñe 'bhihūyate //
idhmāḥ paridhayas tatra prastārā vipulā gadāḥ /
hayagrīvo 'silomā ca rāhuḥ keśī ca dānavāḥ //
virocanaś ca jambhaś ca kujambhaś ca mahābalaḥ /
sadasyās tatra tu makhe vipracittiś ca vīryavān //
iṣavas tu sruvās tatra rathākṣasadṛśāḥ śubhāḥ /
dhanuṣkoṭyo dhanurjyāś ca sruvas tatra mahāmakhe //
dīkṣitas tatra tu balis tasya patnī mahācamūḥ //
body.note: k: For line 860, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: āgnīdhras tatra balavān akaroc chambaras tadā /
vaitāne karmaṇi vibho yaḥ khyāto havyavāḍ iva //
tasmin yajñe tu savanaṃ vardhate daityanirmitam //
devānāṃ rudhiraṃ saṃkhye papur ugrā diteḥ sutāḥ /
yadā balir mahādaityo vijetā samare surān /
tadā hy avabhṛthaṃ yajñe bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ //
body.note: k: T1 2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 873 :k
body.l: svaṃ svaṃ karma yathāśaktyā yuddhakarma pravartate //
svaṃ svaṃ tathā yathā cakrur yuddhakarma viśāradāḥ /
dānavānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca śastravanti mahānti ca /
body.note: k: After 882a T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: bhrājamānā hy adṛśyanta meghā iva savidyutaḥ //
cāru bibhrājire tatra sveṣv anīkeṣu bhāgaśaḥ //
nānāvarṇāḥ patākāś ca dhvajamālāś ca saṃyuge /
rajaḥ pracchādayām āsa patrorṇāḥ pāṇḍurā diśaḥ //
sāvitrasya vadhaṃ prepsur bāṇo jagrāha kārmukam //
mantrair huta ivārciṣmān sa prajajvāla tejasā //
mārutaḥ sa mahāvegaḥ sāvitraḥ śaktim uttamām /
āpatantī ca sā śaktir maholkā jvalitā iva /
hatāyām atha śaktyāṃ tu sāvitro devasattamaḥ /
sa taṃ sthitam athālakṣya sāvitraṃ balinandanaḥ /
lohitākṣaṃ mahākāyaṃ cikṣepa ca nanāda ca //
sāvitraṃ chādayām āsuḥ kailāsam iva toyadāḥ //
pragṛhya kārmukaṃ ghoraṃ gataḥ śakrarathaṃ prati //
balaś cāpy asuraśreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām /
dhruvāya vasave mūrdhni raudrāṃ cikṣepa dānavaḥ //
tasya nirmathito deho hemacitraṃ ca varma vai /
śeṣaś ca vasavaḥ sarve divyāstrair ghoradarśanaiḥ /
prācchādayan raṇe daityam ādityam iva toyadāḥ //
avātarad rathāt tasmād gadām udyamya vegavān //
body.note: k: For line 944, B1.3 Ds D6 subst. :k
body.l: śiraḥsu pātayām āsa śatrūṇāṃ tāṃ gadāṃ tadā /
diśaḥ prādrāvayat sarvāṃs stridaśān sā mahāgadā /
balas tu sa gadāpāṇir vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ //
avasphūrjan diśaḥ sarvāḥ svena vīryeṇa dānavaḥ //
arujaṃs tridaśān daityaḥ sindhuvegho nagān iva /
samṛddhas tarasā devān vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā /
kṣiptāṃs tān viśikhān dīptān antarikṣe sa cicchide //
prāsādān vividhān dīptān antarikṣe ca cicchiduḥ /
amṛṣyamāṇas tat karma dhruvas tam abhidudruve /
tau nakhair iva śārdūlau dantair iva mahādvipau /
nirbhindantau ca gātrāṇi vilikhantau ca sāyakaiḥ /
stambhayantau ca balinau pratudantau sthitau raṇe /
carantau vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ //
asibhyāṃ carmaṇī divye vipule ca śarāsane /
tayor āsīd bhujāghāta+ nigrahaḥ pragrahas tathā /
dvipāv iva viṣāṇāgraiḥ śṛṅgair iva mahāvṛṣau /
tataḥ parājito devo balakena tadā dhruvaḥ /
rathaṃ tyaktvā bhayāt tasya pranaṣṭaḥ prāṅmukho vasuḥ //
punar eva ca tatrāsīn mahad yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam /
kruddhasya namuceś caiva dharasya ca mahātmanaḥ //
visphārya ca mahac cāpaṃ hemapṛṣṭhaṃ dūrāsadam /
saṃrambhāt sa vasuśreṣṭhas tyaktvā prāṇān ayudhyata //
sa sāyakamayair jālair vṛto daityarathaṃ prati /
tataḥ prahasya namucir dharasya ca śilāśitān /
sa totrair iva mātaṅgo dāryamāṇaḥ patatribhiḥ /
tam āpatantaṃ vegena saṃrambhān namucī raṇe /
daityaḥ pratyasarad devaṃ matto mattam iva dvipam //
bhiśrayan samare daityo vasuṃ prācchādayac charaiḥ //
dṛṣṭvā prākampata muhus tridaśānāṃ mahad balam //
garjantāv iva śārdūlau prabhinnāv iva vāraṇau //
samājam iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā prekṣamānau mahārathau /
āśaṃsante jayaṃ tābhyāṃ yodhās te gaṇaśaḥ sthitāḥ //
tau chādayantāv anyonyaṃ samare niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
tāv anyonyaṃ jighāṃsantau śarais tīkṣnair mahārathau //
body.note: k: For line 1015, T2 G1 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: āsādayetām anyonyaṃ tau raṇe niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ //
kṣaṇena saṃvṛtā bhūmir meghair iva nabhastalam //
dharāya vasave muktaṃ cakraṃ namucinā raṇe //
sa tyaktvā syandanaṃ devaḥ pradīptaṃ cakratejasā /
prayātaḥ svena sainyena bhūyaḥ suracamūṃ prati //
yau tau mayaś ca tvaṣṭā ca devadaityeṣu viśrutau /
body.note: k: For line 1033, B1.3 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: tayoḥ prāṇaharas tv āsīt saṃprahāro mahātmanoḥ /
body.note: k: For line 1034, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: tvaṣṭā tu niśitair bāṇair daityaṃ tu baladarpitam /
mayas tu prativivyādha tvaṣṭāraṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
nanāda ditijaśreṣṭho hatas tvaṣṭuḥ śarair mayaḥ //
mayaś ciccheda tīkṣṇāgrais tūrṇaṃ saptabhir āśugaiḥ //
tataḥ kṣiṇvann iva prāṇāṃs tvaṣṭuḥ kopān mahāsuraḥ /
ciccheda bāṇāṃs tvaṣṭā tāñ jvalitair nataparvabhiḥ /
tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau balinau vāśitāntare /
tataḥ sa vipulāṃ dīptāṃ mayo rukmāṅgadāṃ gadām /
tataḥ kruddho mahādaityaḥ kṣurābhyāṃ tasya saṃyuge /
body.note: k: K Ñ1.2 V1.3 B D (D6 missing) ins. :k
body.l: punar dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ tu niśitābhyāṃ mahāraṇe /
dhvajaṃ tvaṣṭur atha cchittvā sūtaṃ ninye yamakṣayam //
body.note: k: K Ñ1.2 V B D (D6 missing) ins. :k
body.l: dṛṣṭvā tvaṣṭā hataṃ sūtaṃ kṣurābhyāṃ vinipātitam /
hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya sūtaṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi /
te papus tasya devasya śoṇitaṃ rukmabhūṣaṇāḥ /
body.note: k: For line 1073, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: te tasya daityasya bhujaṃ savyaṃ nirbhidya patriṇaḥ /
vidārya viviśur bhūmiṃ bhujagā iva vegitāḥ //
mayas tribhir athānarcchat tvaṣṭāraṃ tu patatribhiḥ /
body.note: k: For line 1082, B1.3 T1.2 G3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: taṃ tatra hatasūtāśvaṃ bhujaṃgam iva nirviṣam /
tvaṣṭāraṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditaḥ sa tu dānavaḥ //
sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ yaḥ prāṇaḥ kathyate dvijaiḥ /
sa tāmranayanaḥ kruddhaḥ śvasann iva mahoragaḥ /
vṛto daityaśatair vāyū raśmivān iva bhāskaraḥ //
evaṃ sutīkṣṇān khacarāñ śalabhān iva pāvake /
tam antakam iva kruddham āpatantaṃ sa mārutaḥ /
tyaktvā prāṇān atikramya vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ //
tasya vegam asaṃhāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ sanātanaḥ /
sādhu sādhv iti vegena siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire //
body.note: k: For line 1115, B1.3 Ds T1.2G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: te pīḍayantaḥ pavanaṃ kruddhāḥ sapta mahārathāḥ /
prajāsaṃharaṇe ghorāḥ somaṃ sapta grahā iva //
teṣāṃ mūrdhasu daityānāṃ pātayām āsa vīryavān /
tyaktvā prāṇān pulomā tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
tasyāpi tam asaṃhāryaṃ dṛṣtvā vāyuḥ sanātanaḥ /
asaṃcintya śaraughāṃs tāñ jvalitān vai pulomataḥ //
raṇabhūmir abhūd raudrā tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ //
tanutraiḥ satalatraiś ca hārair niṣkaiś ca śobhanaiḥ /
tair vadhyamānaḥ sa babhau samantād arpitaiḥ śaraiḥ //
hatvā tu ditijaḥ pṛṣṭham āsādya yudhi varjitān /
hatvāṣṭau tatra yodhānāṃ śatāni pavanaḥ prabhuḥ /
kṛtvā mārgaṃ suraśreṣṭhaḥ prayātaḥ sa mahārathaḥ //
adyāpi ca suvistīrṇaḥ panthāḥ saṃdṛśyate divi /
nāmnā vāyupatho nāma siddhāḥ paśyanti taṃ divi //
hayagrīvas tu ditijaḥ pūṣāṇaṃ prati vīryavān /
muñcataḥ karṣato vāpi dadṛśus tatra nāntaram //
rukmapuṅkhais tatas tasya cāpamuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
prācchādyanta śilādhautair diśaḥ sūryasya ca prabhāḥ //
khadyotā iva gharmānte khe carantaḥ samantataḥ //
body.note: k: K3 Ñ1.2 V1.3 B2.3 Dn Ds D1.3.5 T1 G3.5 ins. :k
k: For line 1, T1 G3 subst. :k
body.l: te bāṇā bhūtale magnāḥ pūṣṇo bhāti śilāśitāḥ /
vikramaṃ śaṃsituṃ tūrṇam anantasya ca vai gatāḥ //
body.note: k: Ñ2 D2 ins. after line 2, B2 after line 1 :k
body.l: tatas tu pūṣṇo devasya balaṃ vīryaṃ parākramam /
vyavasāyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca paśyanti tridaśādbhutam //
nācintayat tadā pūṣā daityāṃś cābhyadravad raṇe //
hemapṛṣṭhaṃ mahānādaṃ pūṣṇa āsīn mahad dhanuḥ /
tataḥ śarāḥ prādur āsan pūrayanta ivāmbaram /
patatāṃ pātyamānānāṃ kham āsīt saṃvṛtaṃ vrajaiḥ //
amarṣī balavān kruddho didhakṣann iva pāvakaḥ //
pūṣṇas tv ājau dhvajaṃ caiva patākāṃ dhanur eva ca /
kṛtas tu virathaḥ pūṣā hayagrīveṇa saṃyuge /
pūṣā tasya rathābhyāśāt sa yayau tena vai jitaḥ //
body.note: k: B1.3 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 1201, K1.2 D4 ins. after line 1200, Ds D5 after line 1201 :k
body.l: tatrādbhutam ito bhūyo yuddhaṃ vartata dāruṇam /
tato bhago maheṣvāso divyaṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ /
tam abhyayād bhago daityaṃ tūrṇam asyantam antikāt /
mātaṅgam iva mātaṅgo vṛṣaḥ prativṛṣaṃ yathā //
tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddham āsīd ghoraṃ mahāraṇe /
body.note: k: K3 Ñ2 B Dn D5 (marg.) T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: tān antarikṣe nārācān bhagaś ciccheda patriṇā /
body.note: k: For line 1231, B T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: tadā tat suciraṃ kālaṃ yuddhaṃ samam ivābhavat /
dorbhyāṃ vikṣipataś cāpaṃ rathaṃ viṣṭabhya tiṣṭhataḥ /
sa bhagasya hayān hatvā chittvā ca dhvajam āhave /
abhyavarṣac charair enaṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān //
na tasyāsīd anirbhinnaṃ gātre dvyaṅgulam antaram /
body.note: k: For line 1239 B1.3 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst., Ds ins. after line 1238:k
body.l: daityasya cādbhutaṃ divyam astram astreṇa vārayan /
mumoca krodhatāṃ rākṣo didhakṣan daityam āhave /
avañcayad bhagaṃ daityo māyābhir lāghavena ca //
body.note: k: For line 1242, G4.5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: atha daityo bhagaṃ samyag vañcayām āsa lāghavaiḥ /
body.note: k: While K1.2 D4 ins. after line 1242 :k
body.l: bhagas tasya rathaṃ sāśvaṃ śaravarṣair avākirat /
adṛśyata śaraiś channaḥ śambaraḥ śatadhā raṇe //
atha sma yudhyate bhūyaḥ śatadhā śailasaṃnibhaḥ //
diśāgajendram ārūḍho dṛśyate sma punar balī /
pādeśamātraś ca punar bhūtvā bhavati śailavat /
mahāmegha iva śrīmāṃs tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca so 'bhavat /
punaḥ kṛtvā virūpāṇi vikṛtāni ca sarvaśaḥ /
body.note: k: K1.2 B2 Dn D4 T1 ins. :k
body.l: te bhītāḥ prapalāyante siṃhatrastā mṛgā iva /
tataḥ so 'nyaṃ navaṃ dehaṃ kṛtvā prāṃśutaraṃ punaḥ /
gacchaty ūrdhvagatiṃ ghoro diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan /
body.note: k: For line 1255, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: śatavartmā śataśikho dadāha ca punaḥ surān //
yo 'nye daityāś ca sādhyāś ca ye ca viśve ca devatāḥ /
rathaṃ tyaktvā mahābhāgo mahendraṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ //
parājitya tu taṃ devaṃ dānavendraḥ pratāpavān /
sa vahnir vāgbhir ugrābhiḥ kruddhas tarjayate balī /
bhavāmy eṣa hi te mṛtyur ity uktvāntaradhīyata //
jaghāna somaḥ śītāstro dānavānāṃ camūṃ raṇe //
daityeṣu vyacarac chrīmān yugānte kālavac chaśī //
dadāha dānavān sarvān dāvāgnir iva coditaḥ //
śītena vyadhamat sarvān vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā /
tad astram abhavat tasya pradigdhaṃ śatruśoṇitaiḥ /
āvārya mahatīṃ senāṃ pradravantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
candraṃ mṛtyum ivāyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā yodhā visiṣmiyuḥ //
chādayetāṃ śaraiś candraṃ vṛṣṭim antāv ivāmbudau //
aśmavṛṣṭir ivākāśe hy abhavat senayos tayoḥ //
prāvartata surāṇāṃ ca dānavānāṃ ca saṃyuge //
aśvāś ca paryadhāvanta hatārohā diśo daśa /
aśvānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca rathānāṃ ca varūthināṃ /
yodhās tatrābhyahanyanta hastyaśvam api tad bahu //
abhavat tumulaḥ śabdo meghānām iva garjatām /
evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ devānām asuraiḥ saha /
tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya viṣvaksenaḥ surair vṛtaḥ /
mūrcchām abhijagāmāśu dhvajaṃ cāpy āśrayat prabhuḥ //
tataḥ sa punar āśvasya sādhyo yuddhe mano dadhe /
tasya vai yudhyamānasya saṃyuge niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
te prādravanta vitrastā rathebhyo rathinas tadā /
padātīnāṃ yayuḥ saṃghā yatra devaḥ śacīpatiḥ //
vitatya śyenavat pakṣau sarvataḥ sa varūthinīm /
bhittvā bhittvā mahābāhuḥ śirāṃsy ājāv akṛntata //
sādinaś ca padātāś ca hataśeṣā rathās tathā /
tataḥ so 'siṃ samudyamya javam āsthāya dānavaḥ /
cakarta rathinām ājau śirāṃsi ca dhanūṃṣi ca //
bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ viplutaṃ plutam /
saṃpātaṃ samudīrṇaṃ ca darśayām āsa dānavaḥ //
pratīpam āharan nāgān aśvāṃś ca dṛḍhavikramān /
cakarta rathinām ājau śirāṃsi ca dhanūṃṣi ca //
sūtāṃś ciccheda khaḍgena rathān api ca dānavaḥ //
muhur utpatato dikṣu dhāvataś ca yaśasvinaḥ /
mārgāṃś carita vai citrān vyasmayanta tato 'surāḥ //
khaḍgena cānyāṃś ciccheda nādenānyāṃś ca bhīṣayat //
apare daityam ālokya bhayāt prāṇān avāsṛjan //
tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne yuddhe mahati dāruṇe /
kujumbho dānavaśreṣṭho hy aṃśam ādityam āhave /
body.note: k: K1.2.4 Ñ2 V1.3 B D T2 ins. :k
body.l: yodhayām āsa samare vṛṣaḥ prativṛṣaṃ yathā /
body.note: k: Ñ1 B Dn Ds D5.6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: sphuradbhir niśitais tīkṣnaiḥ śarair bahubhir āśugaiḥ /
sa gajān gadayā nighnan vyacarat samare balī /
viśīrṇadantāṃś ca bahūn bhinnakumbhāṃś ca vāraṇān /
body.note: k: V1.3 B D5(marg.) T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: kṣuraiḥ kṣuraprair bhallaiś ca pītair añjalikaiḥ śitaiḥ /
vinighnan pravarān sainyān gadayā balināṃ varaḥ //
apaśyanta surāḥ sarve parvatān iva pātitān //
kujambhasya ca mārgeṣu viśīrṇās te mahāgajāḥ /
sa babhau tāṃ gadāṃ bibhrat prokṣitāṃ gajaśoṇitaiḥ /
body.note: k: K1.2 Ñ1.2 B Dn D4 T1 G3 ins. :k
body.l: yathā hi bhagavān kruddhaḥ prajānāṃ saṃkṣaye purā /
gopāla iva daṇḍena kālayan sa mahāgajān /
kruddhaṃ kālam ivākāśe daṇḍam udyamya dānavam /
te hanyamānā gadayā bāṇaiś ca bhṛśavikṣatāḥ //
atiṣṭat samare daityaḥ kālaḥ saṃvartako yathā //
āpatantam apāraṃ ca samudram iva parvaṇi /
body.note: k: Ds1 M2.4 subst. for line 1452, B1. 3 Ds2 G5 ins. after line 1451 :k
k: Dn Ds (marg.) Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: sā tathā vāritā senā vihvalābhūn nirudyamā /
asilomā hariś caiva jaghnatus tau parasparam //
yudhyate daivataiḥ sārdhaṃ grasamāna iva prabhuḥ /
hayān gajān padātīṃś ca rathāṃś ca tarasā bahūn //
prāmardata yudhi śrīmān yudhi śreṣṭo yudhi sthitaḥ /
saṃnaddhaṃ tatra yudhyantaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam /
yathā prarūḍhe gharmānte dahet kakṣaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca balaṃ nardati dāruṇam /
vimūḍham abhavat sarvam ākulaṃ ca samantataḥ //
āryāṃ buddhiṃ samādāya na tyajanti mahāraṇam //
astraghātāṃś ca vividhān dānavānāṃ tadā raṇe /
hayo hayaṃ gajo nāgaṃ vīro vīraṃ mahāhave /
body.note: k: For line 1505, B T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: asurāś ca surāś caiva vikramāḍhyā mahārathāḥ /
hastaiḥ pādaiś ca yudhyante dānavās tridaśaiḥ saha //
haris tu niśitaṃ bhallaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge /
sa tasya ghanuṣaḥ koṭiṃ chittvā bhūmāv apātayat /
tasya dehe vimuktās te mārutena samīritāḥ /
sa tair nipatitair gātraiḥ kṣaradbhir asṛg avyayam /
babhau daityo mahābāhur merur dhātum ivotsṛjan //
body.note: k: Ñ1.2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: rukmapuṅkhāṃś ca niśitān preṣayām āsa sāyakān //
gātraṃ saṃchādayām āsa mahābhrair iva parvatam //
body.note: k: For line 1521, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: mumoha sahasā devo bhūmau cāpi papāta ha //
tato hāhākṛtāḥ sarve deve bhūtalam āśrite /
parivāraṃ tu samare tasya hatvā mahāsuraḥ /
body.note: k: K1.2 Ñ2 V3 B Dn Ds D4.6 ins. :k
body.l: pragṛhya kārmukaṃ ghoraṃ gataḥ śakrarathaṃ prati //
tatraiva tu mahāyuddhe sasainyāv aśvināv ubhau /
āsādya so 'śvinau daityaḥ sthito girir ivācalaḥ //
nikṛttāny eva dṛśyante śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca //
na moham asurendrasya dadṛśus tridaśā raṇe //
paraśvadhaiś ca śūlaiś ca pravavarṣur mahārathāḥ //
tato vṛtraḥ susaṃkruddhas tais tadābhyardito balāt /
body.note: k: For line 1556, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: abhyavarṣac chitair bāṇais tān sarvān satyavikramaḥ //
body.note: k: B T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya prabhinnam iva vāraṇam /
dīpyamānaṃ tataḥ śūlam aśvī suvipulaṃ dṛḍham /
aśvinaṃ sahasā bhartsya garutmān iva pannagam //
prayātaḥ sahasā tatra yatra yudhyati vāsavaḥ //
śūlāni ca bhuśuṇḍīś ca kṣipanti sma mahāraṇe //
turaṃgamāṇāṃ tu śataṃ tasya yuktaṃ mahārathe /
tasya bāṇanipātaiś ca hatā vai śataśaḥ surāḥ //
tataḥ sa laghubhiś citraiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ /
gamitāḥ prakṣayaṃ kecit tridaśair dānavā raṇe //
tataḥ prakṣīyamāṇāṃs tān utprekṣya ca dite sutāḥ /
te diśo vidiśaś caiva pratirudhya prahāriṇaḥ /
abhyaghnan niśitaiḥ śastrair devān ditisutā raṇe //
chittvā śūlāṃś ca tān sarvān ekacakro mahāsuraḥ /
abhyavidhyata taṃ sādhyaṃ daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ //
jvalitair aparaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyat sahasraśaḥ //
teṣāṃ chinnāni gātrāṇi visṛjanti sma śoṇitam /
nihatya gadayā sarvāṃs tān gajān gajamardanaḥ /
tasminn eva tu saṃgrāme balodrikto mahāsuraḥ /
gajair mattai rathair divyair vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ /
astraiś ca niśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiś cānalasaṃnibhaiḥ //
tatas te dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahāsuraṃ /
taṃ saṃīkṣya mahāyodhaṃ dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitam /
tasya sarvāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ śarāḥ pītamukhāḥ śitāḥ /
taiś ca saptabhir āviṣṭaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi cārpitaiḥ /
utpapāta tadā vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan //
tatas taṃ tridaśo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajyakārmukaḥ /
anuvavrāja saṃhṛṣṭaḥ khaṃ tadā sa mahābalaḥ //
body.note: k: For line 1658, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: asuraṃ chādayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ /
cakāra ninadaṃ ghoram ambare jalado yathā //
nipapāta mahāvegaḥ pakṣavān vai girir yathā //
babhañja ca tato daityo bhagneṣākūbaraṃ rathaṃ /
virathaṃ prekṣya rudraṃ tu tasya pāriṣadāḥ śubhāḥ /
sa tu taiḥ sahasotthāya viṣṭhito vimale 'mbare /
mudgarair ardito bhīmair vṛkṣaḥ paraśubhir yathā //
teṣāṃ vegavatāṃ vegaṃ nihatya sa mahāsuraḥ /
sarvān pāriṣadān saṃkhye sūdayām āsa dānavaḥ //
balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ sa nāśayām āsa vīryavān //
aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhān yodhai rathān rathaiḥ /
hatair aśvaiś ca nāgaiś ca bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ /
evaṃbalaḥ sa daityendro mṛgavyādhaś ca vīryavān /
yudhi prayuddhau balinau prabhinnāv iva vāraṇau //
tatraiva yudhyate rudro dvitīyo rāhuṇā saha /
viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu krodhātmā aja ekapāt //
tat tadā sumahad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam /
āsīt pratibhayaṃ raudraṃ vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatām //
jaghāna samare śrīmān kruddho daityasya sāyakaiḥ //
tasya pāriṣadas tv eko rathaśaktyā mahābalaḥ /
bibheda samare hṛṣṭo dānavaṃ taṃ stanāntare /
sa bhinnagātro rudreṇa tathā pāriṣadair api //
rudrasya ratham āyāntaṃ sa rāhur dānavottamaḥ /
body.note: k: After line 1702a, K1 D4 ins. :k
body.l: nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇair meruṃ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ //
tataḥ sa rudraḥ samare muṣṭinābhihatas tadā /
papāta sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ purāṭṭa iva bhūtale //
virejus te tadā daityāḥ puṣpitā iva kiṃśukāḥ /
body.note: k: While, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: hatānāṃ svanatāṃ tatra daityānāṃ cāpi nisvanaiḥ /
rurodha mārgaṃ yodhānāṃ cakṣūṃṣi ca dharārajaḥ //
āsīt pratibhayaṃ raudraṃ vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatāṃ //
body.note: k: For line 1721, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: apaviddhaiś ca bhagnaiś ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair hataiḥ //
nāgā lakṣaṃ hatā rājann aśvā lakṣatrayaṃ nṛpa //
utpetuś ca kavandhāni dikṣu sarvāsu saṃyuge /
teṣāṃ tu tatra patatāṃ kruddhānām atinisvanaḥ /
udvarta iva bhūtānāṃ samudrāṇāṃ ca śuśruve //
tatraikas tu sadhūmrākṣaḥ śrīmān rudro munīśvaraḥ /
dānavaiḥ saṃvṛtaḥ keśī yudhyate yudhi durjayaiḥ //
niṣpetur ugravīryasya jvālā hi prasṛtā mukhāt //
body.note: k: B Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: sarve hy atibalāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvatasaṃnibhāḥ /
saṃvṛtā bahurūpeṇa dadṛśur na sma kiṃcana //
na dhvajo na patākā vā na varma turago 'pi vā /
āyudhaṃ syandanaṃ vāpi dṛśyate naiva sārathiḥ //
sa śabdas tumulas teṣām anyonyam abhidhāvatām /
nipetur ugravīryasya jvālā hi prasṛtā mukhāt //
śrūyate tumulaḥ śabdo na rūpāṇi cakāśire //
dānavās tatra saṃkruddhā dānavān eva jaghnire /
tridaśās tridaśāṃś caiva nijaghnus tumule tadā //
te parāṃś ca vinighnantaḥ svāṃś ca yuddhe mahāsurān /
rudhirārdrāṃ tathā cakrur medinīm asurāḥ surāḥ //
tatas tu rudhiraugheṇa saṃsiktaṃ mṛditaṃ rajaḥ /
tridaśā dānavāś caiva jaghnur anyonyam āhave //
saṃgrāmamarṣī ghoraḥ sa svāny anīkāni harṣayan /
evaṃ tat tumulaṃ yuddham abhaval lomaharṣaṇam /
keśinaḥ saha rudreṇa tad adbhutam ivābhavat //
atraiva tāvat tvaritaṃ nayemaṃ sārathe ratham /
ete hi devāḥ sahitā ghnanti naḥ samare balam //
etair hi dānavānīkaṃ kṛtacchidram idaṃ mahat //
na sthātuṃ devatāḥ śaktāḥ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave /
atyarthaṃ vai raṇe śūrāḥ saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ /
niṣkumbhaṃ tatra taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te tridaśottamāḥ /
sametya sahitāḥ sarve taṃ drutaṃ paryavārayan //
vyavasthitaṃ ca niṣkumbhaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tridaśottamāḥ /
vṛṣaparvā tu śailābhaṃ niṣkumbhaṃ samare sthitam /
acintayitvā tu śarāñ śarīre patitān bahūn /
sthitaś ca pramukhe śrīmān sasainyaḥ sa mahābalaḥ //
rathaṃ tyaktvā sa tu śrīmān sakrodhaḥ kamalekṣaṇaḥ /
tataś cikṣepa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ niṣkumbho vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ //
jaghāna dānavas tena śākhinā tridaśāṃs tadā //
tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ samare prāṇahāriṇam /
ālokya dhanvī niṣkumbhaś cukrodha ca nanāda ca //
sa tatra niśitair bāṇair viṃśadbhir marmavedhibhiḥ /
body.note: k: K1 V1.3 B Dn Ds D3.4.6 T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. for line 1825, Ñ2 cont. after 115** :k
body.l: śvasanto dudruvuḥ sarve bhayād vai vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ //
tatraiva tu mahāvīryaḥ prahrādaḥ kālam āhave /
srajaś ca vividhāś citrā jayārtham abhimantritāḥ /
kālena saha saṃgrāme prayuddhaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ //
body.note: k: K2.3 D4 ins. after line 1845, K1 after line 1846:k
body.l: raṇapraveśasāntiṃ te kramāc cakruś ca dānavāḥ /
saptatir vai sahasrāṇi gajās tāvanta eva ca //
dhanur visphārayan ghoraṃ nanāda prajahāsa ca //
sa samaṃ vartamānas tu pakṣābhyāṃ vistṛto mahān /
garjanto vinadantaś ca vikrośantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
hayānāṃ ca gajānāṃ ca garjatām abhitaujasām //
śuśruve śaṅkhaśabdaś ca paṭahānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ //
antarikṣāt papātolkā vāyuś ca paruṣo vavau /
vamantyaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ śivāś caiva vavāśire //
bāndhavā nihatā yeṣāṃ tridaśair iha saṃyuge /
ākāśaṃ saṃpatiṣyanti khadyotā iva me śarāḥ //
akṣayāḥ santi me tūṇāḥ śarāś cāśīviṣopamāḥ /
sthātuṃ me purataḥ śaktāḥ ke raṇe jīvitepsavaḥ //
hatvā ripugaṇāṃs tuṣṭir anurāgaś ca rājasu /
hatasya tridive vāso nāsti yuddhasamā gatiḥ //
te bhayaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā raṇe dānavasattamāḥ /
nihatyemān arīn sarvān modadhvaṃ nandane vane //
sarvāstravidvāñ śūraś ca nityaṃ cāpy aparājitaḥ /
tais tu kratuśatair iṣṭaṃ vipulair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ /
yaṣṭāraḥ kratubhir nityaṃ nityaṃ cādhyayane ratāḥ /
body.note: k: Ñ2 B Ds D6 ins. :k
body.l: tataḥ kālas tu niryāto bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ /
praviśya dhvajinīṃ caiṣāṃ ghātayām āsa vīryavān /
gadāś ca parighāś caiva vividhāś ca paraśvadhāḥ //
dhanūṃṣi ca vicitrāṇi śataghnīś ca sthirāyasīḥ /
atisārā jvarāś caiva yakṣmāṇaḥ śleṣmajā rujāḥ /
vyādhīn api ca daityaughā nijaghnur bahavo bahūn //
śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ kecit kecic chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ /
parighair āhatāḥ kecit kecic ca paramāyudhaiḥ //
kecid dvidhākṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitā bhuvi /
te cāpi vyādhibhiḥ sarve vividhair āyudhottamaiḥ /
bhinnāś ca dānavāḥ śūlair nikṛttāś ca paraśvadhaiḥ //
mudgaraiḥ paṭṭisaiś caiva vyādhibhiś ca mahābalaiḥ /
kṣatāḥ śastrair anekaiś ca muṣṭibhiś ca mahāmṛdhe //
ārtasvaraṃ ca nadatāṃ siṃhanādāṃś ca garjatām /
sāditāni mahīṃ jagmus tiṣṭhatām eva saṃyuge //
nāśaṃsanta tadā yodhā jīvitāny api saṃyuge //
patitair nipatadbhiś ca pātyamānaiś ca saṃyuge /
na gṛhṇatoḥ śarān ghorān na ca saṃdadhatos tayoḥ /
antaraṃ dadṛśe kaścit prayatnād api saṃyuge //
hatadarpaṃ tu vijñāya prahrādaḥ kālam āhave /
apayātaṃ ca samarād dviṣantaṃ saṃpratarkya tam //
tanūjaḥ śārṅgiṇa iti bhītaṃ nāma tṛṇānanam /
tatraivānyāṃ camūṃ bhūyaḥ sa mamarda mahāsuraḥ //
tādṛśaṃ sarvalokeṣu na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati //
prahrādaḥ parivṛddho 'tra kālas tv apasṛto raṇāt //
āvarta iva saṃjajñe balasya mahato mahān /
tridaśānāṃ śarīrais tu dānavānāṃ ca medinī /
babhūva nicitā ghoraiḥ parvatair iva saṃplave //
sarvato mādhave māsi puṣpitair iva kiṃśukaiḥ //
hatair vīrair gajair aśvaiḥ prāvartata mahānadī /
tridaśā dānavāś caiva terus tāṃ dustarāṃ nadīm /
tataḥ sṛjantaṃ bānaughān anuhrādaṃ rathe sthitam /
kruddhas tato daityabalaṃ sūdayām āsa vittapaḥ /
vikṣipann iva khe vāyur mahābhrapaṭalaṃ balāt //
samīkṣya tumulaṃ yuddham anuhrādaś ca bhūpatiḥ /
sa dhanur dhanināṃ śreṣṭho vikṛṣya raṇamūrdhani /
kuberaṃ prāpya te bāṇā nirbhidya susamāhitāḥ /
tato vaiśravaṇo rājā kruddho yakṣagaṇaiḥ saha /
tad yathā śāradaṃ varṣaṃ govṛṣaḥ śīghram āgatam /
utpapāta rathāt tūrṇaṃ kṣitiṃ padbhyām upāgataḥ /
tasya karma mahāghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mahāsurāḥ /
tayos tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ saṃjajñe devadaityayoḥ //
anyonyaṃ vividhaiḥ śastrair ghorair jaghnatur āhave //
tridaśā dānavān yuddhe mathitvā prāṇadaṃs tadā /
dānavais tridaśāś cāpi kruddhair bhuvi nipātitāḥ //
dānavās tv atha saṃkruddhās tridaśān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
te gadābhiḥ subhīmābhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlam udgaraiḥ /
parighaiś ca sutīkṣṇāgrair dānavāḥ pīḍitāḥ suraiḥ //
jagṛhus te śilāś caiva drumāṃś cāsurasattamāḥ //
te bhīmavegā ditijā nardamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
śilābhir vipulābhiś ca śataśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ /
vidāritās triśūlaiś ca kecit tatra gatāsavaḥ //
śilāṃ tāṃ pātayām āsa kuberasya rathottame //
bhaṅktvā rathottamaṃ tasya nipapāta śilā bhuvi //
tam āpatantaṃ dhanado gadām udyamya vīryavān /
tasya kruddhasya saṃkruddho gadāṃ tāṃ bahukaṇṭakām /
daityas tu krodhatāmrākṣas taṃ prahāram acintayan /
papāta sahasā bhūmau viśīrṇa iva parvataḥ //
vitteśaṃ vihvalaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te yakṣarākṣasāḥ /
muhūrtaṃ vihvalo bhūtvā prabhur viśravasaḥ sutaḥ /
body.note: k: K1-3 Ñ1 Dn1 Ds D3.4.6 ins. :k
body.l: utthitaḥ sahasā bhūyaḥ piṅgākṣaḥ sa mahābalaḥ //
janayann iva nirghoṣaṃ vidhamann iva parvatān //
tam avadhyaṃ tu vijñāya nihataṃ punar utthitam /
kālanemiṃ ca nemiṃ ca mahānemiṃ ca dānavam //
ātmānaṃ caiva vīryaṃ ca vismṛtyābhijanaṃ tadā /
kva gacchata bhayatrastāḥ prākṛtā iva dānavāḥ //
pāṃsubhiś caiva kāṣṭhaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahābalāḥ /
bāhubhiś ca tathānyonyam ākṣipanti sma vegitāḥ //
muṣtibhiś ca talaiś caiva nakhapātair mahābalāḥ /
nikṛttāḥ patitā bhūmau tāmrapuṣpā iva drumāḥ //
anuhrādas tu vikrānto devāṃs tv āśīviṣopamān /
yudhyamānāṃś ca samare vyasṛjan niśitāñ śarān //
kuberas tu śarair bhinnaḥ samantāt kṣatajokṣitaḥ /
vihvalaś cāpy abhūd devo muhūrtaṃ dhanadādhipaḥ /
body.note: k: Ñ2 V3 cont., K4 Dn D1.2 ins. after line 2128 :k
body.l: labdhvā sa tu punaḥ saṃjñāṃ roṣaraktekṣaṇaḥ suraḥ /
cikṣeṣa daityam uddiśya balāt krodhena mūrchitaḥ //
aprāptām antare so 'tha tāṃ gadāṃ gadayāsuraḥ /
babhañja vinadan kruddhas tad āścaryam abhūt tadā /
pragṛhya tu gadāṃ bhūyo hy abhidudrāva dānavam //
tam antakam ivāyāntam ajeyaṃ sakalaiḥ suraiḥ /
grasantam iva taṃ daityaṃ trailokyam akhilaṃ ruṣā //
tam ālokya tathārūpaṃ dhanādhyakṣo raṇaṃ bhayāt /
apahāya yayau tatra yatra śakraḥ surādhipaḥ //
tasya cāpi mahat karma dṛṣṭvā vittapatis tadā /
nāhaṃ śakto raṇe yoddhum iti matvā dhanādhipaḥ /
vipracittis tu varuṇaṃ daityānām ādir avyayam /
na śaknoty agrataḥ sthātuṃ vipracitter jalādhipaḥ //
sa kaṇṭhasthena niṣkeṇa bhujasthair api cāṅgadaiḥ /
tridaśā varuṇaś caiva na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt /
tatrāsīn nirbhayas tv ekaḥ kauśiko vāsavaḥ prabhuḥ //
papāta sa punas tūrṇaṃ varuṇasyeva vakṣasi /
bhūyaś cainaṃ tadā bhrāmya varuṇāya nyapātayat //
sa papāta punas tūrṇaṃ varuṇasyeha vakṣasi /
body.note: k: While, K4 Dn D1.2.6 ins. after line 2181:k
body.l: pātyamāne tadā tasmiñ śarīre varuṇas tadā /
sa bhinnaḥ parigho ghoro devagātre vyaśīryata /
sa tu tena prahāreṇa cacāla salilādhipaḥ /
sa sainyeṣv atha bhagneṣu bhinnadeheṣu cāhave /
muhūrtam agamat kṣobham apāṃ patir amarṣaṇaḥ //
sa sāgaraiś caturbhis tu vṛto dīptaiḥ sapannagaiḥ /
varuṇas tu tadā kruddhas tān nirīkṣya svasainikān /
aham enaṃ haniṣyāmi bhayaṃ muktvā tu yudhyata /
te tu nālīkanārācair gadābhiḥ parighair api /
taṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddham āyāntaṃ hantāraṃ dānavān bahūn /
tatas tu dānavās tatra bhinnadehāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
vyathitā vidravanti sma diśo daśa vicetasaḥ /
tato 'straiś ca śilābhiś ca praharan sa balotkaṭaḥ /
body.note: k: For line 2225, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
k: K4 Dn D1.2 ins. after line 2225:k
body.l: cakāra buddhiṃ daityānāṃ vadhe brahmarṣibhiḥ stutaḥ //
lohito lohitagrīvo hartā dātā haviḥ kaviḥ /
adhṛṣyaḥ pāvako bhūtir bhūtātmā vai svadhādhipaḥ //
udyamya divyam āgneyam astraṃ devo raṇe mahat /
dadāha bhagavān vahniḥ saṃkruddhaḥ pralaye yathā /
body.note: k: For line 2250, B1.3 Cal. ed. subst. :k
body.l: prāṇo yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛdi tiṣṭhati pañcadhā //
yantā yaś ca hutāśasya sakhā ca prabhur īśvaraḥ /
yo hy ākāśagato devo dūragaḥ śabdasaṃbhavaḥ //
yaś ca kartā vikartā ca gatir gatimatāṃ prabhuḥ /
devakartā samo loke brahmaṇā yaḥ sanātanaḥ //
agnis tu sarvān ditijān prahrādapramukhāṃs tadā /
kecit pradīptair mukuṭaiḥ kecid dīptaiḥ śiroruhaiḥ /
kecit pradīptair vasanaiḥ kecid dīptair bhujānanaiḥ //
kecit pradīptair vacanaiḥ kecic chatrair dhvajai rathaiḥ /
patākāś ca parāś cānye mukuteṣv aṅgadeṣu ca //
sainyās te ca na dīpyante pāvakābhihatā raṇe /
asurā bhayavitrastā vidrutāś ca diśo daśa //
na ca paśyanti te sarve rūpiṇaṃ dhvajinīmukhe /
diśaḥ khaṃ gāṃ ca meghāṃś ca dīptān paśyanti dānavāḥ //
ity evaṃ dānavāḥ sarve menire trastacetasaḥ //
mayaś ca śambaraś caiva mahāmāyādharau tadā /
tābhyāṃ vahniḥ sa māyābhyāṃ śāmyate vyutthitas tadā /
ghanaiś ca vṛṣṭim adbhiś ca jalaughān bahuśas tadā /
nīto vahnis tadā śāntiṃ mayena śambareṇa ca /
ātmā vāyus tava vibho śarīram uta vīrudhaḥ /
yonir āpaś ca te śukre yonis tvam asi cāmbhasaḥ //
ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca gacchanti saṃcaranti ca pārśvataḥ /
arciṣas te mahābhāga sarvataḥ prabhavanti ca //
tvam evāgne sarvam asi tvayi sarvam idaṃ jagat /
tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ bibharṣi ca //
tvam evāgne havyavāḍ ekas tvam eva paramaṃ haviḥ /
yajanti ca sadā santas tvām eva paramādhvare //
tvam annaṃ prāṇināṃ bhuṅkṣe jagdhapītāśitaṃ vibho /
body.note: k: After 2296a, T2 G1 M4 ins. :k
k: After 2296, T1 G3 M2 ins. :k
body.l: tvam antaḥ prāṇinām āsīd dagdhapītāśanaḥ prabho /
tvayi pravṛtto vijayas tvayi lokāḥ pratiṣṭḥitāḥ //
tvam agne sarvabhūtānāṃ yonir vedeṣu gīyase /
tāṃ svayoniṃ samāsādya kiṃ viṣīdasi pāvaka //
body.note: k: V1 B Ds1.(marg.)2 D6 Cal. ed. ins. :k
body.l: namas te havyavāḍ eko namaste dāhaśaktaye /
bṛhaspates tu vacanaṃ śrutvāgniḥ satyam īritam /
hatās tu māyā daityānāṃ saṃpradīptāgninā raṇe /
prahrādas tūttaraṃ vākyam āha daityapatiṃ balim //
bhavān agniś ca vāyuś ca bhāskaraḥ salilaṃ śaśī /
nakṣatrāṇi diśo vyoma bhūś ca dānavasattama //
bhaviṣyaṃ caiva bhūtaṃ ca bhavac cāsurasattama /
dattaṃ hi te bhagavatā varahetoḥ svayaṃbuvā //
indratvaṃ cāmaratvaṃ ca yuddhe cāpy aparājayaḥ /
īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca balaṃ caivāmitaṃ tava /
sarvabhūteśvaratvaṃ ca prabhutvaṃ ca sadā tava /
amitatvaṃ laghutvaṃ ca ye cānye sāttvikā guṇāḥ //
tat parājaya devendraṃ devān sarvāṃś ca sānugān /
yathoktaṃ brahmaṇā rājaṃs tat tathā na tad anyathā //
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ /
dvijāś ca mukhyāḥ paśavaś ca maṅgalāḥ ||
balinā tu surāḥ sarve varjayitvā surādhipam /
raṇe śaraśatair bhinnāḥ sasainyā vai parājitāḥ //
vimukhā sā tu daityendrair vadhyamānā mahācamūḥ /
jitāś ca balinā devāḥ śakram āhur mahābalam //
bhavān indraś ca dhātā ca lokānāṃ prabhur avyayaḥ /
mahābhair avarūpaṃ hi daityendreṇa kṛtaṃ raṇe /
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ devānām amarādhipaḥ /
saṃvartakam iva kruddhaḥ sarvān dahati dānavān //
body.note: k: D6 T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 ins. after line 2392, G3 after line 2397:k
body.l: baliṃ balavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ baliś cāpi sureśvaram //
tataḥ kruddho balir daityaḥ śakraṃ hantuṃ mahāmṛdhe /
catvāry etāni saṃgṛhya śakras tiṣṭheti cābravīt //
tais tāni ca samāhatya nanāda vipulaṃ baliḥ /
sa pāśupatam ādāya balir balavatāṃ varaḥ /
anena tvāṃ haniṣyāmi balir āha śatakratum //
tenaiva tat samāhatya śakro dīptatvam āyayau //
astre pāśupate caiva nirbhagne vaiṣṇave tadā /
kṛtye caiva tadā mūḍhe śakro vajraṃ samādade //
tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad āsij jagatpate //
tato balir mahātejā brahmāstraṃ ca samādade /
tena tat prahṛtaṃ ghoraṃ vajram astraṃ mahāraṇe //
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca bhūyo yuddham abhūt tadā //
tato 'vidhyan mahendras taṃ baliṃ śastrair mahābalaḥ /
tāny astrāṇi mahābāhuś ciccheda śatadhā raṇe //
tataḥ kruddhaḥ punas tatra nijaghne dānavaṃ mahat /
body.note: k: K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D4.6 G3 ins. :k
body.l: śātayām āsa tac caindraṃ vāruṇāstreṇa dhīmatā //
aśarīrāṃ śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ tasmin mahati vaiśase //
tapasā hy uttamo daityo varadānena cādhikaḥ /
naiṣa śakyas tvayā jetuṃ tridaśair vā sureśvara //
body.note: k: For line 2410, T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: na śakyo bhavatā jetuṃ kuto 'nyais tridaśālayaiḥ /
yo hy asya jetā bhagavāṃs taṃ śṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ /
brahmaṇaḥ sa hi sarvasvaṃ devānāṃ caiva sā gatiḥ //
paraṃ rahasyaṃ dharmasya parasya ca parā gatiḥ /
body.note: k: K V1.3 B2 Dn Ds D1-6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: jetājeyo jayaḥ śrīmān so 'sya jetā bhaviṣyati //
śrutvā divyāṃ tu madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tām aśarīriṇīm /
apayāto raṇāc chakraḥ sārdhaṃ sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ //
body.note: k: G5 ins. after line 2420, T1.2 G1.3.4. M2.4 after line 2421:k
body.l: vāditrāṇāṃ ca nirghoṣas tumulaś cābhavat tadā /
balir indro babhau daityo hiraṇyakaśipur yathā //
deveṣu makhaśobhāś ca svargārthaṃ darśayatsu ca /
prakṛtisthe tadā loke vartamāne ca satpathe //
abhāve sarvapāpānāṃ bhāve caiva tathā sthite /
prītāsmi tava bhadraṃ te devatānāṃ parājaye //
yat tvayā yudhi vikramya devarājaḥ parājitaḥ /
dṛṣṭvā te paramaṃ sattvaṃ tato 'haṃ svayam āgatā //
viśeṣitas tvayā rājan daityendraḥ sa pitāmahaḥ /
yena bhuktaṃ hi nikhilaṃ trailokyam idam avyayam //
body.note: k: K1.4 Ñ2 B Ds D1.2.4.6 ins. :k
body.l: viśeṣatas tava vibho sarvo dharmaḥ sthitaḥ pathi /
evam uktvā hi sā devī lakṣmīr daityapatiṃ balim /
śiṣṭāś ca divyaḥ pravarā hrīḥ kīrtir dyutir eva ca /
prabhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā bhūtir nītir vidyā dayā matiḥ //
smṛtir meghā tathā lajjā lakṣmīr īḍā gatis tathā /
śrutiḥ prītis tathā kāntiḥ śāntiḥ puṣṭiḥ kriyā tathā //
parājitāḥ surā daityaiḥ kim akurvata vai mune /
kathaṃ ca tridivaṃ labdhaṃ bhūyo devair dvijottama //
śrutvā vāṇīṃ tu tāṃ divyāṃ saha devaiḥ surādhipaḥ /
prāpyādityālayaṃ śakraḥ kathayām āsa tāṃ giram /
adityā sā yathā yuddhe tena vāṇī purā śrutā //
yady evaṃ putra yuṣmābhir na śakyo hantum āhave /
tenaikena sahasrākṣa na hy anyena śatakrato //
tad vaḥ pṛcchāmi pitaraṃ kaśyapaṃ satyavādinam /
tad gaccha pitaraṃ pṛccha kāśyapaṃ brahmavādinam /
body.note: k: For line 2484, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ prajānāṃ patir uttamaḥ /
tataḥ praṇamya te vīrāḥ sahādityā surarṣabhāḥ /
ūcuḥ prāṅjalayaḥ sarve brahmāṇam iva mānasāḥ //
yac chrutaṃ yudhi śakreṇa sarasvatyā samīritam /
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ kaśyapas tadā /
tato 'dityā saha surā yāntaṃ kaśyapam anvayuḥ /
didṛkṣavas te brahmāṇaṃ tapaso rāśim avyayam /
body.note: k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. after line 2500 :k
k: K1 Ñ1 V1.3 B Ds D4.6 T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 ins. after line 2501, Ñ2 after line 2502 :k
body.l: śuśruvur madhurāṃ devā brahmaṇaḥ sadane sthitāḥ //
body.note: k: K1 V1.3 B Ds D4.6 ins. :k
k: While Ñ2 ins. after line 2502:k
k: Ñ1 B3 Dn M2 ins. :k
body.l: te tatra samanuprāpya śṛṇvanto vai dhvaniṃ surāḥ /
pūtāny ātmaśarīrāṇi menire te na saṃśayaḥ //
namaskurvanti ca punar guruṃ lokaguruṃ prabhum /
body.note: k: K1 B Ds D4.6 Bom. Poona ed. G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: tatra tatra ca viprendrān niyatān saṃśitavratān /
tasyāṃ sabhāyām āste sma brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
upāsate ca tatrainaṃ prajānāṃ patayaḥ prabhum /
dakṣaḥ pracetāḥ pulaho marīciś ca dvijottamaḥ //
bhṛgur atrir vasiṣṭhaś ca gautamo nāradas tathā /
mano dyaur antarikṣaṃ ca vāyus tejo jalaṃ mahī //
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca /
prakṛtiś ca vikāraś ca yac cānyat kāraṇaṃ mahat //
kriyāś ca kratavaś caiva saṃkalpaḥ prāṇa eva ca //
ete cānye ca bahavaḥ svayaṃbhuvam upasthitāḥ /
artho dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dveṣo harṣaś ca nityadā //
śuko bṛhaspatiś caiva saṃvarto budha eva ca /
śanaiś caraś ca rāhuś ca grahāḥ sarve hy aśeṣataḥ //
maruto viśvakarmā ca nakṣatrāṇi ca bhārata /
divākaraś ca somaś ca brahmāṇaṃ samupāsate /
sarvāṇi śrutiśāstrāṇi gāthāś ca niyamās tathā /
kṣaṇā lavā muhūrtāś ca divā rātriś ca bhārata /
ardhamāsāś ca māsāś ca ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ tathaiva ca //
kālacakraṃ ca yad divyaṃ nityam adhruvam avyayam //
ete cānye ca bahavaḥ svayaṃbhuvam upasthitāḥ /
te praviṣṭāḥ sabhāṃ divyāṃ brahmaṇaḥ sarvakāmadām //
brahmāṇaṃ vīkṣya te sarve āsīnaṃ paramāsane /
body.note: k: Ñ1 B T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: śirobhiḥ praṇatāḥ sarve devāḥ kāśyapa eva ca /
jagmur mūrdhnā śubhau pādau brahmaṇas te divaukasaḥ //
śirobhiḥ spṛśya caraṇau tasya te parameṣṭhinaḥ /
dṛṣtvā tu tān surān sarvān kaśyapena sahāgatān /
āha brahmā mahātejā devānāṃ prabhur īśvaraḥ //
yadartham iha saṃprāptā bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi /
vijānāmy aham avyagram enam arthaṃ mahābalāḥ //
bhaviṣyati ca vaḥ so 'rthaḥ kāṅkṣito yaḥ surottamāḥ /
baler dānavamukhyasya yo vai jetā bhaviṣyati //
na khalv asurasaṃghānām eko jetā sa viśvakṛt /
body.note: k: For line 2561, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k
body.l: dhātā caiva hi lokānāṃ viśvayoniḥ sanātanaḥ /
yo mānyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaś ca bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ /
ātmā vai yena vibhunā kṛto 'jeyo mahātmanā /
paraṃ devasya viśvasya jagataḥ śāśvatas tathā /
prabhavaḥ sa hi sarveṣām asmākam api pūrvajaḥ /
acintyaḥ sa hi viśvātmā yogayuktaḥ paraṃ tapaḥ //
taṃ devāpi mahātmānaṃ na viduḥ ko 'py asāv iti /
vedātmānaṃ ca viśvaṃ ca sa devaḥ puruṣottamaḥ //
tasyaiva tu prasādena tasya vakṣye parāṃ gatim /
yatra yogaṃ samāsthāya tapaś carati duścaram //
amṛtaṃ nāma paramaṃ sthānam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ //
bhavantas tatra vai gatvā tapasā saṃśitavratāḥ /
amṛtaṃ sthānam āsādya tapaś carata duścaram //
amoghāṃ tasya devasya viśve devā mahātmanaḥ //
atha yuṣmān harir brūyāt kim āgamanakāraṇam /
kasya kaṃ vā varaṃ devā dadāmi varadaḥ sthitaḥ //
taṃ kaśyapo 'ditiś caiva varaṃ gṛhṇīta vai tataḥ /
praṇamya śirasā pādau tasmai yogātmane tadā //
bhagavān eva naḥ putro bhavatv iti na saṃśayaḥ /
uktaś ca parayā bhaktyā tathāstv iti sa vakṣyati //
devā bruvantu te sarve bhrātā nas tvaṃ bhaveti ca /
tathāstv iti ca sa śrīmān vakṣyate sarvalokakṛt //
tasmād evaṃ gṛhītvā tu varaṃ tridaśasattamāḥ /
kṛtakṛtyāḥ punaḥ sarve gacchadhvaṃ svaṃ svam ālayam //
tathāstv iti surāḥ sarve kaśyapo 'ditir eva ca /
vanditvā brahmacaraṇau gatāḥ saumyāṃ diśaṃ prati //
te 'tītya sāgarān sarvān parvatāṃś ca bahūn kṣaṇāt /
nadīś ca vividhā divyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ surasattamāḥ //
amṛtaṃ sthānam āsādya kaśyapena surāḥ saha /
damena ca sūrāḥ sarve tapo duścaram āsthitāḥ //
udīrayati vedoktaṃ yam āhuḥ paramaṃ stavam //
body.p: ||* namo 'stu te devadeva ekaśṛṅga varāha vṛṣārciṣa vṛṣasindho vṛṣākape suravṛṣabha suranirmita anirmita bhadra kapila viṣvaksena dhruvadharma dharmarāja vaikuṇṭha śatāvarta anādimadhyanidhana dhanaṃjaya śuciśravaḥ agnija vṛṣṇija aja ajaya amṛteśa sanātana vidhātaḥ trikāma tridhāma trikakut kukudmin duṃdubhe mahānābha lokanābha padmanābha viriñce variṣṭha bahurūpa virūpa viśvarūpa akṣaya akṣara satyākṣara haṃsākṣara havyabhuja khaṇḍaparaśo śukra muñjakeśa haṃsa mahadakṣara hṛṣīkeśa sūkṣma paramasūkṣma turāṣāṭ viśvamūrte surāgraja nīla nistama viraja tamorajaḥsattvadhāma sarvalokapratiṣṭha śipiviṣṭa sutapaḥ tapogra agra agraja dharmanābha gabhastinābha dharmaneme satyadhāma satyākṣara gabhastineme vipāpman candraratha tvam eva samudravāsī aja ekapāt sahasraśīrṣa sahasrasaṃmita mahāśīrṣa sahasradṛk sahasrapāt adhomukha mahāmukha mahāpuruṣa puruṣottama sahasrabāho sahasramūrte sahasrāsya sahasrākṣa sahasrabhuja sahasrabhuva sahasraśas tvām āhur vedāḥ *||
||* viśvadeva viśvasaṃbhava sarveṣām eva devānāṃ saubhaga ādau gatiḥ viśvaṃ tvam āpyāyanaḥ viśvaṃ tvām āhuḥ puṣpahāsa paramavaradas tvam eva tvam eva vauṣaṭ *||
||* oṃkāra vaṣaṭkāraṃ tvām ekam āhur agryaṃ makhabhāgaprāśinam *||
||* śatadhāra sahasradhāra bhūrda bhuvarda svarda bhūrbhuvaḥsvarda tvam eva bhūtaṃ bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ svadhā tvam eva brahmaśaya brahmamaya brahmādis tvam eva *||
||* dyaur asi pṛthivy asi pūṣāsi mātariśvāsi dharmo 'si maghavāsi hotā potā netā hantā mantā homyahotā parātparas tvaṃ homyahotā tvam eva *||

||* āpo 'si viśvavāk dhātrā parameṇa dhāmnā tvam eva digbhyaḥ sruk srugbhāṇḍa ijyo 'si īḍyo 'si tvaṣṭā tvam eva samiddhaḥ tvam eva gatir gatimatām asi mokṣo 'si yogo 'si guhyo 'si siddho 'si dhanyo 'si dhātāsi paramo 'si yajño 'si somo 'si yūpo 'si dakṣiṇāsi dīkṣāsi viśvam asi *||

||* sthaviṣṭha sthavira viśvaturāṣāṭ hiraṇyagarbha hiraṇyanābha hiraṇyanārāyaṇa nārāyaṇāntara nṛṇām ayana ādityavarṇa ādityatejaḥ mahāpuruṣa surottama ādideva padmanābha padmeśaya padmākṣa padmagarbha hiraṇyāgrakeśa śukla viśvadeva viśvatomukha viśvākṣa viśvasaṃbhava viśvabhuk tvam eva *||

||* bhūrivikrama cakrakrama tribhuvanasuvikrama svavikrama svarvikrama babhruḥ suvibhuḥ prabhākaraḥ śaṃbhuḥ svayaṃbhūś ca bhūtādiḥ bhūtātman mahābhūta viśvabhuk tvam eva viśvagoptāsi viśvaṃbhara pavitram asi havirviśārada haviḥkarmā amṛtendhana surāsuraguro mahādideva nṛdeva ūrdhvakarman pūtātman amṛteśa divaspṛk viśvasthapate ghṛtācy asi anantakarman druhiṇavaṃśa svavaṃśa viśvapās tvaṃ tvam eva viśvaṃ bibharṣi varārthino nas trāyasveti *||
body.l: nārāyaṇas tu bhagavāñ śrutvemaṃ paramaṃ stavam /
śrīmān prītamanā devaḥ provāca prabur īśvaraḥ //
prīto 'smi vaḥ suraśreṣṭhāḥ sarve matto viniścayan /
varaṃ vṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo varado 'smi surottamāḥ //
tadaiva kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ //
yadi prasanno bhagavān dātavyo vā paro yadi /
adityāṃ vai mama śrīmān bhagavān astu vai sutaḥ //
aditir devamātā ca etam evārtham uttamam /
yācate putrakāmā vai bhavān putro bhavatv iti /
bhrātā bhartā ca dhātā ca śaraṇaṃ ca bhavasva naḥ //
adityāḥ putratāṃ yāte tvayi devāḥ savāsavāḥ /
tatas tān abravīd viṣṇur devān kaśyapam eva ca /
body.note: k: Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.6 G3.4 ins. :k
body.l: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuta /
sarveṣām eva yuṣmākaṃ ye bhaviṣyanti śatravaḥ /
muhūrtam api te sarve na sthāsyanti mamāgrataḥ //
parair mama sukhaṃ cāpi tat kariṣyāmi cādarāt //
parituṣṭo 'smi vo devā mamaivaṃ niyamena ca /
havyādāṃś ca surān sarvān kavyādāṃś ca pitṝn api //
yathāmanīṣitaṃ kartā gacchadhvaṃ tvaṃ svam ālayam //
evam ukte tu vacane viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā /
viśve devā mahātmānaḥ kaśyapo 'ditir eva ca //
body.note: k: K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.4.5 ins. :k
body.l: sādhyā marudgaṇāś caiva śakraś caiva mahābalaḥ /
pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu prasūtā garbham uttamam /
garbhasthena tu devena paritrātāḥ surās tadā /
tasmiñ jāte tu deveśe trailokyasya sukhāvahe /
body.note: k: D6 T1.3 G1.3-5 M2.4 G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: prajānāṃ patayaḥ sapta sapta caiva maharṣayaḥ /
marīcir aṅgirāś caiva pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ /
aurvo vasiṣṭhaputraś ca stambaḥ kaśyapa eva ca /
kapīvān akapīvāṃś ca datto niścyavanas tathā //
gārgyaḥ pṛthus tathaivāgryo yāmyo vāmana eva ca /
devabāhur yadudhraś ca parjanyaś caiva somajaḥ //
bahubhiḥ saha gandharvaiḥ prāgāyata ca tumburuḥ //
gomāyuḥ sūryavarcāś ca somavarcāś ca saptamaḥ //
yugapas tṛṇapaḥ kārṣṇir nandiś citrarathas tathā /
kaliḥ pañcadaśaś cātra nāradaś caiva ṣoḍaśaḥ /
ṣaṭpañcāśad ime proktās tatraiva tu mahīpate //
hāhā hūhūś ca gandharvau haṃsaś caiva mahādyutiḥ /
anūkā ca tathā jāmī miśrakeśī alaṃbusā /
asitā ca subāhuś ca supriyā subhagā tathā /
urvaśī citralekhā ca sugrīvā ca sulocanā //
nandā sarasvatī caiva tathānyās tatra saṃpadāḥ /
puṇḍarīkā sugandhā ca surathā ca pramāthinī /
nandā sārasvatī caiva tathānyās tatra saṃghaśaḥ //
dhātāryamā ca mitraś ca varuṇo 'ṃśo bhagas tathā /
indro vivasvān pūṣā ca tvaṣṭā ca savitā tathā /
kathito viṣṇur ity evaṃ kāśyapeyo gaṇas tathā //
mṛgavyādhaś ca sarpaś ca nirṛtiś ca mahāyaśāḥ /
dahano 'atheśvaraś caiva kapālī ca viśāṃ pate /
sthāṇur bhagaś ca bhagavān rudras tatrāvatasthire //
body.note: k: For line 2707, T1 G3.5 subst. :k
body.l: stāṇuś ca bhagavān rudras tathā ekādaśāpare /
aśvinau vasavaś cāṣṭau marutaś ca mahābalāḥ /
viśvedevāś ca sādhyāś ca tasya prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ /
kacchapaś cāpahantā ca takṣakaś ca mahābalaḥ //
ete nāgā mahātmānas tasmai prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ //
ete cānye ca bahavo nāgās tasya mahātmanaḥ /
tārkṣyaś cāriṣṭanemiś ca garuḍaś ca mahābalaḥ /
aruṇaś cāruṇiś caiva vainateyā hy upasthitāḥ //
ṛṣayaḥ pitaraś caiva somapāś cāmbupāś ca ye //
trailokyam adahat kṛtsnaṃ sādhyā ye ca tapodhanāḥ /
pitāmahaś ca bhagavān svayam āgamya lokakṛt /
prāha devaguruḥ śrīmān saha sarvair mahātmabhiḥ //
tasmāl lokeśvaraḥ śrīmān viṣṇur eva bhavatv ayam //
evam uktvā tu bhagavān sārdhaṃ devarṣibhiḥ prabhuḥ /
namas kṛtvā sureśāya jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ //
sa tu jātaḥ sureśānaḥ kaśyapasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥ /
yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ //
yogasiddhaṃ mahātmānaṃ yaṃ vidur yogam uttamam //
yaṃ prāpya śāśvataṃ viprā niyatā mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
yaṃ prāhuḥ śāśvataṃ divyaṃ gīyatāṃ mokṣakāñkṣiṇaḥ /
yad etat tapa ity āhuḥ sarvāśrayanivāsinaḥ /
sevante yaṃ yatāhārā duścaraṃ vratam āsthitāḥ //
yo yajña iti viprendrair ijyate svargalipsubhiḥ /
sa prāha tridaśān sarvān vācā vai parayā vibhuḥ /
jānann api mahātejā gato yogena bālatām //
kiṃ karomi suraśreṣṭhāḥ kaṃ varaṃ ca dadāmi vaḥ /
yat kāṅkṣitaṃ vaḥ sarveṣāṃ tad vai brūta mudā yutāḥ //
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāmanasya mahātmanaḥ /
brahmaṇo varadānena hṛtaṃ no nikhilaṃ jagat /
tapasā mahatā caiva vikrameṇa damena ca //
bhavān prabhavate tasya nānyaḥ kaścana suvrata /
ṛṣīṇāṃ ca hitārthāya lokānāṃ ca sureśvara //
priyārthaṃ ca tathādityāḥ kaśyapasya tathaiva ca //
kavyaṃ pitṝṇām ucitaṃ surāṇāṃ havyam uttamam /
asmākaṃ ca hitārthāya trailokyasya ca sattama /
priyahetor adityāś ca kāśyapasya tathaiva ca /
kratunā vājimeghena yajate sa hi dānavaḥ /
asmin sthāne tu te nātha trailokyasya gataiḥ saha /
yat pratyānayane yuktaṃ lokānāṃ tad vicintaya //
evam uktas tadā devair viṣṇur vāmanarūpadhṛk /
praharṣayann uvācātha sarvān devān idaṃ vacaḥ //
tato bṛhaspatiḥ śrīmān anayad vāmanaṃ prabhum /
mauñjī yajñopavītī ca chatrī daṇḍī dhvajī tathā /
praviśann eva sa śrīmān yajñavāṭaṃ sureśvaraḥ /
ātmānam eva bhagavān varṇayām āsa taṃ kratum //
body.note: k: After line 2776, K1 Ñ2 V1. 3 B Dn Ds D3. 4. 6 T1. 2 G1. 3-5 M2. 4 ins. :k
body.l: ārād atha bales tasya ṛtvijām abhitas tathā /
yajñam ātmānam evāsau hetubhiḥ kāraṇair vibhuḥ //
vaidikair aprakāśaiś ca punar apy atha bhārata /
tato niruttarān dṛṣṭvā sopādhyāyān ṛṣīṃś ca tān /
adbhutaṃ cāpi mene sa virocanasuto balī /
mūrdhnā kṛtāñjaliś cedam abravīd dhṛṣṭavad vacaḥ //
kutas tvaṃ ko 'si kasyāsi kiṃ cehāsti prayojanam /
nedṛśāḥ santi devānām ṛṣīṇām api sūnavaḥ /
na nāgānāṃ na yakṣāṇāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ na rakṣasām //
na pitṝnāṃ na siddhānāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ tathaiva ca /
yo 'si so 'si namaste 'stu brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te //
ukta evaṃ hy acintyātmā balinā vāmanas tadā /
kratūnāṃ pravaraḥ śrīmān aśvamedha iti smṛtaḥ //
etac chrutvā tu daityendro vāmanena samīritam /
mudā paramayā yuktaḥ prāha daityapatir baliḥ //
kasyāsi brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha kim icchasi dadāmi te /
varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi //
na rājyaṃ na ca yānāni na ratnāni na ca striyaḥ /
kāmaye yadi tuṣṭo 'si dharme ca yadi te matiḥ //
gurvarthaṃ me grayacchasva padāni trīṇi dānava /
tvam agniśaraṇārthāya eṣa me paramo varaḥ //
vāmanasya vacaḥ śrutvā prāha daityapatir baliḥ /
body.note: k: While D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2804 :k
body.l: tribhiḥ kiṃ tava viprendra padaiḥ pravadatāṃ vara /
mā dadasva mahābāho na taṃ vetsi mahāsura /
evam uktaḥ sa śukreṇa ciraṃ saṃcintya vai baliḥ /
balir dānavarājas tu avajñāya tu tad vacaḥ /
praharṣeṇa samāyuktaḥ kiṃ ataḥ pātram iṣyate //
gṛhya haste tv asaṃbhrānto bhṛṅgāraṃ kanakāmayam /
pratīccha dehi kiṃ bhūmiṃ kiṃmātrā bhoḥ padatrayam /
dattaṃ vaḥ pātaya jalaṃ naiva mithyā bhaved guruḥ //
bho na deyaṃ kuto daitya vijñāto 'yaṃ yathā dhruvam /
ko 'yaṃ viṣṇur aho prītir vañcitas tvaṃ na vañcitaḥ //
kathaṃ sa nātho 'yaṃ viṣṇur yajñe svayam upasthitaḥ /
dāsyāmi devadevāya yad yad icchaty ayaṃ prabhuḥ //
ko vānyaḥ pātrabhūto 'smād viṣṇoḥ parataraṃ bhavet /
evam uktvā baliḥ śīghraṃ pātayām āsa vai jalam //
yan mayā pūrvam uktaṃ hi tat tathā na tad anyathā //
body.note: k: After line 2824, K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Dn Ds D4.6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāmanasya mahaujasaḥ /
evam astv iti daityeśo vākyam uktvārisūdanaḥ /
vāmano hy asurendrasya cikīrṣuḥ kadanaṃ mahat /
prāṅmukhaś cāpi daityeśas tasmai sumanasā jalam /
dātukāmaḥ kare yāvat tāvat taṃ pratyabodhayat //
iṅgitajño 'grataḥ sthitvā prahrādas tv abravīd vacaḥ //
mā dadasva jalaṃ haste baṭor vāmanarūpiṇaḥ /
sa tv asau yena te pūrvaṃ nihataḥ prapitāmahaḥ /
viṣṇur eva mahāprājñas tvāṃ vañcayitum āgataḥ //
devāya pradadau tasmai padāni trīṇi viṣṇave //
dānaveśvara mā dās tvaṃ viprāyāsmai pratigraham /
nainaṃ vipraśiśuṃ manye nedṛśo bhavati dvijaḥ //
rūpeṇānena daityendra satyam etad bravīmi te /
nārasiṃham ahaṃ manye tam eva punar āgatam //
prahrādam abravīd vākyam idaṃ nirbhartsayann iva //
dehīti yācate yo hi pratyākhyāti ca yo 'sura /
ubhayor apy alakṣyā vai bhāgas taṃ viśate naram //
pratijñāya tu yo vipre na dadāti pratigraham /
pratigrahītā cāpy anyaḥ kaścid asmād dvijo 'tha vai //
nādhiko vidyate yasmāt tad dadāmi vasuṃdharām /
hṛdayasya ca me tuṣṭiḥ parā bhavati dānava //
eṣa tasmāt pradāsyāmi na sthāsyāmi nivāritaḥ //
bhūyaś ca prābravīd enaṃ vāmanaṃ baṭurūpiṇam /
svalpaiḥ svalpamate kiṃ te padais tribhir anuttamam /
kṛtsnāṃ dadāmi te vipra pṛthivīṃ sāgarair vṛtām //
na pṛthvīṃ kāmaye kṛtsnāṃ saṃtuṣṭo 'smi padais tribhiḥ /
eṣa eva ruciṣyo me varo dānavasattama /
body.note: k: After line 24 of *196, Ñ2 ins. :k
body.l: kṛtvārdhaṃ tanu siṃhasya narasyaiva paraṃ tathā /
eka eva asau devaḥ kāryārthe bahutāṃ gataḥ /
āpo bhūḥ khaṃ sarṣigaṇā devā jyotir gaṇādayaḥ //
yad aṃśabhūtāḥ sarve te sa eva punar āgataḥ //
ātmānaṃ baṭum āsthāya yayāca tvāṃ sureśvara /
na deyaṃ hi na deyaṃ hi iti me niścitā matiḥ /
body.note: k: After line 33 of *196, Ñ2 ins. :k
body.l: sa kathaṃ yācate māṃ tu baṭur bhūtvā hariḥ svayam /
padāni trīṇi daityendra yajñavāṭe tataḥ punaḥ //
na vidyate sukṛtaṃ tāta yena sa dṛṣṭim āgataḥ /
yaṃ dhyāyanti ca manasā yogino niyame sthitāḥ /
brahmadevo bhavaś caiva yaṃ na paśyati cakṣuṣā //
niyamena vinā tāta bhaktyā vā bhajatā mayi /
īdṛśo yadi so bhūtaḥ ataḥ para karomi kim /
body.note: k: After line 36 of *196, T1.2 G1.3.5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: kartavyaṃ naitad ity evaṃ māyeyaṃ prāyikī nṛpa //
balir dānavarājas tu avajñāya ca tad vacaḥ /
tathāstv iti baliḥ procya sparśayām āsa dānavaḥ /
kampayāmy aśayām āsa tujena hṛdayena ca (?) /
dadau ca sodakaṃ daityo vāmanāya jagatpatiḥ /
toye tu patite haste vāmano 'bhūd avāmanaḥ /
sarvadevamayaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa vai prabhuḥ //
bhūḥ pādau dyauḥ śiraś cāsya candrādityau ca cakṣuṣī /
pādāṅgulyaḥ piśācāś ca hastāṅgulyaś ca guhyakāḥ //
viśvedevāś ca jānusthā jaṅghe sādhyāḥ surottamāḥ /
yakṣā nakheṣu saṃbhūtā lekhāś cāpsarasas tathā //
dṛṣṭir dhiṣṇyāni vipulāḥ keśāḥ sūryāṃśavas tathā /
bāhavo vidiśaś cāsya diśaḥ śrotraṃ tathaiva ca /
aśvinau śravaṇau cāsya nāsā vāyur mahābalaḥ //
prasādaś candramāś caiva mano dharmas tathaiva ca /
satyam asyābhavad vāṇī jihvā devī sarasvatī //
grīvāditir mahādevī tāluḥ sūryaś ca dīptamān /
dvāraṃ svargasya nābhir vai mitras tvaṣṭā ca vai bhruvau //
mukhaṃ vaiśvānaraś cāsya vṛṣaṇau tu prajāpatiḥ /
hṛdayaṃ bhagavān brahmā puṃstvaṃ vai kaśyapo muniḥ //
uro rudro mahādevo dhairyaṃ cāsya mahārṇavaḥ /
udaraṃ cāsya gandharvā bhujagāś ca mahābalāḥ //
lakṣmīr medhā dhṛtiḥ kāntiḥ sarvavidyāś ca vai kaṭiḥ /
sarvajyotīṃṣi yānīha tapaḥ śakras tu devarāṭ /
stanau kakṣau ca vedāś ca oṣṭhau cāsya makhāḥ sthitāḥ /
iṣṭayaḥ paśubandhāś ca dvijānāṃ ceṣṭitāni ca //
tasya devamayaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣṇor mahāsurāḥ /
śṛṇu nāmāni sarveṣāṃ rūpāṇy abhijanāni ca /
body.note: k: Before line 2855, D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: jaya viśva prabho viṣṇo jaya vāmana mādhava //
natāḥ sma taṃ jagatāṃ patim ādibhūtam ||
namo namo jagannātha viṣṇo deva jagatpate /
tvām eva vividhā vedā vadanti brahma śāśvatam //
jaya deva hare kṛṣṇa jaya vāmana pāvana /
tvayy eva sakalaṃ lokaṃ paśyāmo jagatīpate //
tatra nāgāḥ parivṛtāḥ samānarcuḥ padaṃ mahat //
yābhyāṃ sahasram anye tu vāruṇīṃ ca tathāpare /
antarā ca sahasrāṇi bāhūnāṃ yānti cakriṇaḥ //
kecic chaṅkhaṃ samādaghmuḥ kecic chārṅgaṃ vicikṣipuḥ /
anye parighasaktāḥ syur itare pāśino bhavan /
body.note: k: For line 15 of *199, D6 subst. :k
k: After line 17 of *199, D6 ins. :k
k: After line 18a of *199, T2 G1-2.4 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: tyayy eva sakalaṃ lokaṃ paśyāmo jagatīpate //
vipracittiḥ śibiḥ śaṅkur ayaḥśaṅkus tathaiva ca /
puṣkaraḥ puṣkalaś caiva sāśvo 'śvapatir eva ca //
niṣprabhaḥ suprabhaḥ śrīmāṃs tathaiva ca nirūdaraḥ //
śarabhaḥ śalabhaś caiva kuṇapaḥ kulapaḥ krathaḥ //
vāyur gaviṣṭho namuciḥ śambaro vikṣaro mahān /
kālakaḥ kālakākṣaś ca vṛtraḥ krodho vimokṣaṇaḥ /
gaviṣṭhaś ca haviṣṭhaś ca pralambo narakaḥ pṛthuḥ //
asilomā pulomā ca bāṣkalaḥ pramado madaḥ //
śṛgālavadanaś caiva karālaḥ keśir eva ca /
ekākṣaś ca varāhaś ca tuhuṇḍaḥ sṛmalaḥ sṛpaḥ //
ete cānye ca bahavaḥ kramamāṇaṃ trivikramam /
body.note: k: Ñ2 V1 B Ds2 T1.2 G1.4-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2884, Ñ1 Dn D3 after line 2885 :k
k: Ds ins. after line 2893; V1.3 Cal. ed. after line 2895:k
body.l: kuntaiḥ kuṭhāraiḥ parighair asibhis tomaraiḥ śaraiḥ //
bāhubhir muṣṭibhiś caiva talair dantair nakhais tathā /
yathāśakti yathāyogaṃ kuryur yuddhaṃ hi dānavāḥ /
body.note: k: V1.3 B1 Cal. ed. ins. :k
body.l: jahāra tridivaṃ devas tribhir vikramaṇair hariḥ /
body.note: k: On the other hand, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2907 :k
body.l: daityendrān sa samāgatya bāhubhiś ca tathā parān /
rūpaṃ kṛtvā mahākāyaṃ jahārāśu sa medinīm //
body.note: k: Ñ2 B1.2 T2 G1 ins. :k
body.l: prītas tasmai sureśāya dadau viṣṇur urukramaḥ /
tatrasthaś ca mahātejā dhyānaṃ paramam āsthitaḥ /
kiṃ mayā deva kartavyaṃ brūhi sarvam aśeṣataḥ //
body.note: k: After line 2921a, D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
k: After line 2921, Ñ2 V3 T1 G4 ins. :k
body.l: tato daityādhipaṃ prāha devo viṣṇuḥ surottamaḥ /
varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi //
body.note: k: Ñ1 ins. after line 2923, B1.3 Ds subst. for line 2926:k
body.l: evam uktvā tato viṣṇur atha bhūyo 'surādhipam /
mā ca śakrasya vacanaṃ pratihāsīḥ kathaṃcana /
aham ājñāpayāmi tvāṃ śreyaś caivam avāpsyasi //
evam uktvā tadā viṣṇu+ narekaśaḥ surādhipam /
body.note: k: Reading corrupt! Perhaps for "viṣṇur narakeśāsurādhipam"? :k
body.l: vācā paramayā devo vareṇyaḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ //
yat tvayā salilaṃ dattaṃ gṛhītaṃ pāṇinā mayā /
tasmāt te daitya devebhyo nāsti jātu bhayaṃ kvacit //
te tasmin parituṣṭiś ca varaṃ caitac chṛṇuṣva me /
body.note: k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2929 :k
body.l: amaratvaṃ hi bhavato nāsti mṛtyuḥ pitus tava /
dhyāhi māṃ satataṃ daitya matkathāparamo bhava /
sutalaṃ nāma pātālaṃ tatra tvaṃ sānugo vasa /
devatāś cāpi te sarvāḥ pūjyā eva mahāsura //
prāpsyase ca mahābhāga divyān kāmān yathepsitān /
iha cāmutra cākṣayyān vividhāṃś ca paricchadān //
bhogāṃś ca vividhān samyag yajñāṃś ca sahadakṣiṇān //
yadā caitāṃ mayā proktāṃ maryādāṃ cālayiṣyasi /
bandhiṣyanti tadā hi tvāṃ nāgapāśā mahābalāḥ //
namaskāryāś ca te nityaṃ mahendrādyā divaukasaḥ /
namas karomi deveśaṃ tvāṃ sadā jagatīpate /
tvam eva mama govinda śaraṇaṃ nānya eva hi //
cintayāmi jagannātha tvām eva satataṃ hare /
idaṃ mama hare viṣṇo vadasvādya hitaṃ vibho /
tatrāsato me pātāle bhāgaṃ brūhi surottama //
body.note: k: Ñ2 V1.3 B2 Ds D3 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
body.l: kathaṃ tatra mayā stheyaṃ vibudhānāṃ maheśvara /
tad vadasva suraśreṣṭha tṛptir yena mamākṣayā //
puṇyaṃ maddveṣiṇāṃ yac ca madbhaktadveṣiṇāṃ tathā /
kathāsu mama daityendra kathyamānāsu yatra ha /
aśṛṇvan yo naro gacchet tasya saṃvatsarārjitam /
yatnena mahatā vāpi tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati //
aśuśrūṣur hared vidyāṃ sā tavāstu bale parā //
śudrānnam aśnatām yeṣāṃ puṇyaṃ yac cārjitaṃ mahat /
vedoktaṃ yat parityajya dharmam anyaṃ prakurvataḥ /
aśraddhayā ca yad dānaṃ dadatām yajatāṃ yathā /
tat sarvaṃ tava daityendra matprasādād bhaviṣyati //
śaradṛtau dinaikaṃ ca rājyaṃ tava bhaviṣyati /
etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ balir viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ /
evam astv iti taṃ proktvā pātālam asuro gataḥ /
cintayām āsa bhagavān pravibhāgaṃ jite(?)s tadā //
atha cintayatas tasya devā brahmādayo nṛpa /
te gatā jatvare(?) cainaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahādyutim /
pātālaṃ pātito divyā nigṛhāṇaṃ ca te kṣayāḥ /
indro madhurayā vācā pālyatāṃ tridivaṃ punaḥ /
body.note: k: Ñ2 B Ds D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k
k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 cont. :k
body.l: jāmbavān atha tac chrutvā bherīṃ saṃnādayan bahu /
devāḥ svasthānam āyantu daityāḥ sarve hatāśrayāḥ /
na bhayaṃ vidyate kiṃcij jitaṃ bhagavatā jagat //
sadā vedā hy adhīyantāṃ śīghraṃ nākaṃ prapadyatām /
brāhmaṇāḥ svasti vo nityaṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit /
ity uktvā jāmbavān ṛkṣaḥ sthito meroś ca mastake /
samāghnan bahuśas tūryam ājñayā keśavasya hi //
tasya bherīravaṃ sarvaṃ jagad vikṣobhya saṃsthitam /
pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ ca pātālaṃ ca samaspṛśat //
bhagavān api rājyānāṃ pravibhāgaṃ cakāra ha /
paścimām tu diśaṃ prādād varuṇāya mahātmane /
evaṃ vibhajya trailokyaṃ viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ /
body.note: k: V1.3 B1.3 Ds D6 ins. after line 2965:k
k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2965 :k
body.l: akṣayaṃ cāmṛtatvaṃ ca dadau jāmbavate hariḥ /
nāradena jagannāthaḥ stūto devaiś ca pūjitaḥ /
iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ vāmanatvaṃ yathāgatam /
hariḥ sarveśvaro viṣṇuḥ prāptaṃ devair yathā divam /
gate tu tridivaṃ kṛṣṇe badhvā vairocaniṃ balim /
tadgatas tanmanā bhūtvā drutaṃ mokṣam avāpsyasi //
tam adhītya stavaṃ divyaṃ nāradena samīritam /
pṛthivī coddhṛtā yena taṃ jajāpa mahāsuraḥ //
saptasūryavapuḥ kṛtvā trīṃl lokān krāntavān asi /
bhagavan kālakālas tvaṃ tena satyena mokṣaya //
punaś cintayase lokāṃs tena satyena mokṣaya //
tvatsthā dṛṣṭā dvijendreṇa tena satyena mokṣaya //
eko vidyāsahāyas tvaṃ yogī yogam upāgataḥ /
punas trailokyam utsṛjya tena satyena mokṣaya //
lokāṃś cintayase bhūyas tena satyena mokṣaya //
dharā jaloddhṛtā yena tena satyena mokṣaya //
uddhṛtya daṃṣṭrayā yajñāṃs tripiṇḍān kṛtavān asi /
tvaṃ pitṝṇām api hare tena satyena mokṣaya //
paritrātās tvayā deva tena satyena mokṣaya //
śiro jahāra cakreṇa tena satyena mokṣaya //
huṃkāreṇa hato daityas tena satyena mokṣaya //
dānavābhyāṃ hṛtā vedā brahmaṇaḥ paśyataḥ purā /
paritrātās tvayā deva tena satyena mokṣaya //
brahmaṇe te 'rpitā vedās tena satyena mokṣaya //
antaṃ tava na paśyanti tena satyena mokṣaya //
apāntaratamā nāma jāto devasya vai sutaḥ /
kṛtāś ca tena vedārthās tena satyena mokṣaya //
rahasyaṃ tava devasya tena satyena mokṣaya //
tvatprasādāc ca cakṣuṣmāṃs tena satyena mokṣaya //
grāhagrastaṃ gajendraṃ ca dīnaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam /
bhaktaṃ mokṣitavāṃs tvaṃ hi tena satyena mokṣaya //
akṣayaś cāvyayaś ca tvaṃ brahmaṇyo bhaktavatsalaḥ /
śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ śārṅgaṃ garuḍam eva ca /
prasādayāmi śirasā te bandhān mokṣayantu mām //
hariṃ prasādayām āsur baliṃ mokṣaya bandhanāt //
āgamaṃ tasya vijñāya nāgā muktvā mahāsuram /
dānavendra mahābāho viṣṇus tvām abravīt prabhuḥ /
itasvayā na gantavyaṃ gavyūtim api dānava /
samayaṃ yadi bhindyās tvaṃ mūrdhā te śatadhā vrajet //
jīvyopāyaṃ tu bhagavān mama kiṃcit karotu saḥ /
bales tu vacanaṃ śrutvā garutmān idam abravit /
pūrvam eva kṛtas tena jīvyopāyo mahātmanā //
pravartiṣyanti ye yajñā vidhihīnā hy anṛtvijaḥ /
na teṣāṃ yajñabhāgaṃ vai pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ /
yaḥ paṭheta naro bhaktyā tasya naśyati kilbiṣam //
aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā caivepsitaṃ patim /
ye ca mokṣaiṣiṇo loke yoginaḥ sāṃkhyakāpilāḥ /
yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ /
eṣa vai vāmano nāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ /
vedavidbhir dvijair eva paṭhyate vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ //
yas tv imaṃ vāmanaṃ divyaṃ prādurbhāvaṃ mahātmanaḥ /
śṛṇuyān niyato bhaktyā sadā parvasu parvasu //
parān vijayate rājā yathā viṣṇur mahābalaḥ /
yaśo vipulam āpnoti vipulaṃ cāpnute vasu //
priyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāmano yathā /
body.note: k: On the other hand, T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 ins. after line 3068, G3.4 after line 3066 :k
body.l: paṭhan nityam idaṃ sarvaṃ caritaṃ vāmanasya ha /
bhaktyā niṣkalmaṣo bhūtvā dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt /
body.note: k: T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 cont., G3.4 ins. after line 3070:k
body.l: cintayed vāmanaṃ nityaṃ śriyaḥ prāptuṃ yad icchasi /
śrāvayed divyam ākhyānaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dine dine /
abhīkṣṇaṃ garbhiṇī śrutvā namasyati ca vāmanam /
yas tv imāṃ harivaṃśasya saṃhitāṃ nikhilāṃ paṭhet /
so 'sukṣaye brahmalokaṃ gantā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ //
pitāmahaḥ pitā caiva viṣṇur eva na saṃśayaḥ /
manasā karmaṇā vācā dveṣam eteṣu varjayet /
pretyānantyaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte iha caiva na saṃśayaḥ //
ko hy anyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣān mahābhāratakṛd bhavet //
dharmāṇāṃ bhāvināṃ caiva ko brūyāt tam ṛte prabhum /
vartatāṃ te mahāyajño yathā saṃkalpitas tvayā //
saṃkalpitāśvamedhas tvaṃ śrutvā dharmāṃś ca śāsvatān /
āyuṣo 'nte tapas taptvā gantāsi tvaṃ narādhipa //
etat te mahad ākhyānaṃ śrutvā tvaṃ pārthivottama /
prādurbhāvo vāmanasya kathitaś caiṣa te mayā /
rājarṣīṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nāradasya ca saṃnidhau //
eṣā te vaiṣṇavī caryā mayā kārtsnyena kīrtitā /
āścaryaparvam akhilaṃ yo hīdaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ /
nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyāt kiṃcid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt //
yaś cedaṃ brāhmaṇo 'dhīte śucir bhūtvā sanātanaḥ /
ā brahmabhavanāc cāpi yaśaḥ khyātim asaṃśayam /
bhaviṣyati nṛpaśreṣṭha satyam etad bravīmi te //
śaunakād yair hi saṃkṣepād bistareṇa tathaiva ca /
proktas te harivaṃśas tu kim anyat kathayāmi te /
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 43, transliterated by H. Brinkhaus, proof--read by H. Brinkhaus, version of May 30, 2002 :h

body.l: tryakṣād vadham ahaṃ brahmañ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ /
śṛṇu vistarataḥ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi naidhanam /
śaṃkareṇa vadhaṃ rājañ śūlais tribhir ajihmagaiḥ /
maṇibhiś ca prakāśadbhiḥ sarvaratnaiś ca toraṇaiḥ //
babhāse nabhaso madhye śriyā paramayā jvalat /
body.note: k: Ñ2 V2 Dn D5 ins. :k
body.l: sūryanābhaś ca daityendraś candranābhaś ca bhārata /
mamṛduś ca babhañjuś ca mohitāḥ parameṣṭhinā /
teṣāṃ caiva vadhopāyaṃ vadasva vadatāṃ vara /
yaṃ jñātvā bāhubalino vadhema samare parān //
gacchadhvam amarāḥ sarve rudram ārādhituṃ bhuvi /
sa eva nigrahe śakto daityānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
tapasā tasya devasya samartho vai tato bhavet /
sa eva hatvā tān sarvān kuśalaṃ vo vidhāsyati //
avadhyā dānavāḥ sarve ṛte śaṃkaram avyayam //
pratigṛhya ca tadvākyaṃ manobhir vāgbhir eva ca /
bhūmau prapedire sarve saha rudraiś ca bhārata //
vindhyapāde ca merau ca madhye ca pṛthivītale /
paridhānāni carmāṇi mṛdūni ca śubhāni ca /
evaṃ devavacobhiś ca bhāvino 'rthasya vai balāt /
sarve kāñcana varṇābhā babhur dīptā ivāgnayaḥ //
rudreṇa sahitā rudrā dahanta iva tejasā /
tripuraṃ yodhayat tryakṣaḥ pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ //
atha daityā bhinnadehāḥ purāṭ ṭālagatā iva /
nyapatan bhuvi dehais te viśīrṇā iva parvatāḥ //
abhividdhāḥ praviddhāś ca cayāṭ ṭālagatā nṛpa /
nyapatan daityasaṃghāś ca vajreṇeva hatā nagāḥ //
bāṇaiś ca bhinnamarmāṇo daityendrā yudhi gocare /
tatra saṃjñāṃ vyamuñcanta tena dīptena tejasā /
astaṃ prāpte dinakare surendrās te niśāmukhe /
atha daityā jayaṃ prāptā niśāyāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
vinedur vipulair nādair meghā iva mahāravāḥ //
suraiś ca sahitaḥ sarvai ratham āsthāya śaṃkaraḥ /
darpitān abhinad daityān prabhindann iva vai diśaḥ //
sa ratho vājibhiḥ śīghrair uhyamāno manojavaiḥ /
vibabhau nabhaso madhye savidyud iva toyadaḥ //
bhāti sma sa ratho rājan sendrāyudha ivāmbudaḥ //
karmabhiḥ pūrvajaṃ pūrvaiḥ śucibhis tryambakaṃ tadā //
śataghnībhiś ca nighnanto bhallaiḥ śūlaiś ca bhārata /
gadābhiś ca gadā jaghnur bhallair bhallāṃś ca cicchiduḥ /
astrair astrāṇy abādhanta māyāṃ māyābhir eva ca //
citraiś ca bahubhiḥ śastrair atiṣṭhata śacīpatiḥ //
tato madhye divyaśabdaḥ prādur āsīn mahīpate /
sa eṣa śaṃkarasyāgre ratho bhūmiṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
tasmin nipatite rājan rathānāṃ pravare rathe /
vicukṣubhuḥ samudrāś ca na rejuś ca diśo daśa //
vṛddhāś ca brāhmaṇās tatra jepuś ca paramaṃ japam /
yat tad brahmamayaṃ tejaḥ sarvatra vijayaiṣiṇām //
śāntyartham iha bhūtānām iha loke paratra ca /
tejasā jvalayan viṣṇos tryakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ //
atha viṣṇur mahāyogī sarvato dṛṣya tattvataḥ /
nanāda balavan nādaṃ samudra iva parvaṇi //
agniṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi taṃ ca bāṇaṃ suyantritam /
taṃ bāṇaṃ trividhaṃ vīryāt saṃdhāya manasā prabhuḥ /
muktvā śaravarān ghorān saviṣān iva pannagān /
supradīptais tribhir bāṇair vegibhis tad vidāritam //
tāni tasya tu dagdhāni vaidūryasadṛśāni vai /
tatas tu vijayī rudraḥ sevyamāno maharṣibhiḥ /
vṛṣarūpaṃ tadā viṣṇuṃ pūjayan prayayau girim //
ya imaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ vijayaṃ śaṃkarasya ca /
sarvatra vijayaṃ prāptaḥ sa tu dīrghāyur āpnuyāt //
hate tu tripure devair vāco harṣāt kileritāḥ /
sarvāñ jahīti śatrūṃs tvaṃ pravṛddhān puruṣottama //
viṣṇur eva mahāyogī yogena prasmayann iva /

body.l: tatrādya ādisargas tu bhūtasargas tataḥ paraḥ /
pṛthor vainyasya cākhyānaṃ manūnāṃ kīrtanaṃ tathā //
pitṛkalpas tathotpattiḥ somasya ca budhasya ca /
saṃkṣepāt kīrtitā viṣṇoḥ prādurbhāvās tataḥ param //
andhakasya ca vākyāni keśino nidhanaṃ tathā /
mālākāre mālyayācñā varadānaṃ ca tasya vai /
vivāhaś caiva rukmiṇyā rukmiṇo nidhanaṃ tathā //
narakasya vadhaḥ pāri+ jātasya haraṇaṃ tathā //
body.note: k: K2, V1, D4 subst. for line 43 :k
body.l: dvārakāyāṃ praveśaś ca sabhāyāṃ ca praveśanam //
śambarasya vadhaś caiva dhanyopākhyānam eva ca /
bhaviṣyaṃ cātra dāhaś ca tripurasya udāhṛtaḥ /
body.note: k: Dn Ds2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k
k: After line 1 of *9, G(ed.) ins. :k
body.l: loke sajjanaṣaṭpadair ahar ahaḥ pepīyamānaṃ mudā @

body.l: vṛttāntaṃ śṛṇuyād yas tu sāyaṃ prātaḥ samāhitaḥ /
sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma labdhakāmaḥ kurūdvaha //
imāṃ ca saṃhitāṃ ceti sarvaśāstramayīṃ tathā /
ekakālaṃ dvikālaṃ vā trikālaṃ vāpi yaḥ paṭhet //
śivālaye tathā kṣetre naimiṣe puṣkare tathā //
śucir bhūtvā dampatī ca vācakaṃ pūjayet sudhīḥ /
khilo viṣṇuḥ prasīdeta vācakaḥ paṭhanāt punaḥ /
śrutvā ca labhate lakṣmīṃ saṃtatiṃ manasepsitāṃ /
kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne ||
ya idaṃ śrāvayed vidvān samastaṃ tv ardham eva vā /
pādamātraṃ tadardhaṃ vā tv ekaṃ cākhyānaṃ uttamam /
sa namasyaḥ prayatnena viṣṇoḥ saṃprītaye sadā //
tasmai deyaṃ prayatnena viṣṇoḥ saṃprītaye sadā /
ya etat pustakaṃ ramyaṃ leṣayitvā samarpa .. /
atrākhyānāni yāvanti ślokā yāvanta eva hi /
yāvanty api ca mātrāṇi yāvantyaḥ patrapaṅkayaḥ /
aputraḥ śṛṇuyād yas tu susnātaḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ /
yasya viśveśvaras tuṣṭas tasmai tacchravaṇe matiḥ /
tac chrotavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa paramaṃ padam icchatā /
body.note: h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 45, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of September 26, 2002 :h
k: Dn D3.5.6 cont. after App. I, No. 44 :k
body.l: kiṃ phalaṃ kiṃ ca deyaṃ vai tad brūhi tvaṃ mamāgrataḥ //
harivaṃśe purāṇe tu śrute ca bharatottama /
tat sarvaṃ nāśam āyāti himaṃ sūryodaye yathā //
tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti vaiṣṇavo nātra saṃśayaḥ //
striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyuḥ /
śṛṇvantaḥ śraddhayā yuktā vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyuḥ //
bhaviṣyanti narā rājan satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmy aham //
strībhiś ca putrakāmābhiḥ śrotavyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ /
alaṃkāraṃ pradadyāc ca pāṇyor vai bharatarṣabha /
bhūmidānasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati //
ghoṭakaṃ javinaṃ dadyād vṛṣaṃ ca dhuri yojitam /
śṛṇoti śrāvayād vāpi harivaṃśaṃ tu yo naraḥ /
kuṇḍale caiva dātavye ūrṇāvastraṃ tathaiva ca /
samāptau vidhivad vastraṃ deyaṃ kṣaumaṃ dvijātaye //
ātmānaṃ sasutaṃ caiva striyaṃ ca bharatarṣabha /
daśāṃśaś cātra homo vai kāryaḥ śrotrā narādhipa //
idaṃ mayā tavāgre ca sarvaṃ proktaṃ nararṣabha /
aputraḥ putram āpnoti adhano dhanam āpnuyāt //
tat phalaṃ labhate nūnaṃ purāṇaśravaṇād dhareḥ //
